Before I start the guts of my review, I should preface that I am 24 years old, with acne prone and combination skin. My skin is not very sensitive, and I did not use this product in my face, and I use prescription adapalene gel for my acne and I was sent this product free in an exchange for a review by Sokoglam.

Now, I used this product on my neck nightly since first getting this product. Now, I normally wouldn’t use a retinal right away nightly, and I would space out and ladder up my applications in time, but since I carry most of my skin care down to my neck, I felt comfortable with the frequent application. I find the product itself to be thicker than expected, but easily spreadable. It had a yellow hue and an interesting scent to it, but it is not unpleasant. I like to use this before I put my normal moisturizer over my neck. I’m the two month since using this product, I have noticed a reduction in hyperpigmentation from past acne and the fading of past acne scars. I find this product mixes well with most of my other skin care products, other than certain actives, like BHA. (I would not normally recommend or use Retinal or BHA together in a routine, but for the sake of the review I did for a few times) I would recommend this product for someone looking for a low irritating retinal that pairs well with other products. I will say though, for the price, as much as I like it, I probably won’t repurchase in the future in addition to the Rx Retinoid I currently use. If you have the change, and want to try this product, I would recommend this product for you, as I’ve seen results in a short period of time.
This is my 2nd retinol and it is so effective. It seems my wrinkles are getting faded.
This product 100% helps my skin feel smoother and brighter. I cannot recommend this product enough.
I use this product as a toner in the mornings and I love the way my skin feels afterward. Over time, my skin did feel smoother to the touch, so I couldn't recommend this product enough!

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Cleansing Toner
review: i have used this product before and let me just say… it is so good. i love it! super refreshing and brightening. my skin has lost its bumps and it’s oiliness.

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Cleansing Toner

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Cleansing Toner

review: This product has a great texture that melts down to easily take off makeup with minimal rubbing. Waterproof mascara is the only product that takes a little more effort to remove, but still always fully comes off.

To me, it has the faintest smell of apple peels which is pleasant and refreshing. This is definitely a staple item for me, and would like to try the other kinds as well.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Original

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Cream Intense
review: I absolutely adore this cream, I need a LOT of hydration for my skin and this one does the job. It leave a light greasy feeling that is quite normal for this level of hydration but I don't mind, my skin thank me when I use it!!!

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Cream Intense
review: I have Rosacea and Cosrx product really improved my control over it and give me nice skin. I need a lot of hydration!

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Cream Intense
review: I love this cream. it is rich and absorbs really well.

productName: On Time Revolution The First Essence 5x
review: I have very reactive, sensitive skin along with melasma. I’ve been using this daily for two weeks. I now add it to my décolleté after my showers. I love this stuff. I’m already addicted.

productName: On Time Revolution The First Essence 5x
review: I really like this essence. It absorbs well and my skin feels a more moisturized after using it.

productName: On Time Revolution The First Essence 5x
review: I've been wanting to try this for awhile, and I'm so glad I finally got it! I only wish I started using it sooner. I feel like even with my acne scars that are taking a long time to fade, my skin still somehow is just so healthy looking since I've started using it. The bottle itself is so lovely to hold, I feel so fancy when I use it. Such a treat!

productName: On Time Revolution The First Essence 5x
review: This made a noticeable difference in my acneic skin in a short amount of time, and it feels so luxurious. Fast absorbing, so that makes it easy to layer quickly under moisturizer or SPF. Love this stuff!
These work well. More importantly, the adhesive isn’t too strong where it hurts to remove the patch but strong enough to withstand water and sweat.

I never had acne as a teen. I just never did … but now at 49 (!) I find myself occasionally getting a pimple or two. (Why now??). I have purchased these a few times now. I really like them. They really work … and they are practically invisible. I actually forgot I was wearing one and actually went out in public. It just melted into my skin! I don’t think anyone noticed! I always like to keep a package on hand “just in case” … and the price is very affordable.

I've tried several brands of pimple patches over the years (the same brands you're probably thinking of), but these are by far my favorite and most re-purchased. The beveled edges mean that they not only adhere to your skin better, but that they blend into any complexion or skin tone almost seamlessly. There are two different sized patches included, and the sheer number of patches (42 for just $6!) makes this product well worth your money; I use them liberally (as one should!) and don't feel guilty about it afterwards because they're so inexpensive. Using these patches at any and every stage of a pimple—when you first notice the blemish emerging, once you've picked at it, and once it has already started to scar—has helped my skin heal and get back to normal so much quicker. I cannot recommend this product enough!!
Got these on a whim and I absolutely love the double edge design! These really pull the gunk out of your face.

These are great, everytime I remember to put them over emerging blemishes I wake up the next morning so grateful that I did. They’ll take a pimple from whitehead for gone in 8 hours sometimes. And even when they don’t it’s helpful for healing and to avoid picking at pimples.
It’s nice moisturizing lip gloss and I like that it doesn’t have any fragrance but I still don’t think it’s worth the price. I bought it only to see what’s the hype. Nice packing.

Been using this serum for a few weeks and I’ll be honest- it’s definitely not an overnight game changer, but I do really like it. I definitely had to give it time to see how it works and personally I need more than the 4-5 drops. I use the whole dropper’s worth but I do think it had made a difference in the overall texture and look of my face. I think with the caffeine I do see less puffiness in my face as well. It goes on lightly and is not greasy which is nice and it doesn’t pill under any products I’ve used. Not sure I’ll buy again but I’m definitely going to finish the bottle!

This is a very nice serum. It has a great texture. I can tell that it has strong active ingredients because my skin is reacting to it similarly to when I started Tretinoin. However I haven’t really seen results yet. It’s only been a couple of weeks so I’m going to use the entire bottle before I make a final judgement. So far so good though.
Noticeably reduced fine lines the first time I used it.
I love how my skin looks refreshed. This is my next go to!

I apply this on my skin every morning and night. It really works and gave my skin a fresh look. Has really helped my skin lifted and hydrated so much! My skin is smoother and hormonal breakouts much decreased. Can’t wait to try more of their products!

This cream is beyond good. It makes my skin look like a baby's bottom lol. I usually have dull, dry skin that I can't seem to kick but one swipe of this on my face and my complexion is completely renewed. I'm obsessed!!!!!
This amazing cream makes my skin so soft and hydrated! I did under estimate this cream and now it’s my next go to ! I love it!
I love this product. It’s totally unscented if that’s a concern, and it’s relatively unassuming as far as packaging goes, plus it has a refillable option making it very eco friendly.

Purchased this out-limb because I am always in the hunt for foundation or something similar that has spf in it. This is a game changer, I can’t speak anything bad about this and I am so glad this made it in my cart.

I can’t tell you how much I love Iope’s cushion foundation. I have combination sensitive skin and it provides the right amount coverage (not too much) and does not dry me out. It gives me the perfect clean and natural look!
I love the way this feels on my face it's almost like silk. The vanilla color is a perfect color match for skin, which I was worried about.
The coverage is light to medium if you build it up. It does cover redness well, but not pores.

productName: On Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence
review: Ufff i just got my secound bottle and loved it. I got this for my sister as well and she really like it. We both have different skin type! Great job cosrx!❤️

productName: On Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence
review: I’ve been using it for about three weeks now and really see improvements on my skin. I highly recommend this product.

productName: On Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence
review: The texture is a bit slimy but the results speak for themselves. I’ve ordered more.

productName: On Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence
review: I have combination sensitive skin with rosacea and eczema. This product is great. I actually use it in the morning to add extra plump and hydration to my skin. This is one of the rare products I don't get reactive redness with. I don't really like the texture on my hands but once it's set into my skin, I like the way it makes my skin feel. I plan to try the cream with it next.

productName: On Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence
review: This smoothens my skin and adds shine to my skin texture.. in love with this product

I've used this for 1-2 years and actually greatly prefer it over SK II (which I gave away to a friend). It's very calming , moisturizing, and helps plump up my skin. It works very well under sun screen and BB cream.
This essence is awesome, really delivers like all the reviews I read. I like the packaging and the way the product feels when applied.

This essence is singlehandedly brighting my old acne scars! The only reason I've rated it 4/5, is because no matter how many layers I add, it's still not as moisturizing as some other essence/toners I have in my skincare rotation. Otherwise, it's perfect! The glass bottle feels incredible high-end and there's a generous amount of product for the price.
Was a recommended product. Took the advice & happy I did. Hydrates skin well.
I’ve only used it for a couple of days, but so far so good! I feel my complexion is brighter and more hydrated. It doesn’t smell strong either and I like how it leaves my skin.

I applied it to my face for the first time last night. It was VERY RICH and heavy imo. I am not sure if it is a good or bad thing yet as I would need more time to discern this, but for now, I think it feels too heavy to use during the day time if you're going out. If you're just going to stay home the whole day (or in my case work remotely), then I think it's fine to use it during the day too. But if you plan on heading out shortly after your facial routine, I personally wouldn't use this before an outing as it feels too rich. I will be back to update this after a few weeks/months to see if I see/feel any difference from using this cream.
So smooth and smells great. Nice thick cream and my skin feels so moisturized.

I've been using IOPE's Super Vital Cream Rich for a few weeks now and I have to say, it's a game-changer for my skincare routine. Not only does it deeply moisturize my skin, but also leaves it feeling smooth and soft. It absorbs quickly without any sticky residue, and I've noticed a big improvement in the overall appearance of my skin.

productName: On UV Defense Sun Protector EX SPF 39
review: I'm super picky about the face sunscreens I use (mainly stick with EltaMd UV Clear with Supergoop unseen sunscreen as a runner-up), so I was surprised to find that I really enjoy this one! It comes out white but doesn't leave a white cast. It doesn't have the gross sunscreen smell I hate and it goes on light and leaves this beautiful glow--not oily or greasy at all! For reference, I have combination skin that leans dry + acne prone. Definitely recommend this one!

productName: On UV Defense Sun Protector EX SPF 39
review: Wow, this product is absolutely amazing! Not only is it incredibly effective at what it does, but it's also super lightweight and absorbs into my skin in no time at all. Plus, it's so sheer on my skin that there's no residue or cast left behind. I absolutely cannot recommend this product enough – it's an absolute must-have!

productName: On UV Defense Sun Protector EX SPF 39
review: I love how it’s a lightweight sunscreen and has a nice smell.

productName: On UV Defense Sun Protector EX SPF 39
review: This product is great. It’s not fragranced at all and has absolutely zero cast. I apply using the 2 finger rule so using a liberal amount of product and even before it’s fully absorbed I knew there’d be no case on my dark brown skin (think the great Coco Jones’ skin tone) so that’s saying a lot.

i gotta say i was skeptical when this didn't feel like your typical cleanser or makeup remover jelly (I had bought Plenaire's before this, and it's fine but this is infinity times better). My tip for using Night Off is water makes all the difference - the consistency goes from being pretty thick and not very jelly-ish to slippery with minor suds. it takes ALL the makeup off with zero to minimal rubbing (and you really only need to rub if like me you like to wear triple coat mascara & tightlined eyeliner). I couldn’t believe it - the only time i’ve had makeup come off this easily was with Clean it Zero but Night Off is less oily and actually cleanses (ie not just taking makeup off). I really love this stuff, i’m saving so much money and time relative to my old cleansing routine. i’ve been using for ~2wks now and can safely say i’m never going back.

This cleanser has left my skin so clean and smooth! And most importantly it does remove my makeup with one wash!! I have dry skin and after wards it leaves it a little bit dry but I follow with a hydrating toner and it's no problem. This is such a unique cleanser and I am always impressed my this brand!
Great under makeup and for the first few hours. Then it turns white, and it's more noticeable on the skin. I just like this to protect me from picking at my spots!
Great for overnight use but more noticeable.

A God send when using on fresh pimples , they stick really well and work amazingly. Usually I find other brands to fall off in my sleep of not stick originally. This is my all time favourite and I love that it comes in many different sizes.
It helps

my skin can break out pretty bad sometimes, but these patches help speed up the healing process so much! i stick one on at night and in the morning all the gunk is absorbed and the pimple is basically gone. i noticed that this patch works best if i stick it on before using other skincare items, or if the products i'm using before are lighter.

i have used this product for years. i have also used the brand for years. it makes my skin feel so refreshed and hydrated. i have super sensitive and dry skin and this solves my problems!

After the first use my skin already started feeling insanely soft and clean!
This stuff smells so good! It makes me want to go have a glass of wine! It works really well too. It gets rid of my black head and leaves my son feeling super refreshed.

productName: On Time Revolution Night Repair Ampoule 5X
review: Love this serum! Have been using it for years. Always my go to when I’m not trying something new or when my skin is in trouble. My husband always comments that my skin is glowing when I use missha time revolution serum.

productName: On Time Revolution Night Repair Ampoule 5X
review: This is one of those holy grail products. I naturally have combination skin but my moisture barrier is completely wrecked right now so I needed some thing that could improve things without being too harsh or too greasy. This completely addressed my texture problems and eliminated my fine lines all without not being too greasy. This stuff is liquid gold.

productName: On Time Revolution Night Repair Ampoule 5X
review: Feels good on the skin. A little goes a long way.

productName: On Time Revolution Night Repair Ampoule 5X
review: In the past months I've become a chronic skin picker and THIS have absolutely saved my skin. I have pretty sensitive skin so I don't like to splurge on a product in case it irritates my skin, but this recent black friday I was running out of my hyaluronic acid serum and decided to purchase this as a replacement. Each day my skin looks clearer, less red, and has less scars than the day before. I have dry-combo skin so I will add this isn't as moisturizing as I thought, so for dry skin I would recommend pairing this with a moisturizing essence.

productName: On Freshly Juiced Vitamin C Drop
review: i have noticed my skin getting a bit lighter and it even looks brighter. i have super sensitive skin, dry, and i have eczema and i’m usually very hesitant to try new products like this. but so far, i have only positive reviews!

productName: On Freshly Juiced Vitamin C Drop
review: This combined with the Klairs vitamin e mask work in harmony, I’ve already seen an improvement with my skin

productName: On Freshly Juiced Vitamin C Drop
review: I have purchased this serum several times because, truly, it is one of my favs! Considering the price as well, I think it's a steal. I find my skin tone is more even, my texture is lessened, and my acne scars look way less red. I also have found that I can use it with other actives, like salicylic acid serums.

productName: On Freshly Juiced Vitamin C Drop
review: I started having red rashes and burning sensation after using the serum for the first three days. I tried switching it up to weekly twice but still my skin would burn. Had a lot of expectations from this serum

I have been using this cleanser for almost a year now and I love it. I use it every single night to remove my makeup, and it is so gentle that you can get it in your eyes with no problem. It never strips my moisture barrier. I recommend it 100%
My skin breaks out on my cheeks and forehead when I use this. It definitely removes my makeup, but the breakouts are not worth it.

This sunscreen has worked for my skin for years--at various points, I've suffered from acne, facial eczema, and dryness. This product has never contributed to any of these conditions, and I'm impressed that it continues to work and not be visible throughout my different skin problems.
This is my favorite product to use daily. I have been using this sunscreen for about 2 years now and I always make sure I have an extra in my drawer. It
goes on so nicely and blends into your skin without feeling heavy or having

a white cast. Most importantly I do a lot of outside work during the day and I have never had a sundurnt nose ever. It feels good to know I’m doing my best for my skin. I have given this as a gift to several nieces who like it so much they have purchased their own.
I love this sunscreen
My skin hates chemical exfoliating serums so I was nervous about this but it never irritated my skin, even with every day use and I hardly used my regular exfoliants at all. Would recommend for sure
I have a lot of stubborn acne and this was gentle enough to use once a day and helped get rid of a lot of texture without being overly drying
Excellent
Is the best!
A little goes a long way with this toner, it smells great, it didn’t irritate my sensitive skin, and it didn’t leave my skin feeling tight after using it.
Love this ampoule that makes my skin feel so tight and elastic!
This is my staple and I buy several bottles at once. Makes a visible difference in my skin.
Moisturizing and dried quick on the skin. I’m not sure if it’s worth the price though so I have yet to repurchase and probably would not be repurchasing.
I have ordered this one a few times but stopped using it a while back bc I forgot to re-order. Definitely getting it again, it really helps with my hyperpigmentation / acne scars!

I was a bit nervous buying this. I've used the old formula and loved it, so I was scared the new one would not work well with my skin. I was wrong. It feels exactly the same as the old one but better. I have oily and sensitive skin and my skin and it worked well with me. It definitely does not oxidize as quickly as the old one. It goes on nicely and does not cause my sunscreen to pill. Will definitely repurchase.

I used the whole bottle, my experience with it was ok. Not really any complaints, it went on smooth and wasn’t sticky. People seem to dislike the smell but I didn’t think it had much of a scent so that’s a positive. This one just didn’t seem to do as much for my skin as past serums. But my skin is picky, so could just be a miss for my skin which ok:) worth the trial
Great, simple vitamin C for daily use! Definitely helped with hyperpigmentation. Would recommend!
Great texture

productName: On Green Tea Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: I have combination sensitive skin with rosacea and eczema. I love this face soap. It feels very luxurious and smells like a spa. I try other fun face washes every now and again but always come back to this one. As someone with reactive skin, this is my holy grail face wash.

productName: On Green Tea Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: I have very dry skin and so I switched to oil-based cleansers after trying this one, which had been recommended in my skin concierge thing. I like the clean feeling from this cleanser but I could only use it every two weeks or my skin would get too dry. If you have dry skin and are looking for an everyday cleanser I would recommend something else.

productName: On Green Tea Real Fresh Foam Cleanser

productName: On CPP Collagen 80% Intensive Eye Cream
review: Will buy again!

productName: On CPP Collagen 80% Intensive Eye Cream
review: So far so good! Gel, feeling léger, hydrate bien

productName: On CPP Collagen 80% Intensive Eye Cream
review: I've never been one to obsess over eye creams in fact, I often think they do nothing. While I see no extreme benefits from this mask, my eye area is moisturized.
Excellent product, I feel my skin healthier. I definitely would recommend

I got a bottle of this ages ago and loved it, but decided to try different products. I'm very glad I switched back - this makes my skin feel moisturized and hydrated (I follow with a heavier face cream to lock in) even on super cold, dry days.

This product really helps keep my skin dewy and help keep my skin moisturized during the colder months. it absorbs quickly to the skin, and it doesn't make the skin feels sticky, which is a HUGE plus!
Keeps my dry skin hydrated without causing clogged pores or breakouts.
I’ve used many, many essences and this is the most hydrating and beautifying one I’ve ever used. Purchased twice now.

Doesn't do anything for my skin (I have combination skin and get occasional breakouts). It also has a weird, viscosey texture. Toner is supposed to help you feel extra clean and I feel like this one does the opposite.
We are so sorry to hear this product did not work out for you. Please reach out to us via e-mail with your order number and we'll be happy to get you all sorted!
Great for sensitive skin
best gentle physical exfoliater for dry skin. smells amazing!

I got this as a sample twice. Both times I used it, my skin immediately felt soft. It may or may not have made some pimples surface, but I'm not sure if it is absolutely because of the peels. Overall it was good.

These are amazing! I would buy them over and over just because they make my skin feel so smooth after I rinse. I haven’t been breaking out as much and I feel that my skin absorbs products better afterwards.

I've tried all the varieties of these (green tea, wine and now lemon) and the lemon is my favorite! Love the scent and my skin felt so smooth afterwards. Only used once so far, but looking forward to see the effects of the brightening from the lemon :)

A Sephora employee recommended this product to me 3 years ago when I was breaking out badly (Sephora didn't even carry the Neogen brand anymore). These pads have changed my life. I use them twice a week and they dramatically improved my breakouts and skin texture. My skin feels so soft after using and they never irritate me. I can't see myself ever not using them!

I’ve had this on my wish list for a while but finally ordered it because there was a sale on the website. It is worth every dime, it helped clear my skin of acne as well as scarring and gave my face an overall plump appearance. Will be ordering a second bottle!
This is great for anyone struggling with moisture. I like stacking it with a moisturizer for an extra boost.
This is a very thick serum, moisturizing. Sometimes if I'm not going anywhere, I skip my moisturizer and just keep this on. Great product .

Love this stuff and my skin does too. It's hydrating enough on it's own during muggy summers and a perfect serum layer during the dry winters. A little goes a long way and it's in a small enough bottle for a carry-on (it has definetly earned it's spot in the travel bag... I can't imagine washing my face without it). Have purchased twice and hope it is never discontinued.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Stick
review: I exfoliate my face every single time I'm in the shower for years. People say that I should stop exfoliating so much and cut back. It took over a decade for me to even try to switch. Now that I've been introduced to this green tea cleansing stick that makes my skin feel clean and smooth, I am extremely satisfied changing up my skin care products and routine.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Stick
review: This stick is so handy for travelling and lathers very well. I feel so clean and refreshed after using it.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Stick
review: Love this green tea stick cleanser! This is my go-to travel cleanser. Love that it is solid so it doesn't take up valuable liquid space in my carry on. So convenient and easy to use. It works great as a quick double cleanse in the morning and after a workout. It has gentle exfoliation, so it's like a 3 in one! I have normal skin that can get dehydrated but this cleanser leaves my skin clean and soft, not tight or dry. I love it. I will continue buying this. I think it is a wonderful product. My teen daughter loves it too.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Stick
review: I use this at home and when I travel. Cleans my face without drying and helps with breakouts. I like to travel with it because it’s not liquid and won’t leak.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Stick
review: I love that this cleanser is a solid, making it super easy to travel with! This is the second time I've purchased and I think it will be part of my travel routine for a long time. It cleanses well and smells great, but not too strong.

productName: On Super Aqua Cell Renew Snail Cream
review: It has a lovely texture and the fragrance didn't bother me at all. However, my sensitive skin could not handle it. My skin became extremely dry and I ended up getting a rash on my face. It took a couple of weeks for it to clear up and I'm still not able to get back to my usual makeup routine (but that may be partially due to winter weather). If you have sensitive skin, maybe skip this one.

productName: On Super Aqua Cell Renew Snail Cream
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Super Aqua Cell Renew Snail Cream
review: I used to never moisturize. But now that I just turned 40, I figured I should take better care of myself internally and externally. Had I known about this super light and absorbent cream that leaves my face plumped and tight, I would of moisturize earlier in my life!

productName: On Collagen Essential Lifting & Firming Sheet Mask
review: Make skin soft

productName: On Collagen Essential Lifting & Firming Sheet Mask
review: I love the way the masks adhere to the face ( not literally ) but they stay so well put on the skin until all the product is absorbed. My skin feels much firmer !

productName: On Collagen Essential Lifting & Firming Sheet Mask
review: This product is definitely hydrating, but not greasy at all. Great for my combination skin. Didn't make my oily spots break out and hydrated everywhere. I have combination sensitive skin, and I would recommend this to anyone.

productName: On Collagen Essential Lifting & Firming Sheet Mask
review: The mask leaves my skin feeling super hydrated and it also fits very well

productName: On Perfect Cover BB Cream SPF 42 PA+++
review: I was SHOCKED how well this blended with my skin! It’s great coverage but still feels light as if I’m only wearing my skin products. I absolutely love this!!

productName: On Perfect Cover BB Cream SPF 42 PA+++
review: I can't stand using foundation because I can never find anything that doesn't feel too thick on my face; normally, it just sits there and feels like it exists to smudge everywhere. I like using just basic concealers or tinted sunscreen, but I tried this and I don't know if I'll ever go back. It moisturizes, it's not greasy or sticky or thick, and it still provides the coverage I need for my skin, which tends toward dry, red, sensitive, and sometimes flaky on my T-zone. I don't notice any flakes when I apply this, and it goes on very evenly.

productName: On Perfect Cover BB Cream SPF 42 PA+++
review: My only qualm is that I do feel like it's a *touch* too gray where I wish it was a bit more beige.

productName: On Perfect Cover BB Cream SPF 42 PA+++
review: I have been buying this for a few years and this is actually what I use as my foundation! I love that it has SPF, and it allows me to dress my skin up, while also protecting it's barrier. This is been a game changer for me in my makeup routine.

This is an excellent toner. It’s a bit on the thicker side which makes it easier to apply than many of the more watery toners out there. It feels very nourishing and soothing, and definitely adds a nice layer of lightweight hydration. I would repurchase this one!

I've used this toner for 2 years and I recommend this to everyone! It's the first step of my daily morning and night routine because it preps my skin SO well before I apply other products. It leaves my skin feeling so hydrated and clean. I'm always reordering this!!

I have sensitive skin, but it still held up for this toner. However, I did stop using this product over time in an effort to reduce my use of products with fragrance. On the bright side, there is a new toner in this line that is fragrance free so give that a go if you had a similar worry like myself.
I love this toner. It smells great and really preps my skin for my serums and essences.

I am 24 with dry/sensitive. I have purchased multiple bottles of this toner. It is one of the most hydrating toners I have used. It doesn't take much product to get the entire face. It absorbs quickly as well. It is a great base to start layering hydration. I will continue to use this is my daily routine. I will say though it doesn't seem to get any left over oil/dirt off the face, so make sure you cleanse your face well.

I love this serum, I have oily skin and this give me a wonderful glow from within, without the greasy feeling. I follow it with a gel moisturizer and it makes my skin look so hydrated and looks like glass skin
Love it! Got it once getting it again it is a little sticky but other than that it’s great!

For me this did not make me glow. It leaves my skin the same as it is pretty dull. I have broken blood vessels on one of my cheeks and sensitive skin, and it actually makes the other cheek more red. So unfortunately this isn't really good for me. I use it at night only now, hoping it gives me more moisture if anything.
I have a sensitive skin and this is the only new product I incorporated in my skin care regime. My skin started have severe rash after 4 days of using the product
and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

Been using this serum for a couple of weeks and it has made a great difference in the appearance of my skin. I have notice a slight difference with some spots that I have. I notice that there are becoming less visible.
One of my faves! I buy this religiously every couple of months when I am almost out. It is one of the most benefits I’ve seen to my skin. I love the glow and just love it.

I got this first as a sample and used it when I was struggling with winter dryness on a new level this year. My skin would not stop flaking and was breaking out in other places. This helped calm my skin immediately. My cushion foundation also goes on smoothly when I’ve got this on. I used this after exfoliating and layered another overnight repair moisturizer over it and the next morning my skin was smooth and calm!
I liked the product but the packaging is what is keeping me from repurchasing. The container is made of some type of metal and it's impossible to get the rest of the product out.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Tea Tree Essential Blemish Control Sheet Mask
review: Love these sheet masks! Has helped my inflamed acne and noticed my skin a little plumper. Will continue buying.

productName: On Tea Tree Essential Blemish Control Sheet Mask
review: These are my favorite ! Great for sensitive skin and gentle to use.

productName: On Tea Tree Essential Blemish Control Sheet Mask
review: I purchased these at a time when my cystic acne was most inflamed. I paired them with calming products and the difference was so amazing I cried because of the relief. Using them twice a week with pimple patches and a good routine made a huge difference. The tea tree is not too strong to dry out my naturally dry skin. Whenever I have flare ups and I don’t have these on hand I wish I do!

productName: On Tea Tree Essential Blemish Control Sheet Mask
review: I always had redness around the cheek area and sometimes it irritates my skin, I always put on this mask for like twice-3x a week and it helps relieve the irritation and reduce my redness a bit.

productName: On Tea Tree Essential Blemish Control Sheet Mask
review: I really like these. I feel they help with my breakouts and redness. I would have to wash my face after if I wanted to put on makeup, though.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Purifying
review: I love the texture, very smooth and soft. I’ve noticed improvements with my skins texture and I feel like it helps my cleanser work better.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Purifying
review: i love love love this stuff!!! if i run out, my face just doesn’t feel like it’s getting as thoroughly cleaned!!

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Purifying
review: I love this balm. It clears off all my makeup and has a pleasant smell.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Purifying
review: I’ve repurchased this probably more than any other skincare item. I always try others but this is the best for my extremely sensitive, acne-prone, somewhat oily skin. Nothing irritating , drying, or comedogenic in it. Very soothing and elegant formula. My only complaint is that I prefer the convenience and hygiene of oil and pump formulas over balms.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Purifying
review: I like this cleansing balm. I gave four out of five because there are some that are better, although I do wear a full face of makeup almost every day and sunscreen and work in a dirty warehouse so I need something powerful. This one does a good job and it rinses away nicely.

This gel cleanser really gets my skin clean in the morning without leaving me feeling like my skin is tight and stripped of moisture. You can smell the tea tree in it but I find that invigorating in the morning.

This gel cleanser is great! A dot-sized goes a long way and cleans the face nicely. The smell is also a nice touch and makes me feel like my face is being medicated (if that makes sense). Buy, buy, buy!
Leaves a Soft and supple feeling. Gorgeous. Like it a lot.
Did not itch smells so good 🤍🤍
Love the tea tree oil. Smells very fresh. Leaves skin clean but not drying. Fun to use. Bubble , bubble, foils all the grime and oil.
Doesn’t leave my sensitive skin feeling tight, and you don’t need to use a whole lot for it to cover your entire face
Purchased this cleanser as part of my double cleanse routine because it's specifically for oily skin. Really easy to use. Works well on my skin. Good value as well.
Second time I’ve bought this- my favourite first step for my nightly routine
Very nice but I do not enjoy the oily feeling left on my skin after I use this. It makes me feel like my moisturizer isn’t sitting on my skin but on a layer of oil.
i use this before using a New Leaf cleanser, and it doesn't make my skin feel stripped at off. it does a good job of cleaning my face. i use this every night and day!

productName: On N.M.F Intensive Hydrating Sheet Mask
review: This sheet mask does one thing and it does it well - it moisturizes my skin so well.

productName: On N.M.F Intensive Hydrating Sheet Mask
review: It has a lot of serum, the sheet is thick and after using the mask I don't feel the need to use moisturizer after. Such a great find for dry skin made drier with desert climate.

productName: On N.M.F Intensive Hydrating Sheet Mask
review: This mask is great for re-hydrating your skin after a long day! I left it on for 10-minutes and my face still had a lot of excess essence I was able to pay into my skin. Can’t wait for the next spa day! So I can use this again.

productName: On N.M.F Intensive Hydrating Sheet Mask
review: Amazing face masks, leaves my skin softer, gives it a glow, smooth, and plump!

I had been looking for a good spray to refresh my face throughout the day for a while. I had tried another spray that didn’t feel like it added moisture. This spray feels amazing. I use it as a finishing spray after makeup. Will definitely be purchasing again, maybe even a bottle to keep at work. I LOVE how it makes my face feel. Cooling and a touch of moisture
I absolutely love this spray serum! It applies wonderfully and I like the spray when I’m in a hurry for some extra hydration.

I bought this to keep in my gym bag. After I work out I sit in the Duane for about 30 minutes. My skin gets dry and tight before it gets sweaty. So I spray this generously and it keeps me soft smooth and moist in that dry heat
I use this when I'm on the go. A few sprays under 1 minute and I'm all set! Keeps my face moisturize. I also use it before and after my makeup.
I have fun when I use this product. It helps regain that moisture quickly and leaves a refreshing feeling.

productName: On Bio-Peel Gauze Peeling Green Tea
review: I have sensitive skin that is a combination of oily and dry. The bio peel gauze is lightweight, smells great, and gently cleans and exfoliates the skin. I’ve been using the product for a few weeks now and I can tell a change in my skin. It’s fresh and moisturized

productName: On Bio-Peel Gauze Peeling Green Tea
review: I've tried other "flavors" of this Bio-peel gauze, and the Green Tea specifically works so well with my skin! I don't exfoliate too often, but when I feel my skin starting to break out, I use this gauze and the next morning my skin is back to normal! Typically, I end up using this anywhere from once biweekly up to once a month! Easy to use, stores well, and works amazingly!

productName: On Bio-Peel Gauze Peeling Green Tea
review: Great scrubbing pad, Feels nice and gets all of my dead skin off. It is a bit rough so sensitive skin types might want to use less frequently. Very smooth skin though!

productName: On Bio-Peel Gauze Peeling Green Tea
review: I’ve been using this product since several months now , once a week, and I really like it ‘ it exfoliâtes my skin gently and let it soft and fresh. I recommend

productName: On Bio-Peel Gauze Peeling Green Tea
review: I use these once a week and feel like they really help keep my skin breakout free. They don’t feel too abrasive or harsh. This is a staple for sure.
This barrier intensive cream works wonderfully on my skin and also at this price point perfect for slathering on. Have already repurchased several times!
Usually my skin reacts badly to any new moisturizer I try, this one didn’t burn me at all and left my skin feeling hydrated for hours after I used it

Love the twist top closure of the tube. Handy, clean, prevents leaks. The cream itself is fantastic. Hydrates my skin and gives it a glow. It's exactly what my face needed for winter dryness. Bought some for my mom and she's now a major fan too.
Made my eczema flare up on my cheek and gave me a rash on my neck :/ really bummed because of all the positive reviews. Feels nice going on and has a good consistency though
I use this most nights and my skin barrier seems much happier than with other products I've tried
Great at hydrating irritated/sensitive skin.
Great product. Wish it was slightly more hydrating but I just apply a hydrating serum before using the cream.

I continue to buy this cream. For me. For my friends. Anyone honestly. Not only does it do wonders for my face. And doesn’t have a scent (I have very sensitive skin). It’s just amazing. My face gets extremely dried out. I’m the chick who tries to be consistent but ya. I get depressed. & skip the self care. I go out and fall asleep with my makeup on. And when it gets real bad. I cleanse my face, use toner and then put this on before bed.. my face feels so much better the next day. No dry patches that show in my makeup. I have bought this for two of my girlfriends. One of them went to Hawaii got super sunburnt. Nothing worked so she put this cream on her thigh just to see if it would help. Next morning the burn was gone. Overall?! This is a staple. And my friends love it. My favorite night cream by far
Very hydrating, very light feeling on your face, and not sticky feeling after application. The texture is kind of jelly like and the color is pretty

This is part of my core essential routine year round! Great to use alone in the summer, and great to use under a thicker moisturizer during the winter months. I've never had any reaction to this, it's very lightweight and relatively affordable. I'll always make sure to have a back up on hand!
This is been my go-to moisturizer for years now! It's super hydrating without being too thick.

I have had acne prone skin and scarring for years. This is better than anything my derm has ever given me! It came in my allure beauty box and now I’m hooked. I use it in the morning and before bed. Especially great after exfoliations. Keep it in the fridge! I am buying more because I’m worried it’s going to go viral on TikTok

I purchased mostly for my daughter who struggles with acne. I can tell that this gel does his work in soothing skin, elimination of red spots and irritated skin. I even applied to my hair just a pea size but it didn't work well.
The only thing I liked about this product was how soothing and cooling it felt once applied to skin. I was not a fan of the sticky and tacky feeling it left behind.

productName: On A-Thera Tea Tree Peeling Sticks
review: If you ever get breakouts these are a must-have! I use them once a week and they clear up any spots right away. They don’t feel harsh and leave my skin looking great.

productName: On A-Thera Tea Tree Peeling Sticks
review: Let me tell you I had the clearest skin using these peeling sticks, add a good moisturizer and spf and you got a great combo here.

productName: On A-Thera Tea Tree Peeling Sticks
review: Read these were great to use with the cleanser for those struggling with hormonal acne. I haven’t seen much difference yet but maybe it’s too soon to tell. Hoping month 2 will show more progress.

productName: On Waterfall Moist Balanced Hyaluronic Acid 100
review: I notice all this does once I run out! Moisturizing and helps control breakouts

productName: On Waterfall Moist Balanced Hyaluronic Acid 100
review: I buy again over and over, when I run out my skin is dry and breaking out.

productName: On Waterfall Moist Balanced Hyaluronic Acid 100
review: I was excited to try this product. I love that this product is vegan and doesn't have harsh ingredients. I finished the bottle, but that's easy to do since there's not much product inside. I was very happy so say it did not irritate my skin but it left an unpleasant sticky film over my skin. I tried lots of different ways of using this product but it just didn't absorb the way I would have liked it to. It may work for you but this one isn't for me and I didn't feel like it was worth the price.

productName: On Freshly Juiced Vitamin E Mask
review: I put this on my face and can practically immediately see a difference in my skin. It's so much brighter and calmer and healthier. It helps heal my acne but also the spots where I've scratched at my acne and created scabs also heal dramatically more quickly thanks to this mask. I use it once a day, every night, for about three or four weeks now, and it's a holy grail for me. My skin is very dry with rosacea and sensitive, and I plan to order more when this jar runs out.

productName: On Freshly Juiced Vitamin E Mask
review: I have been using this cream for a year I have rosacea and this cream helped me completely my skin looks very good with a uniform color I do not have any rosacea I would not change this cream for anything

productName: On Freshly Juiced Vitamin E Mask
review: This was product is nice and hydrating. Didn’t cause irritation or rednesses. I have normal and acne prone skin. The reason why I took stars off is because it is absolutely ruined by the packaging. The shimmering design on the front rubbed off and into my fingers from me opening the jar and (not realizing this) used those same fingers to rub the product into my face. This is the last step in my routine before turning off my light and going to bed so I didn’t notice the flaked off packaging sitting on my skin until several weeks later. This may seem dramatic but thinking about these flakes sitting on my skin all night multiple times makes me super uncomfortable and disgusted. I am going to rip the label off immediately when I repurchase.

productName: On Freshly Juiced Vitamin E Mask
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
This really works! Just don't like how bulky the packaging is. They come in lil capsules each for reference

After constantly debating whether or not to get this I finally did for those days I receive a cystic pimple and I will say it wasn’t as fast acting as a regular pimple patch. In two patches (2 nights/1 a night) my pimple dramatically decreased. I am quite pleased with it!

5 stars because it works (although I would probably subtract a star if I accounted for the price). This is too expensive for smaller acne/white heads. COSRX is good for those. This one though, is great for cystic acne/those stubborn pimples buried deep down that regular, less expensive hydrocolloid patches can't get through.

This.absolutely.works. I was pretty skeptical initially because nothing ever works on my cystic acne, ever. Unless I go to the derm for a cortisone injection. But after 2 patches, it drew the xxx cyst to the surface and turn into a head. I am super impressed that the product actually works for cystic acne. Finally!!!!! Though it is pretty expensive ($19.90 for 6 patches, 6 swabs). My cyst did not go away totally though. Definitely buy.
I’ve tried so many patches and this one really helps with those deep zits. Very happy!

productName: On Sun Project Light Sun Essence
review: This sunscreen feels lovely. It leaves no residue, feels light and airy, and smells only barely.

productName: On Sun Project Light Sun Essence
review: I have purchased this now 3 times and recommend it fully to everyone! I really love it and it feels excellent on my skin.

productName: On Sun Project Light Sun Essence
review: Was in search for a light-weight, moisturizing sunscreen that doesn’t leave a white-cast or break me out. I found that with this product! I recommend it to anyone and it’s become a staple in my routine.

productName: On Sun Project Light Sun Essence
review: This sunscreen is super light since it's an essence. I prefer something thicker but this will do the trick if you're looking for something lighter.

This toner may look basic and boring but I will say if you want a simple toner with no frills, then this is it. It is basically like water on my skin but has soothing ingredients like panthenol, centella, and green tea. Great for those with a weak skin barrier. I do not suffer from a broken skin barrier so this toner is not for me but it is still good nonetheless.
My skin gets very dry in the winter and this is one of my staple products. I use 2 to 3 layers and that's enough for my skin to feel soft, supple and hydrated.
this toner is very relaxing and soothing. I often have breakouts and allergic reactions to many products but I've never had any issues with this product in fact it has helped significantly!
This product is so reliable. The Panthenol in here is formulated well and really keeps my skin calm and soothed during the weather changes.

I was recommended this to reduce redness for normal skin but it just made me feel hot and my redness worsened over more uses. It won’t go away even after cooling methods. I got the cleanser of the same line and tried it without this toner and my redness didn’t appear. Total placebo

This serum is just ok. It doesn't do much to my skin, especially in the winter. It almost feels like applying water on my skin and that is about it. I loved the Rich Moist Soothing Cream and thought the serum would be great too but unfortunately, it is a let down.
We are sorry to hear that about your Rich Moist Soothing Serum. Please reach out to us via email at
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

I bought the full size of this because I loved a sample I had gotten of it. It had felt super smooth and hydrating but when I got the full size it just didn't feel the same. It also had a different smell, like the plastic that pool inflatables are made of. The smell doesn't really bother me and I still like the serum overall, but it would've been 5 stars for me if it was the same as the sample I tried.

productName: On Supple Preparation Unscented Facial Toner
review: I've NEVER used a toner with this consistency before! I wish all toners were thick like this. A little goes a long way and I'm pretty committed to making this my go-to. Plumps and preps the face amazingly. Make sure to wait 2-3 minutes after applying it since it is thick and wet. Foaming is normal but if you pat it in after minimally rubbing it in, it'll subside.

productName: On Supple Preparation Unscented Facial Toner
review: it foams up a lot.

productName: On Supple Preparation Unscented Facial Toner
review: I have to fan my face to dry it off before continuing to the next step or else it'll foam up like soap and not fully absorbs into the skin

productName: On On The Bright Side Moisturizer
review: I love this moisturizer, it isn’t heavy but you know it’s working. My skin is thoroughly moisturized and appears dewy. A single application lasts all day and I never feel oily or clogged. I have sensitive, combination skin and have had no issues or adverse reactions.

productName: On On The Bright Side Moisturizer
review: the product works great but I had a hard time knowing how much product was even left in it. I'll probably buy it again because it's the best moisturizer my partner has used in terms of results. However, I'll use something else due to the annoying packaging.

productName: On On The Bright Side Moisturizer
review: The product itself is great! I've used this for over a year now. I liked the older packaging, which was more like a squeeze tube. They recently created new packaging for it, which now seems to have way less within it, but somehow looks like there's way more than before.

productName: On On The Bright Side Moisturizer
review: I do not like the packaging -- the pump only lets out very little at a time (which would be great for longevity), but if you use it on a daily basis, you'll probably run out quickly.
I like the pigment and the packaging is so cute, but I noticed my lips did feel quite dry after using this. I’d recommend using a different lip balm before using this, and adding this on top.

Whenever I"m rushing for work or to go out with friends, I just swipe some of this on and it makes it look more awake and like I actually did my makeup. Long lasting and not sticky at all. My absolute fave!
I have the angry red bunny and wish I could have gotten the pink one before it was discontinued! These give you the perfect wash of color and stay on for a long time. Plus, they're really cute!
Love a slight touch of color even though I’m a dude and makes my lips look uber soft

Got the color juicy red - it gives a really nice subtle color. It looks natural and it's moisturizing. It is not long lasting and will easily wipe off with a napkin so reapplying is a must. But, for the price it's worth it. It's an affordable tinted lip balm that is worth the try.

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Intensive Eye Cream
review: i haven’t seen any immediate drastic changes (2 week usage) but i like the texture it’s more of a cream than eye cream yet does not feel heavy for the area. i don’t have any complaints but not in a place to rave about it

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Intensive Eye Cream
review: I noticed that my dark circles really haven’t gotten any better, but I haven’t found an eye cream that has done that for me yet. It definitely soothes the skin and reduces puffiness!

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Intensive Eye Cream
review: This goes on super light and immediately makes the space around your eyes very bright and glowing. I like to use this before I apply a retinol or bha in surrounding areas for extra protection and it really helps. A little goes a long way and it actually makes your eye areas feel super light and almost airy. It's a must-have.

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Intensive Eye Cream
review: This is definitely my favorite eye cream. Goes on smoothly and is light but really does what it advertises! It’s moisturizing but the caffeine in it really does reduce swelling. I like to dab a little on my upper lids too just to help get red off the puffiness in the morning. Just be careful not to get in your eye- definitely stings! This is totally a holy grail though- I’ve put my sisters into it too!!

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Intensive Eye Cream
review: After using this several times, I can't say that it is particularly hydrating, however, it seals in other moisturizing products well. Texture is lovely.
I have been using these product for ages. It's really work.
Really enjoyed these and feel they’re totally worth the money. One of my first sheet mask packs had a hydrogel mask and now I’m addicted to those!
I bought this as a gift set, but definitely kept some for myself. Great face masks for the price!
Me and my friend have been using this mask set and let me tell you it’s definitely worth the money
Such a great value to put in stocking for a skincare lover!

productName: On Revive Serum: Ginseng + Snail Mucin
review: I love using this serum when my skin is stressed out or in need of some extra care. I have very sensitive / occasionally stressed out skin, and I find this serum really does help soothe and moisturize my skin!

productName: On Revive Serum: Ginseng + Snail Mucin
review: I was really hoping this brand and product would do wonders but it fell short. I'm not sure if it's a combination of what I'm using but I'll have to give it another try in a months time.

productName: On Revive Serum: Ginseng + Snail Mucin
review: I'm totally sold on Beauty of Joseon at this point. I have bought this product twice, along with the Ginseng Water Essence. What an amazing pair they make together! My skin glows, looks great, feels soft and plump. I haven't had any unusual breakouts using this product, it goes on easy and absorbs fast! I honestly haven't been this attached to a serum before.

productName: On Revive Serum: Ginseng + Snail Mucin
review: Wished this came in a larger bottle because I like it so I’ll have to repurchase often.

productName: On Revive Serum: Ginseng + Snail Mucin
review: This product has got me sold on the Beauty of Joseon products. It's so soothing, especially after long days, and it has both ginseng and snail mucin, which are natural products great for the skin! I definitely will get this again!

productName: On A New Leaf Cream Cleanser
review: I have oily skin and despite being for dry/sensitive skin this really does a good job of cleaning my face without drying it out. It’s very non irritating and I’d recommend it as a generally safe buy

productName: On A New Leaf Cream Cleanser
review: Sadly this face wash doesn't works for me. It dries my skin out and will starts to flake and look red. There is a lot of product left over so I'm using it as a body wash and like it so far. I'm giving this a 3 star because I love the texture and all the ingredients used in the product but it's just not for me.

productName: On A New Leaf Cream Cleanser
review: We are so sorry to hear this cleanser did not work out for you. Please reach out to us via e-mail with your order number and we'll be happy to get you all sorted!
I liked this toner- I found it hydrating and a bit soothing. I just never really reached for it, and ended up giving it away after a few uses.

absolutely worth every penny!!! i have sensitive/acne prone skin so experimenting with different toners can be scary for me! i have absolutely no regrets with this toner! this helped control my redness and kept my oil production in check!! it does only have a subtle scent to it so it shouldn’t bother you if you’re sensitive to that :)
I love all the ingredients and smells very pleasant, but I don't think it's a necessity to have in your skincare routine.

I love this toner. I bought it originally at the beginning of this year and have repurchased this for a second time. It suits my normal skin type very well! There is a slight scent but I find it nice and it calms my skin well.
Super awesome hydrating toner that really evened out my skin tone. will definitely buy again
Great but price is high. Packaging looks amazing
Love, love, love this for my hair. The best hair oil I've ever used. I have short hair, so one bottle can last me a whole year. Worth it, even at the price.
Not too greasy and gives shine and a silky texture to my hair. The scent isn’t too strong and it keeps my hair moisturized throughout the day.

I have tried many hair oils, and I can confidently say that I will NEVER be without this product again. The scent is lovely. The shine is incredible. This multipurpose oil tames frizz when I wear my hair in its natural curls, and it can also smooth and extend the life of a blowout. Holy grail.

I've tried other hair oils (to save money) but I keep coming back to this one. It lasts a while and maintains my hair better than anything else I've tried. My hair is quick to both take in and lose moisture, so I moisturize and then seal it all in with this oil. It doesn't leave my hair looking greasy whether applied damp or dry. The scent is pleasant and dissipates quickly.

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skincare Routine Set (Combination Skin Type)
review: Thanks for this $200 bundle deal, I was able to really get involved in my own skincare routine and actually have a point to start at. Everything in this bundle helped even out my skin. I gave me things I needed repair in and also gentle ingredients to start you off with. All in all its a great way to start in the skin care journey.

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skincare Routine Set (Combination Skin Type)
review: my package was supposed to be delivered on the 31st of March and i got it 10 days after it shipped!! It was such a nice surprise as was the two freebies i got in my package! my skin already feels and looks better and i am so happy i decided to go through sokoglam!!!

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skincare Routine Set (Combination Skin Type)
review: I've bought skincare from SokoGlam since 2016, I love their products. I typically buy oily skincare sets. This time I decided to try a combo skin set because not all of my face is oily, and some spots are sensitive/prone to redness. This set it great EXCEPT for the toner. It feels like acid on my skin. I've only used it twice. I don't blame SokoGlam for this, but I would like a recommendation to a different toner that could work with this set considering I spent over $200. So, if you have sensitive skin, or skin that just isn't tough, this toner will take you out!

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skincare Routine Set (Combination Skin Type)
review: I've bough the 10 steps skin care in this online shop 2/ 3 years ago and it works like magic. That's why i want to buy it again. But after i got the sets now the toner is not good for a people with sensitive skin. Whole of my face is red after the 4th days.

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skincare Routine Set (Combination Skin Type)
review: I wouldn't reccomend to buy this sets if you have sensitive skins like mind. The rest is fine just the toner doesn't work with me.
Really loved this toner. New to k beatuy but it’s my new go to

I purchased this on a whim and thought I would give it a go. I've been using it over the last few months and have definitely noticed a difference. The redness that I normally have due to rosacea is not there anymore, my skin is noticeably brighter, and it is definitely more hydrated. I would highly recommend this to anyone wanting to try it. It's now being added to my rotation permanently.

I never really liked water essences, but this one changed my mind. I only need 3 drops in the palm of my hand and can easily pat it on without half the liquid dripping away on me. I've bought this twice now I like it so much. I pair it with the Ginseng Snail Serum. My skin looks and feels amazing. It hasn't caused any breakouts. Absorbs quickly. Definitely makes your face feel moisturized even before using moisturizer!
I heard good things about beauty of Joseon products. And so far so good.
Love it!

I’m always on the look-out for my next go-to moisturizer, and this one will never leave my collection! You really can’t go wrong with this moisturizer. You can feel the hydration and it working as soon as you apply it, but its not heavy. Would definitely recommend!

I'm only a few weeks with this cream and have been using it as a day moisturizer. It smells so good (I know many are averse to fragrance for allergen reasons, but I have very sensitive skin and this seems so be so gentle and not bothersome so far) and is incredibly soothing to apply. It also absorbs well- I put it on after cleansing and toning, and then follow with neogen sunscreen and a ccc cream from CLE. Altogether it gives my skin a dewy and supple look, and helps fight the dry air of New England winter. I recommend for anyone with dry skin who doesn't have to worry about fragrance!

Im on my second tube of this. Very lightly fragranted! It’s a very moisturizing gel/cream that doesn’t make me feel oily. It sinks in very well and just feels lovely! I have sensitive skin and this does not make me break out.
I have dry skin and in the winter my face would flake and get red everywhere. Starting this I can say my skin is no longer those thing but soft.
Goes on smooth and doesn't feel oily or thick. Rich and creamy, doesn't take much to moisturize. Love it!

productName: On Acne + Sebum Controlling Sheet Mask Set
review: RUN, do not WALK, to order these. These are amazing!

productName: On Acne + Sebum Controlling Sheet Mask Set
review: I ordered these simply because of the fact I didn't know what to start with and I do have lots of acne, acne scars, and sebum production, and when I tell you to run, and not walk, to order this set, you run! My face has been clearing up a lot more and my self-confidence is sky rocketing. Just remember that consistency is key as well. Sheet masks alone won't help.

productName: On Acne + Sebum Controlling Sheet Mask Set
review: I prefer to purchase sheet mask variety sets like this one and use one sheet each week. I’ll continue to buy this over and over.

productName: On Acne + Sebum Controlling Sheet Mask Set
review: It has always been fun to order these and try out different masks---I ended up finding the most effective one for me through this set, and ordered it separately (it is the Goodbye Redness Centella Pack). I highly recommend this if you are looking to test out different masks and want a curated set that helps with acne/sebum control!

productName: On Acne + Sebum Controlling Sheet Mask Set
review: Great selection, not just exfoliating masks but calming as well. I love not having to go through and choose what to order!

productName: On Snail Bee Ultimate Hydrogel Eye Patch
review: I have used these for awhile now. I have combination sensitive skin with both eczema and rosacea.

productName: On Snail Bee Ultimate Hydrogel Eye Patch
review: Pros: lots of serum, comes with tweezers (originally it came with a spatula but the tweezers are way easier), lots of masks so you can use it more consistently.

productName: On Snail Bee Ultimate Hydrogel Eye Patch
review: Cons: super slippery so it slides down the face, if you have rosacea then note that I get reactive redness from these but the redness does go away.

I have extremely dry skin and have been trying so many moisturizers. This is the only one that works for me and is extremely good for sensitive skin. Love the light feeling. Absolute best product, have repurchased over and over again

I’ve been using the Soon Jung moisturizer for a few years now but my boyfriend recently tried it and was shocked at how light it was while still moisturizing. He emptied that bottle pretty quickly and I bought him a drugstore brand to replace it but he would not even use it after one try. He is a soko convert now so I stocked up for him. We love this line.

after much trials, and way too many errors, i always come back to this moisturizer. i use it as a day time moisturizer. i have combination skin and it never feels too thick or heavy, it's pretty lightweight and i appreciate the way it easily glides and emuslifies into my skin
Love that it's lightweight and non greasy. It's hard to find something that hydrates my skin and doesn't exacerbate any other issues my skin might be having so I'm glad I found this.
This is incredible for my skin, I have EXTREMELY sensitive skin!!! And I'm so happy I have this, my skin looks and feels great!

productName: On Yuzu Vitamin C Sleep Mask
review: This product singlehandedly makes me want to incorporate an exclusive Saturday Skin regimen. This product hydrates and nourishes my face without the Vitamin C overload that I tend to get from using straight-up serums. Once I finish with the current serum I'm using, it's back to this!!

productName: On Yuzu Vitamin C Sleep Mask
review: My skin has been so dry this winter. This has my skin feeling super soft and refreshed when I wake up.

productName: On Yuzu Vitamin C Sleep Mask
review: My skin: Dry / dull / sensitive.

productName: On Yuzu Vitamin C Sleep Mask
review: Using this mask amplifies my moisturizer and brightens my face. It slightly lessens the sensitivity of my face. My face is softer the next morning and even have a dewy look in the morning which is nice considering I've always had dry skin that needs fortifying. Not sticky either!

love the brush on this liner, it is so controllable, since i like a fine line. However, even though it’s waterproof, it still fades over the course of a few hours, and needs to be re-applied. Unfortunately, I rarely get the opportunity to do that.

this was fine the first few uses, but sooner or later it doesn't come off as completely black. in fact, you can see streak marks where it's drawn on because the product isn't opaque at all. it's also prone to smearing throughout the day, which isn't ideal for those with monolids or asian eyes in general.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare and makeup is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this pen liner did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your preferences:)

productName: On Goodbye Redness Centella Mask Pack
review: I do a mask occasionally at night when my skin feels rough, and can actually see reduced redness the next morning.

productName: On Goodbye Redness Centella Mask Pack
review: I really like these mask as I have rosecea and this mask really helped reduce the redness. It also makes my face really smooth.

productName: On Goodbye Redness Centella Mask Pack
review: Sometimes I have mild eczema and this mask helps soothe my skin.

productName: On Goodbye Redness Centella Mask Pack
review: So my skin has been a little crazy because I stopped using over the counter hydrocortisone cream. And although i’ve been keeping my skin moisturized and vaseline has helped this mask has helped the most. I kept them in the fridge and used one as part of my night routine and my skin is calm and feels amaziiiiiiiiing. Keeping these handy!

productName: On Goodbye Redness Centella Mask Pack
review: Smoothes skin and bumps with only one use.

I really like this cleanser and highly recommend it. The bottle automatically foams the cleanser as you pump it out and one pump on a silicone facial cleansing pad is more than enough even after a long sweaty and oily skin day. The smell is light and pleasing and the foaming very lovely and rich with a wonderfully nice lather. This was the first time I used a foaming facial cleanser and this cleanser has converted me. I can't imagine going back to a regular non-foaming cleaner. Although the bottle is small it lasts forever, one bottle lasted me 4 months, and I ended up appreciating the size of the bottle, it is small so you can take it traveling as well, very convenient! It leaves skin feeling clean without drying and I noticed an improvement in my skin with fewer pimples after 2 weeks of using this cleanser.
Absolutely love this wash! The scent is incredible- smells like eucalyptus without burning your skin at all. Very refreshing! I don’t use the whole pump and my skin feels fresh every time.

So I have been using this cleanser for a couple of months now. I was looking for something that wouldn't excessively dry out my skin after use. This fits the bill. It is gentle and after using it my skin feels great and not dry and tight.
The only thing i wish is it was a little bigger so it could last me longer.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Revitalizing
review: It is nice as a first step cleanser but it does not take the makeup off as well as the original (mainly waterproof mascara) it was a bit harder.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Revitalizing
review: Love the scent. I always double cleanse, never makes my skin feel dry

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Revitalizing
review: I've been using the original for years and got this as a free gift. I think I like this even more! This seems to be better suited for my skin type (dehydrated oily), evening out my oiliness and leaving my skin smooth after cleansing. The product description says it smells like roses, but I think it has more of a tropical scent (almost like banana?).

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Revitalizing
review: I love this product and use it religiously! It really gets deep in my pores and breaks down the dirt and oil on my face from the day. This allows me to use a little less toner after washing my face which is a plus if your toner is pricey. A staple skincare product in my routine!
Definitely one of my favorite cleansers, I end up going back to this after trying other ones. Great for dry/sensitive skin!

I like this cleanser because its gentle, effective and not overly stripping compared to other cleansers. My skin does feel dry after using it so you'll need a very hydrating routine to follow up with. Its great for removing stubborn makeup/residue that my balm cleanser left behind. This may be better in the summer when my skin leans more combo/oily.
I love this cleanser. It is super gentle on my skin and doesn’t leave me feeling like my skin is dried out.
This foaming cleanser is gentle and great for sensitive skin!

One of the best sheet masks I have ever purchased -hands down. Fits comfortably, extremely soothing/hydrating and had a noticeable difference upon using. Good for when your skin is dehydrated or needs a pick me up! Love that there is some leftover essence in the bag, save it!!
I have bought these a couple times now and it continues to be a go to face mask. Refreshing, the scent is just right, and overall what I want for a relaxing spa time at home.

Aside from having super cute packaging, these are perfect for my sensitive skin and feel so nice! I use any left over essence in the packaging on my neck and chest, don’t waste it! Yah they’re a tad pricier than some other masks, but unlike a lot of those these don’t overwhelm me with fragrance or sting my face. And tbh they hydrate my skin enough to make it worth it

I'm obsessed!!! I have tried multiple sheet masks before and only noticed slight changes but with this mask, I can see and have received compliments on my skin after using this mask. The scent isn't strong and the size of the mask is perfect.
It’s lovely. Will incorporate this into my skin care regimen now.

productName: On D.N.A Hydrating Protein Sheet Mask
review: I first tried the Mediheal variety box set of masks. This one I enjoy most for winter dryness. I am alternating these with their tea tree masks (help with redness and acne) so my face is calm and hydrated. Keeps my skills looking flawless. My forehead lines stay away with hydration

productName: On D.N.A Hydrating Protein Sheet Mask
review: These masks definitely do their job well, they leave my skin super hydrated! the fragrance is a little overwhelming for me personally, but it does smell like fresh-out-of-the-shower clean so I’m sure there are others who would love it.

productName: On D.N.A Hydrating Protein Sheet Mask
review: Absolutely adore these masks! I can't give info on long-term results because I just started using them, but I can tell you I understand why they always get such good reviews. When I first opened the mask, I thought they'd leave a sticky after feeling, but not at all. The thick serum absorbs very quickly, and the sheet itself is so soft! I actually even saved a little of the serum to use up later. My skin was so plump and soft! Will definitely continue to use these masks and will purchase more in the future. The price is very reasonable for what you're getting.

productName: On D.N.A Hydrating Protein Sheet Mask
review: My skin is super sensitive and these were perfect, did not irritate my skin at all.

productName: On Sun Project Water Sun Cream
review: I use this sunscreen everyday because it protects my face and is super moisturizing but not oily.

productName: On Sun Project Water Sun Cream
review: This is a great suncream, does on nice and the packaging is cute. I feel it is also hydrating.

productName: On Sun Project Water Sun Cream
review: It has a fragrance and isn't mineral-based only, which I was hoping for, but it goes on smoothly and leaves my skin soft, not tacky or sticky. The fragrance is more of a perfume than the usual sunscreen scents.

productName: On Sun Project Water Sun Cream
review: It applied so nicely and I really loved the texture. Unfortunately it made my skin break out into hives and start to flake off. Probably not for sensitive skin.

I bought this cleanser because I had seen good reviews for oily skin. But after trying it for a couple weeks I found it made me break out more than I would before. At first it didn't make my skin feel too stripped or dry, quite the opposite. It would feel very moisturized and almost oily? But afterwards it would feel like too much oil on my face. So I don't think this cleanser is for me.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
Still too early to tell how it’s affecting my skin but I LOVE the smell and how clean my face feels after using it!

This is my favorite cleanser in the entire world, the first thing I noticed was that it was so CREAMY and who doesn't like a good creamy product and it went on my face nicely, a little goes a long way. The first time I used it, it cleansed my face very well (it is a deep cleanser) and my face felt smoother than it was ever before. It's not drying, its just right. 10/10 will buy again, Also! The smell is a very hotel soap smell, its very light. It reminds me of hotel soap lol

Very gentle and hydrating toner. My skin is usually quite sensitive, but I didn't get any redness after using this product. I will say I didn't notice any long-term benefits nor does this keep me hydrated for a long amount of time.

I absolutely adore this toner. I’m on my third bottle already. It hydrates, brightens and I can definitely see oil reduction on my tzone from it. I’ve tried so many different toners and I keep coming back for this one every time because it’s just that good. Also you get a good amount of product so it’ll last you for a while.
I have eczema prone, sensitive skin so I’m wary about new products. This is amazing. My skin drinks this up! So hydrating and nourishing!
I think it works great! I definitely will be getting this again
This toner makes my skin glow! I love how milky and hydrating it is. I notice a big difference when I skip using this toner.

I was worried how my skin might react to this but it is very hydrating and didn't irritate my sensitive skin! It's not going to reverse age you 10 years (nothing will) but I do feel like my under eyes are brighter and more hydrated. The skin around my eyes gets irritated so easily, but after using the whole tube of this product I feel like the skin around my eyes is stronger than before.
