My eye area can handle more of a beating when it comes to eye makeup and feels a little healthier. This melts into my skin and doesn't leave a sticky film which is a huge plus for me. This is a very good eye cream, it's vegan, and it comes with a lot of product in the tube. A great addition to my daily routine! I would definitely recommend giving it a try if you've had your eye on this!

The ingredients list of this eye cream are top tier which is why I purchased it. I’ve also had friends that are obsessed with this but unfortunately it’s just not for me. I didn’t really enjoy the consistency of it, it irritated my eyes and unfortunately it triggered my milia. Just not for me.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Super Aqua Cell Renew Snail Cleansing Foam
review: This is a great gentle and foaming cleanser that will remove all your makeup!

productName: On Super Aqua Cell Renew Snail Cleansing Foam
review: This cleanser seriously is great. This really helps settle my acne when it’s Hormonal and keeps most big blemishes away when it’s not hormonal acne. The snail stuff I think is what helps. My skin feels soft and to me seems more clear since I’ve started using it. On my third bottle now :).

productName: On Super Aqua Cell Renew Snail Cleansing Foam
review: Smells good and gentle on the skin

productName: On Super Aqua Cell Renew Snail Cleansing Foam
review: Nice foaming cleanser. Feels great on the skin after washed off. Likely will be my go to water based foaming cleanser going forward.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Nourishing
review: It not as good as the pink one but it nice it does melt I your skin and cleanse any makeup but I think the pink is better for my skin

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Nourishing
review: While I don’t see this version different than the others, I enjoy using and it’s great to get makeup off. Good scent and great size that will last awhile, especially if you only use when you wear makeup sporadically like I do :)

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Nourishing
review: This takes off my makeup wonderfully without drying me out even if my skin is already stressed and irritated

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Nourishing
review: I feel like I'm probably in the minority, but this really dried my skin out! I used it from late spring until mid-Aug and found myself having to moisturize like it was mid-winter. Normally, I don't have as many issues with dryness in the summer months. I'm pretty certain that the issue stemmed from this, as it was the only variant/new product in my routine. I used it up, so I feel like I gave it enough time - just wasn't for me! As soon as I moved a different product into the cleansing oil/balm step, my skin was back to normal. It's not awful or anything, just maybe not for every type of dry skin!

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Moisture Cream
review: Love this moisturizer - just wish that there was more product as I go through it so quickly!

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Moisture Cream
review: can’t say enough good things about this moisturizer! at first it seems really heavy when you apply it on your skin, but its actual perfect. it’s hydrating, not greasy or oily, and doesn’t cause my skin to breakout. i use this as my daily moisturizer and my skin has never been better!

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Moisture Cream
review: Using this first thing in the morning, it plumps up the skin well. It looks and feels hydrating. However, throughout the day, it seems to be sitting on top of the skin rather than have soaked in. I had it on for a full day at home without makeup and broke out with tiny white heads everywhere. My skin also felt greasy and it felt like there was a thin layer of the product still sitting on my face. I was hoping for a lightweight hydrating moisturizer, but this unfortunately is not it.

I really loved the way this looked and felt on my skin, although, there was a little more coverage than I usually prefer. I personally cannot use it because I had a reaction where my eyes watered constantly while wearing it, but as soon as I cleansed my face my eyes stop watering. I hope this doesn’t detour anyone from at least trying it.
Surprisingly it matches my skin color which I was little worried about being a brown buying a non-brown geared foundation product. Blends nicely

I was already a lover of the CC cream and the BB did not disappoint. This goes on the skin very smoothly and leaves you with a nice matte finish. Covers just enough to make you feel put together without any cakey-ness.

I have been using tinted moisturizers for years and was so glad to find KBeauty version.. but even better! Really great coverage and does not feel heavy. My only issue is that the Clair colour is still a bit darker than what I would prefer and there are no lighter shades, which is unfortunate. All in all - happy with my purchase!

This is my first time trying a BB cream with a velvet finish. I am more of a light-medium cool skintone and I was worried the light color would be too light for me, but it ended up blending and adjusting nicely. Finish is velvet as described and does a good job with pore blurring. 4 stars because I am still getting used to the finish but everything else is great.
Great value for money, small amount goes a long way

I had tried this oil cleanser several years ago before it was reformulated and liked it, but this new version does not agree with my skin. My skin instantly turned a deep red when I applied and it stayed red for a while after removing it. My skin felt extremely dry and tight. I love Soko Glam though, they have an amazing return policy which allows me to try different products. My skin is very reactive and sensitive these days so it's been hard finding a balance.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I have dry and sensitive skin with a number of allergies (including soy), so I was a little apprehensive when I saw that this had a soy derived ingredient in it - soybean ferment extract - while I know that the allergic reaction is triggered by proteins in soy, I was unsure if the proteins made it through that extraction process, or if they would be in a significant enough dose to trigger a reaction. I'm pleased to say that I have had no troubles! I should note that my allergy is moderate (hives and eczema rather than anaphylactic shock, even to expeller-pressed soybean oil). My face is soft and clean and the balm has no drying effect. I miss the smell of the Commleaf Green balm I had been using before, but this one is doing more for my skin, so it wins. It's also way cheaper!
Light cream for everyday use.

At first, I really enjoyed using this moisturizer. I liked that it felt lightweight, but still hydrated nicely. However, the more I used it, the less I liked it. It just didn't do enough for my skin for me to repurchase. It ended up not being hydrating enough in the end.
This didn't work for my dry and acne-prone skin, I used it every day for 3 weeks and consistently broke out. Too lightweight and did not help to moisturize my skin.
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On Galactomyces Pure Vitamin C Glow Serum
review: I bought this along with the matching toner because one of the main issues with my skin was my uneven skin tone. I had white splotches on my forehead that really bothered me. This set did my skin wonders even though I have trouble with being super consistent with my skincare routine. I don't even see the white splotches anymore and of course, it helped with the rest of my face too! 10/10 totally recommend!

productName: On Galactomyces Pure Vitamin C Glow Serum
review: This serum is my newest purchase, but it didn't give my skin glowing effect like I would like.

productName: On Galactomyces Pure Vitamin C Glow Serum
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Advance Serum
review: Though I like the ingredients in this serum. I find that it is not as effective at reducing my PIH as well as the toner. My niacinamide serum works faster and better than this serum too.

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Advance Serum
review: I've realized that this brand rocks!! Works great with my skin type so I'll be back for more.

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Advance Serum
review: I received this serum in a trial kit for the lunar new year promotion along with the acwell toner and eye cream, and I have to say this product is so wonderful. The toner is refreshing, the serum is light and soft. For reference, I have combination-type skin and my skin has a hard time absorbing products. This product was easy for my skin to absorb and did not make it feel goopy as sometimes happens with other serums and oils. I paired this serum with the acwell toner, eye-cream and the hanskin calming essence, and I think that combination is so wonderful. I definitely want to purchase the full products!

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Advance Serum
review: I’ve actually seen a difference in my skin with this serum. I have acne scars and I kid you not, they were fading and my overall face was brighter and had glow!

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Advance Serum
review: I have been using this product for a few months new along with the matching toner and have been so pleased with how my skin looks and feels. Smoothing and nourishing.

productName: On Fermentation Peptine Eye Care Cream
review: I had high expectations for this but unfortunately it is not nourishing enough. My skin feels dry through the day. I put it in at night and the next morning my skin does not not feel fresh or moist.

productName: On Fermentation Peptine Eye Care Cream
review: I have fairly sensitive combination skin, and this strikes a good balance between anti-aging and moisturizing without being too heavy.

productName: On Fermentation Peptine Eye Care Cream
review: I didn't have major issues with my eyes - no puffiness, no dark circles, only a little bit of fine lines. But with fine lines, I do see improvement after using this for a couple of weeks! I will stick with this and consider this more of a preventative measure so that I can age as well as possible :)

productName: On Fermentation Peptine Eye Care Cream
review: This one just did not work for me. Felt slightly irritating on my eye area skin and some days actually seemed to reduce the look of them some days and on the other days showed no improvement. I don't think there's anything wrong with the product, just a bad match for me.

productName: On Fermentation Peptine Eye Care Cream
review: I'm pretty young, but I have wrinkles and fine lines under my eyes because of bad habits as a child. Before this, I had trouble with almost every eye cream- I just didn't get results with any of them and wasted a lot of money. But this worked! I've been using this for just 2 weeks and my fine lines are already much better.

productName: On Green Pearlsation Tea Tree Care Body Spray
review: I have back acne and I did not notice any difference this product made. It's really light, and leaves no residue on the skin which is nice.... but it wasn't effective. I was better off using snail mucin and moisturizer on my back.

productName: On Green Pearlsation Tea Tree Care Body Spray
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences

productName: On Green Pearlsation Tea Tree Care Body Spray
review: It's hard to know whether this product really made a difference in my skin. What I can say is it smelled good and was refreshing on my skin. It was also more convenient to use than serums or toners would be. It also lasted a long time without losing it's integrity.
Love the smooth texture and how it feels on my skin.
Just bought this moisturizer. A good summer option for sensible acne prone skin

I have been using this product for over 2 years now. It has been a life saver! I use this after toning, essence, and moisturizing in the morning. Once it’s dry, I go about my normal makeup routine. It helps keep my acne away even while wearing makeup, sweating, and being in various environments.
It feels like a cool gel when it comes out, but then turns tacky once it starts to dry; let it sit for a few minutes, and it will soak into your skin.

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water
review: I was looking for a snail essence and this one was highly rated everywhere. I love how soft it's made my skin especially since I use it as my 1st step after cleansing. It reminds me of Nature Republic's skin booster & emulsion, but 1000x better. As a licensed esthetician, I approve!

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water
review: I really like how this makes my skin feel afterwards.

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water
review: I use this morning and evening on a cotton round in lieu of an eye cream (my oily skin can't handle eye creams). It's incredibly hydrating and is doing wonders for keeping ageing at bay. There is fragrance, but it's very subtle and goes away almost immediately. IMO, better than CosRX's similar product. I absolutely love this product and will absolutely continue to repurchase.

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water
review: It smells nice and gives my face a nice glow ✨

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water
review: Idk why snail mucin and my skin just don’t agree ! Tried this one and cosrx and causes major irritation
love this product so far. my skin is very dry and sensitive and so far, my skin has never felt more hydrated and bright than now. i can feel the difference.

I've recently started on a more serious skin regimen and have been using this as a part of it, and I enjoy it a lot! It's definitely noted a difference in skin texture, and has made a huge difference to my skin's condition.

If I could only pick one skin ingredient to use, it would be snail mucin. It is hydrating, and so comforting on my skin. I use it as a moisturizing serum, but it also helps with my skin texture as I am at the lucky age where I am fighting wrinkles AND breakouts. It provides a beautiful glow without getting sticky and layers well with others. I was using a different brand of snail mucin and when I went to restock it was sold out so I got this insead. This one is an even better price and my skin loves it. I use this daily - its very thin so it's suitable under heavier serums and moisturizers. I also love to put this on right after I use an exfoliating mask because it is so soothing and hydrating.
I wouldn’t say this is a fave for me but I do feel it’s kinda hydrating for my skin and it’s not irritating at all so that is nice

I liked this but won’t reorder. Cleaned my skin decently, but I was left feeling so striped after. I have dry patches on my forehead at the end of the day if I use it in the morning. No scent which is nice but not super impressed.
Thanks for your feedback!

Really tried to like this one and give it a chance. Might just be my skin, but this product really broke me out, even after consistently using it for about 4 months. Previous to using this product, i'd occasionally have hormonal break outs, but i was having pimples pretty much all the time with this product (painful too!). I finally just didn't think the break outs were worth it. :/

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
Very moisturizing and good for sensitive skin! I spray it on during the day and it keeps my skin hydrated. Also like the packaging.

productName: On W.H.P Brightening & Hydrating Charcoal Sheet Mask
review: So far I’ve tried 3 of the 5 and I can say afterwards my face is very hydrated. I haven’t noticed an increase in brightness yet but it does mention to wait until skin cell turnover by using 2-3 times a week for 4 weeks. I can’t wait to see the results.

productName: On W.H.P Brightening & Hydrating Charcoal Sheet Mask
review: These mask are great. The material is soft and comfortable. The mask for my face well. Lots of serum. Skin looks bright and glowing after using. Will definitely repurchase.

productName: On W.H.P Brightening & Hydrating Charcoal Sheet Mask
review: If I have time before I head out, I like to use these to prep my skin. They make me a little brighter and provide adequate moisture. I definitely little or no dry spots after a long day, when I usually would have some had I not used this mask.

productName: On W.H.P Brightening & Hydrating Charcoal Sheet Mask
review: I love how my skin feels after using these sheet masks and the feeling would be even better if you put it a little bit in the refrigerator before using.

productName: On Moon Glow Milky Toning Lotion
review: I have very reactive sensitive skin. So far I’ve had no reaction to this & that alone keeps me happy

productName: On Moon Glow Milky Toning Lotion
review: Was very excited to try this product, and it exceeded my expectations! Melts right into the skin and gives an amazingg plump "glow from within" look. Upon using day/night for about 2 weeks, I noticed my skin was a lot smoother and no longer dehydrated. Also love the ingredient list, wish they would make a bigger size!! Would purchase again.

productName: On Moon Glow Milky Toning Lotion
review: Not the product's fault but I'm weird about smells. The texture is nice but I don't notice it does anything different than any other toners I've tried. Middle of the road for me.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Skin
review: works so great for my skin

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Skin
review: great hydration for all skin types and literally overnight helped a breakout i was having . a must

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Skin
review: I’ve loved this product ever since I got it last Christmas. It always feels very lightweight and refreshing on my skin after washing my face.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Skin
review: I recently started changing up my routine this summer. I only tried some cheap drug-store type toner once (returned it) and didn't really "get it." Well, after the skin consult on Soko Glam, they recommended the Snail Bee toner. I have been using it for several months and love it.
I loved that it came as a set and you have options! So you can try different brands and something new for tackling your anti-aging routine.
Nothing new from what is already on the site. Only came with one $6 mask, so it would be cheaper to buy separately. Still good masks though.
got this set for my mom but it came with sheet mask we already had
Worth the purchase. Soko glam does a great job curating the masks.
I had high expectation on this. However, the masks I received do not fee anti-aging for me...three of the 5 masks says "brighting" on the packaging...
I like the smell of this product but it's not quite as hydrating as I'd like it to be. I'll keep trying it out and see if maybe I'm just not using enough.

I love this product! I rarely spend money on products for my hair, but my current hairstyle requires lots of heat/styling and I was looking for a product that would provide some protection and add some shine without making my hair too slippery to style. The smell, texture and results of this product do not disappoint. My hair is noticeably shinier and feels healthier. I went on a trip for a week without it and immediately noticed a difference--my hair looked more dull, felt coarser, and smelled like I had used heat on it without it. My natural hair is thick, straight, and fairly coarse, in case that's helpful.
Smells amazing and leaves my hair super soft. And it doesn't weigh my hair down at all!
I tried the whole bottle. It leaves a heavy or ticker hair feeling. But I does make it straight
Haven't tried it yet

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Dark Circle Eye Cream
review: This product did not do much. Have used it for 4 months and did not observe any changes. The only good thing about it is that it lacks fragrance.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Dark Circle Eye Cream
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Dark Circle Eye Cream
review: This Eye Gel has a Great consistency it glides on beautifully and hydrates wonderfully! I can't speak to the dark under eye changes - as I have just started using it - but hoping this will help!

productName: On Advanced Snail 92 All In One Cream
review: I began using your line for the clean ingredients.. and then I ordered this product.. and lo and behold this cream contains phenoxyethanol…an endocrine disrupter.. so nope it is bad.

productName: On Advanced Snail 92 All In One Cream
review: I’ve started using this with the snail essence and my skin has brightened up

productName: On Advanced Snail 92 All In One Cream
review: I’ve been using this for as long as I can remember and I’ve never, ever stopped. Nothing gives me the hydration and glow that this does. It’s also so lightweight, and is honestly perfect year round. I have extremely sensitive, oily, and acne prone and this has probably been the reason that my skin is so clear now.

productName: On Advanced Snail 92 All In One Cream
review: Love it

productName: On Advanced Snail 92 All In One Cream
review: I dont see any result nor it gives me glass skin. Super drying formula

I read reviews and thought this would be ok on my sensitive skin. It wasn’t. It burned pretty bad. Even without the burning I don”t think I like this product. I bought it because it was supposed to be very moisturizing - It had the opposite effect on me. After just one use it made my skin feel extremely dry. I am just not happy with this product.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
Didn't give me a good reaction on my face so I'm sad about the loss but it's not all bad news. I'm instead using it for my legs and arms and I love it!!
It does work great for acne and my aging, sensitive skin. Propolis also helped on my very irritated skin under the nose after infection. I'm going to repurchase it for sure.
It makes my skin look super hydrated and has no smell whatsoever! A little goes a long way!!!
Loved this product! Great price for awesome quality
Haven't given much time to see a difference but it's feels nice doesn't hurt my skin and I feel Hydrated from it
Propolis is the best ingredient to use in the winter. This formulation is great and a steal at this price. Thicker ampoules have my heart

productName: On Yuzu Vitamin C Bright Eye Cream
review: just starting to incorporate into my routine and really enjoying so far. light, pleasant scent

productName: On Yuzu Vitamin C Bright Eye Cream
review: I really enjoyed this product and would definitely buy it again ! I wish they made bigger versions of it because its so nice and hydrating. You do not need too much product either !

productName: On Yuzu Vitamin C Bright Eye Cream
review: I love this eye cream, its hydrating, goes in smoothly and a little goes a long way.

productName: On Yuzu Vitamin C Bright Eye Cream
review: I purchased this after receiving samples. I wanted to wait a bit before writing a review. I have found a eye cream I will be sticking with! I have tried several eye creams just because you should use a eye cream and never got the results that I do with thus one! It feels good going on, I have definitely noticed a big difference in the lines AND discoloration under my eyes not to mention it soaks in almost immediately . Now I finally see 1st hand what a great eye cream can do! PERFECT for me and I feel confident others will feel the same way!!!

productName: On Yuzu Vitamin C Bright Eye Cream
review: I really enjoy this eye cream. Does a good job maintaining moisture under and around my eyes.
I like the kit overall but not a huge fan of the moisturizer's greasy after-feel.

I liked everything I used in the set and it was a great way to explore different brands and products. I usually don't like sets because products can be a hit or miss but I used everything without any irritation. I have normal skin so can't really expect any improvement. These products have helped maintain my skin nicely.

This is a great product when you are trying to start somewhere, out of all of the products the moisturizer is my favorite. It was lightweight despite its appearance (which I was very wary of at first) and feels so refreshing and gives that dewy look as well as prime moisturization. I've struggled with finding a lightweight good moisturizer but this is a life-changer. I have dry skin mostly and this absolutely saved my face. I like how nothing is very overly scented, I don't like heavily scented skincare products so this was perfect for me! The serum really did help my skin with redness and irritation, especially on my cheeks I notice it clearing up after using a multitude of products that don't work. If you are looking for hydration and dewy skin this is for you!
Falling in love with my skin a little more everyday ❣️

I left a review on each products! This set is great for simple steps. All items really made a difference on my skin. It helped with my breakouts and oils. I have combo skin and this set was perfect! The cleanser and toner were perfect and my favorite out of the bunch!

productName: On Prime Time Refining Toning Essence
review: I always compare cleansing toners to my gold standard, Son & Park Beauty Water. This toner seems to have similar ingredients, but the power is not the same. It smells nice and does a good job of cleansing, but I need to use more than one cotton pad to get everything off. For moisturizing, it does make your skin soft without being sticky.

productName: On Prime Time Refining Toning Essence
review: We're so sorry to hear that this toner didn't work out for you. Please reach out to us at

productName: On Prime Time Refining Toning Essence
review: with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted:)

I absolutely love this toner! It is so effective at cutting down the excess sebum while being mild on my skin. There's no burning or redness at application, just smooth, silky coolness, and it smells so good! The bottle is large, so it will also last a long time. This is my favorite toner ever.
Definitely added something to my routine, but not a huge impact. Overall, good product.
My skin is glowing!! I have struggled for years trying to find products for my oily skin and nothing worked and was too expensive. My skin is rehydrated, smooth and glowing!
I love love this toner. It’s smells great and there is no sticky residue after use! Also has improve the appearance of discoloration and has lighten my freckles 🤗

The product is very refreshing to use, but it’s definitely not as moisturizing as I was expecting. I do think that this product would be great for layering or oily skin, though. But for me, I just didn’t get any results after adding this to my routine.
nice thick-ish consistency, but feels light once it's on my face.. "For better results, use it with every other mugwort products" xD
Also, i think it helps with meshing a couple of products together without the dreaded ~pilling~
I keep coming back to this cream - great texture and soothing.
I love this...it's super hydrating and makes my face feel smooth and firm. I'm taking a star off because I wish there was more product.
This is my all time favorite moisturizer. I’m pretty sure this is my 4th bottle and I haven’t found anything else that compares, especially at this price point.

productName: On Vita Duo Cream Joan Day Joan Night
review: Can’t say enough good things about this day and night moisturizer. I got it while pregnant as a nontoxic way to keep my skin healthy and it was incredible.

productName: On Vita Duo Cream Joan Day Joan Night
review: I've been a diehard Cetaphil user for years but I think this product is even better, really leaving my skin feeling light, tight, and glowing. Very convenient to have the day and night in the same bottle but thoughtfully separated so nothing spills over. I've used it for a few days and I can already feel a real difference in my skin clarity.

productName: On Vita Duo Cream Joan Day Joan Night
review: Love the way this makes my skin feel hydrated and smooth. The night cream tingles a little making me feel like it’s working to heal small blemishes.

productName: On Vita Duo Cream Joan Day Joan Night
review: I bought this a year ago and still have plenty left! You don’t need much. The day cream is nice and light and not grease once absorbed. The night gel is cool and calming, not greasy at all. Both leave my skin feeling soft and refreshed.

productName: On Vita Duo Cream Joan Day Joan Night
review: No words for this. On my 3rd one and absolutely in love with how it makes my skin feel!
I’ve been using this for several weeks and I’m loving it. I have sensitive, dry combo skin. The product is thick and rich but I can wear it morning and night. Also easy on my skin.

After starting to feel really dry during the winter months, I purchased this cream and may never go back. I love the thick, creamy texture and moisture that it gives my skin that lasts all day or night.
Good

This moisturizer is fantastic! I use this during my morning routine as it’s light, has a cooling feeling when first applied, easily spreads, and absorbs quickly. I will for sure repurchase this product and also recommend the ginseng eye cream. The I’m From brand is quickly becoming a favorite of mine!

This is my second rice product from this brand (I also have the rice toner), and I'm a big fan of both. I use this as my last step in my evening routine, and it feels luxurious on my skin, leaving it very soft.

productName: On Glow Deep Serum: Rice + Alpha-Arbutin
review: I've been using this for the past nine months and see a huge difference in my scarring. It feels amazing on my skin and has noticeable helped even out my skin tone and scarring. I have nearly no scarring now. Would definetely reccommend for anyone with acne scars.

productName: On Glow Deep Serum: Rice + Alpha-Arbutin
review: I’m on my third bottle of this and it has become a mainstay of my skincare. The rice bran water is a lovely addition and leaves my skin happy and glowing!

productName: On Glow Deep Serum: Rice + Alpha-Arbutin
review: i love using this serum at NIGHT (alpha arbutin is more stable in the dark). skin is glowy and hydrated and my skin looks brighter. ANOTHER HOLY GRAIL THATS SOLD OUT IM GOING TO CRY

productName: On Glow Deep Serum: Rice + Alpha-Arbutin
review: At first, I liked the product because it absorbed into my skin well but after a couple of weeks use I started noticing tiny bumps on my face and clogged pores. I used this right after my cleanser and followed with a moisturizer. Removed this from my routine and the bumps disappeared. Added it back in and the bumps were also back. It's likely that the arbutin didn't work well with my skin sadly

productName: On I'm Safe For Sensitive Skin
review: I hope they never discontinue this product. It's the ONLY sunscreen that doesn't give me some kind of reaction (red face, break outs, dry tight feeling, too greasy etc). This goes on like NOTHING, it's an invisible feeling. I recommend it to everyone. I never leave reviews, but I want to keep this product around forever!!!

productName: On I'm Safe For Sensitive Skin
review: I'm a dark-skinned Black woman and I thought this sunscreen would be a safe bet (and not leave a white cast.) Unfortunately, this was a trojan horse scenario. It looks normal to the naked eye but I look casket ready every time my camera turns on.

productName: On I'm Safe For Sensitive Skin
review: with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On I'm Safe For Sensitive Skin
review: This is my favorite sunscreen. It gives me a dewey glow and keeps my skin feeling soothed. I'm pretty senstive to sunscreen - it can cause inflammation - redness, itchiness, and hyperpigmentation - but I've NEVER had an issue with this product. My skin drinks it in like water :) It's not sticky, either. Feels great on my finger and on my face afterwards. Definitely an instant fav!
I truly enjoy this as a makeup remover, but the oily feel left on my skin has me cleanse with a regular cleanser after. I feel like my pores are lighter as a result!

First time using a cleansing balm. Had to watch some videos on how to use it properly. Prior to using this, I used to use the Coconut Oil Cleansing Pads which I loved. After using this cleansing balm, I noticed my skin would become oily later on in the day, I do have oily skin but I hadn't noticed that when I used the Coconut Oil Cleansing Pads. The only change I've made to my routine is this particular oil cleanser so I'm not really sure if it works for my skin type. As a product, it's good and it does what it's supposed to, I just don't think it worked for me.
I’ve never used a cleansing balm before but I’m never going back. It’s so nice and doesn’t dry out my skin
without a second cleanser my face doesn't feel clean enough
If a Dewy look to your skin is what you want - then you NEED this primer!

I've been using this for 8 years now. Works under any brand or as a stand alone. Doesn't matter if its bb, just concealer, cushion compact, or full face foundation. Fantastic product. Great price point and lasts absolute ages before you need a new one.
Doesn't clump up, or crease (as long as you aren't over applying, A little goes a long way) breathes well (which living in central FL is a must), doesn't break me out and zero reactions.

I also love the missha BB. I'm extremely fair (I go between custard and breeze in clinique shades) and the BB boomer and BB pair extremely well together while having a shade that actually suits my skin tone.
They don't slop off but if you are masking you need to still apply a setting spray.
feels so great on my skin!

I’m not sure what exactly in this caused my skin to break out, but it broke me out so bad! Immediately after putting it on my skin burned so bad then had the worst break outs I’ve had in so long. Wanted to love it but it’s a no go for sensitive skin. ::
We're so sorry to hear that this cream didn't work out for you. Please reach out to us at

productName: On Clean It Zero Foam Cleanser
review: I felt like it was a little drying, so be careful for that. Easy, light scent and good if you like a light foaming cleanser.

productName: On Clean It Zero Foam Cleanser
review: To preface I do have dry skin. I loved this cleanser! However, on dryer days or when I used only this cleanser I did experience tightness. On oilier/combo skin types this is probably the ideal cleanser. For dryer skin or sensitive it may be too drying if you’re not using enough hydrating products.

productName: On Clean It Zero Foam Cleanser
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
I will keep using the product, however it does not live up to my current SPF. Feels a little too blah on my skin, was hoping for slightly more hydration
We are so sorry to hear this product did not work out for you. Please reach out to us via e-mail with your order number and we'll be happy to get you all sorted!
Thick and moist but absorbs into my skin in 20 minutes. Ample moisture so I like this sunscreen for the cold winter days but switch to something lighter for the hot balmy days.
This product was extremely hydrating!
It is a wonderful product messy but your feet become so soft
These are really nice to use after a long day and fresh out the shower to de-stress and relax my feet.
Great feet masks. My feet always feel soft and moisturized after use.

I always heard great things about this and just never got around to purchasing it since I always have so many toners/essences. But I’m so glad I bought this and this is definitely something that will stay in my cabinet. It has some viscosity that it is hydrating. But since I have very dry skin I need to do several layers. This helps balance my skin and keep my pores clear. Since we’re still in the colder months it’s not quite hydrating enough to follow up with sunscreen, but I know once it gets warmer and the viscosity it has it should be. Very excited about this product

I purchased the mugwort essence, snail mugwort mucin energy essence, and mugwort cream. I cleansed my face before using all of these products in the order i consecutively listed them as, but I did use toner before applying them. I woke up this morning and my redness and imflamation was reduced by 75% . I’m from products just got a life long customer. My mugwort mask was broken, but their customer service is already sending me a new jar after I emailed them.

although this product did not eradicate the redness I developed during the winter in my cheeks it does soothe my skin. I use this product after toning with my indie lee toner and follow it with an additional essence the snail mucin. Maybe I am not using it with the right products to eradicate the redness? Or perhaps I have not used it for long enough. Regardless I am enjoying how this product feels on my skin and it is certainly non-irritating. A Soko glam representative advised me to purchase this and I think they made a strong recommendation.
My skin always seems to relax and chill out after using this. Will buy again!

This completely changed my skin! I have super sensitive, reactive skin but this product soothed it. I was able to notice a change almost immediately and within a few days the redness and irritation was completely gone. My skin is able to really absorb and retain moisture now. I love it!

I bought two colors, Vintage Red and Midnight Mauve, and I use them everyday. Midnight Mauve is a good pink color, while Vintage Red is pretty orange, like a summer red. They are pretty drying, but they’re perfect under gloss because once they dry down they really don’t budge at all.
I am white (Missha No. 21), with warm undertones if that helps anyone make a call on the colors.

I have almost the whole set of these by now I like them so much, I will say, I do find myself re-applying throughout the day, so if you are looking for something that lasts you all day this isn't it. For me, that doesn't bother me at all. I really like the colors and the way it is so light on my lips. Sometimes I will pair it with a light gloss for a little shine.

I cant tell by the names what color it corresponds to because the names of them aren't listed under the tints, super misleading. I took a chance and bought two and don't like them at all. don't think it stays on as well as i thought it would. pretty disappointed, would not buy again.

productName: On MadeCera Cream Double Essence Toner
review: This Combo Toner leaves my skin Feeling Balanced and Hydrated! and GLOWING!

productName: On MadeCera Cream Double Essence Toner
review: Nice scent, gave me smooth skin, amd removed blackheads. Definitely going to buy again

productName: On MadeCera Cream Double Essence Toner
review: I've been using this for about a year. It is very hydrating and feels good when applied. I have mature skin and feel this is a great choice for someone who needs the extra skin hydration

productName: On MadeCera Cream Double Essence Toner
review: This is a great moisturizing toner. Love the way it smells and feels
I have done 2 sets, this one and the starter set. This set has more steps but feels really great after. Both my face and my hands feel amazing after using this set.

I only give this a 4 as the serum says to use sunscreen SPF 30+ but the kit does not come with it. I would recommend doing this kit with an SPF attached as most over-the-counter sunscreen is pretty terrible and the Thank You Farmer sunscreen is amazing!
I didn't know where to start so I bought this kit and I am glad I did. I plan to buy it again.
The coconut pads are one of the best makeup removing options. Smooth and hydrating plus nice to have a pre soaked cotton pad. Haven’t used most of the other products yet but love that one

I have extremely dry skin, and have to slowly introduce products incase it causes a dry spell or irritation. I have been using this mask specifically for 6 years and every time my skin looks dewy, glowy, and plump after use (even if I use it the night before!). If you have dry skin or just need a good mask that'll give you a boost--this product will not disappoint.
This mask is very reasonable. It fits the face well and plumps the skin.

I have a normal skin type but it is severely dehydrated...this mask did wonders for my skin! it moisturized it to the max and I can honestly say that my skin was amazing and looked so healthy for days!
one of my favorites
This amino moisturizer mask left me dewy, soft & very moisturized. My makeup foundation never looked better!

productName: On Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Cream
review: Great lightweight moisturizer. Great calming effect, but wanted to try something a little more heavier.

productName: On Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Cream
review: Very light cream that leaves your skin feeling clean and hydrated. I use primarily during the day especially if I am outdoors or working out.

productName: On Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Cream
review: Soooo soft it is absurd. Like one of the softer products I’ve ever put on my skin. Feels heavenly and hydrates well.

productName: On Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Cream
review: just the right night cream for summer!

So initial contact, my face loved it but I would wake up with small pimples. I’m not sure if it’s due to the fragrance. It is very moisturizing. I’ve been using it as a body lotion since my face can’t handle it.
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

While my dry skin needs something more rich during fall/winter months, this is my go to for the warmer months. Doesn't irritate my acne prone skin and use specifically to manage breakouts. Texture is a bit watery but aborbs quickly. Little goes a long way with this, doesn't pill, and sunscreen/makeup applies well over it. Have been using for years and so glad it's easier to find/buy now.
I don’t use many products with silicones, I used the entirety of this product and my skin was super soft and I didn’t break out once. This is a great product to use in the winter.

I like this product. I find that my pimple clears up faster when using this product. Only thing is when I apply it to my face and I forget it's there, it sucks being in public fully unaware of pink dots on your face. Lol. One feedback though, the ratio of the pink stuff compared to the clear liquid should be adjusted in my opinion. I always run out of the clear liquid first before the pink stuff and have to toss the whole bottle away since it is too dry to use the pink stuff without the clear liquid.
I purchased this item for my teenage daughters and they absolutely love it!

It helped shrink a couple pimples overnight, but others were unfazed and nothing dried up completely. I have oily slightly sensitive skin so at least it's not causing any problems, but it's not giving miraculous results either. I also have some deep pores usually around my acne and the pink goop gets stuck in there when I'm trying to remove it.
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

I alternate days with differin gel and this glycolic acid treatment. Its much less irritating than other chemical exfoliant treatments I've tried. I use this cream at night and the day after I often notice that my breakouts have been reduced and my skin is smoother. I've had this cream for over 6 months and I'm only half way through the bottle. I don't think its an effective moisturizer on its on and I always follow up with something else. The price is great for the quality of this product and I will be repurchasing.
Really good product but felt a bit harsh for my skin. my skin is dry but quite sensitive

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On pH Balancing Bubble Free Cleansing Gel
review: I love using this cleanser on the days i do not use the Klog Cleanser and i love how i still feel my skin clean, smooth, and Is great for sensitive skin. I love this cleanser and will definitely keep using,

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Pore Clarifying
review: This is the only cleansing balm I buy now. I absolutely love the feel of it and it really does clear out pores.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Pore Clarifying
review: I was recommended this product during a consultation after I said I wanted to start double cleansing with an oil based cleanser and then a water based cleanser, but to be honest, and I might be the problem here, but I honestly don’t feel cleaner at all when I use this. It’s hard to spread on my skin. I’ve tried rubbing it straight on, wetting my hands, wetting my face, putting it on and then wetting my face with the product on, nothing is really working. I think when this runs out I’m going to have to try a different product.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Pore Clarifying
review: and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Pore Clarifying
review: this stuff is great for very gentle exfoliating and for oily skin types. removes my makeup better than a liquid oil cleanser. I use this first followed by a liquid oil cleanser followed by a foaming cleanser and I love it.

productName: On Skin Essentials Activating Treatment Lotion
review: i love it so much I keep repurchasing!

productName: On Skin Essentials Activating Treatment Lotion
review: After i watched freezia youtube channel i bought it right away because her skin condition was very similar ( dehydrated, dry and after cleansing extreme dry etc)

productName: On Skin Essentials Activating Treatment Lotion
review: i have been using this for two weeks and already my skin is very hydrated and absorbing other products i put after the lotion very good. No sticky feeling and absorb very quickly in 1 min.

productName: On Skin Essentials Activating Treatment Lotion
review: Using both morning and evening skincare.

productName: On Safe Sun Fluid AGE 0880 SPF50+ PA++++
review: Great for the price. You get more than some other sunscreens. I do have to make sure to rub it in well so it doesn't leave a white cast though. Has a powdery smell which I like.

productName: On Safe Sun Fluid AGE 0880 SPF50+ PA++++
review: I used these after being sent a free bottle by SOKOGLAM and started using them in this summer. Couldn't recommend it more! I love the bottle and how it's dispensed. There was no white cast for me and I didn't burn at all. It seemed pretty great in the water too! If I had to have a complaint, it would be whenever I came back from the gym I would have a bit of white streaks from sweat, but after rubbing it away, it's not noticeable.

productName: On Safe Sun Fluid AGE 0880 SPF50+ PA++++
review: Gives me a dewy look, and the white cast does blend in with my light medium skin tone.

productName: On Safe Sun Fluid AGE 0880 SPF50+ PA++++
review: Once I rubbed this in thoroughly, the white cast wasn't too bad on my medium-brown skin. The smell reminds me of old lady perfume and it is extremely strong. This alone wouldn't deter me from using it, but my skin is starting to get bumpy and break out after just two days of use :( Sad, because I wanted to love it.

productName: On AC Clear Magic Cica Cream
review: I have always struggled with finding the right moisturizer for my skin. I have sensitive skin and any changes cause pain and breakouts but this moisturizer has saved me from that pain. After using it for the last year, my skin has cleared up and isn't as sensitive when I try new products.

productName: On AC Clear Magic Cica Cream
review: I can't say this is a miracle product, but it's pretty awesome. It works great as a moisturizer for the price point, way better than other moisturizers I tried that were much more expensive. The most important thing is that my skin hasn't reacted to it, and although it hasn't stopped my breakouts entirely (they're due to food sensitivities and hormones), it does a really good job of soothing the inflammation. For dry skin, this wouldn't be a great fit, but if you're oily / combo and acne-prone, definitely try this. If they ever discontinue this product, I'll be super bummed.

productName: On AC Clear Magic Cica Cream
review: I am acne prone, this cica cream really has really helped. Idk how I ever survived without it!

productName: On AC Clear Magic Cica Cream
review: OK! I had this product saved to give it away because I thought would not work for my skin type, but I was wrong. I live in a humid tropical country where our only season is summer so I tend to get acne mainly on my cheeks and chin, this leads to blackheads and blemishes on my face and I have been using this every night for two weeks already and have noticed that my skin is softer and the spots on my face have been disappearing, also the areas where I tend to have more acne have diminished. This cream is really effective! You just have to be patient with it.
Love how it makes my skin feel, I can feel it going to work and cleaning me up!
I really enjoy this product. No stripping and my skin still feels moisturized after washing.
Aside from Banila Co oil cleanser, this is my go-to oil based cleanser. Leaves my skin refreshed and ready for my water based cleanser!

I this oil cleanser lasts a while and I’m about buy my second bottle. It leaves my skin feeling so clean without drying it out at all. It’s also great at removing any makeup left. I would most definitely recommend it to anyone with combination skin
Love this cleanser. It's really gentle for my dry, sensitive skin.

Out of all the pimple patches I have tried these are definitely best to use! They’re invisible, stick very well, are very flexible, and their shape makes it easy to cover any breakout! I highly recommend trying these!
Super convenient. Wish there were more bigger sizes and fewer smaller ones, which can be a hassle to apply.

This product is crazy. I bought it specifically because it says it works on cystic acne, and guess what? It DOES. It usually takes about a day or a day and a half of wearing one before a white head appears on my cystic acne but I’ve had a patch work in as little as half a day. Love these so much I am already on my second pack. Truly a miracle worker!!

I've tried a few American pimple patches like truly and starface because I like the cute designs, and some jumbo patches from Amazon, but none of them pulled as much out of the problem spot as these little guys here! Definitely the most effective I've tried, and they stay put
I like the unique size and shape of these patches. Great for clustered breakouts.

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skin Care Routine Set (Oily Skin Type)
review: I love this skin care line. This is the second line I’ve bought from Soko Glam and I can honestly say that I am extremely pleased with the results. That said there are some cons to this line of products—but not so bad that I wouldn’t buy again.

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skin Care Routine Set (Oily Skin Type)
review: Cons:

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skin Care Routine Set (Oily Skin Type)

productName: On Super Ceramide 100™ Intense Protection Hand Cream
review: I apply this right before I sleep and I never wake up with dry hands, it also has a slight botanical scent which is pleasant.

productName: On Super Ceramide 100™ Intense Protection Hand Cream
review: Very moisturizing and light weight. Drys pretty fast without any sticky feeling. Has a light citrus/herb scent.

productName: On Super Ceramide 100™ Intense Protection Hand Cream
review: This product needs to be sold at every department store all over the world. It's buttery and soft without being icky. The product is also the right size, and I can tell the brand thought of all the details especially because the tip where the product comes out has rounded edges and helps the product apply really nicely. The cream itself is very healing as ceramides are, and the formula is just perfect.

productName: On Super Ceramide 100™ Intense Protection Hand Cream
review: I have sensitive skin and eczema, this is a wonderful hand cream. It is not watery, absorb quickly, doesn't leave much residue, and really repairs skin dried from hand sanitizer use and lots of washing. There is a very mild fragrance. I've purchased it twice now! It's perfect.

productName: On Super Ceramide 100™ Intense Protection Hand Cream
review: Scent doesn't bother me its very light.

I have fine, straight, colored treated, chin length hair. I thought I would try this as a nourishing hair treatment. I shampooed my hair & left it in for 15 min, then rinsed & styled using my regular 2 products. My hair looks incredible! It has more body & texture, which is a total surprise, while being shiny & bouncy, which I definitely was not expecting. Excellent product& I highly recommend it. My only complaint would be the scent is way too strong for my taste, but still a top notch hair treatment.
I found it to be a nice daily leave-in. My hair feels moisturized without being greasy.
I've used up the whole bottle and left it in longer than 15 minutes every time I've used it. Unfortunately, I've just had better luck with just my weekly jojoba hair oiling routine.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Lotion
review: Very moisturizing!!

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Lotion
review: I personally really like this. It's not like most lotions, it's not a cream-like texture. Nevertheless, it's good!

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Lotion
review: I really wanted to like this because I thought the ingredients would work well on my skin and it was fairly cheap but I ended up breaking out and having lots of little bumps all over my skin. I have normal-dry skin and it doesn't take a lot for my skin to break out but something about this moisturizer didn't work well for my skin. I am now struggling with breakouts along my forehead and hairline area with little bumps all over my skin (maybe like clogged pores or something like that? just created more texture that I didn't have before). I followed what people said and only used 1 pump every time I used it but still didn't work.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Lotion
review: I used to use it as my moisturizer for day and night but wanted to experiment on what was causing my breakout so I decided to just use it during the day-- see if using it less would help. When I started doing that, I realized that the breakout started calming down but, obviously, still there since I used it in the morning. I'm now looking for a different moisturizer for the winter time but if you decide to get it just be careful and to test it on your skin slowly!

This mask kinda burned my face but it did hell hydrate my face and soothe the redness on a couple pimples I had. I was planning to give it three stars but since it did hell with readiness bumped it up to four.
If you're going to get a sheet mask, get a Leaders sheet mask. These things are seriously sorcery. Love love love!
I love it!

Every mask from this brand is outstanding and this one makes my top three list. I use a sheet mask daily, and whenever I use this one my skin is glowing the next morning. Don't just buy one because you'll see an immediate difference. Enjoy!
I really like this mask, very soothing!

productName: On Galactomyces Pure Vitamin C Glow Toner
review: I bought this along with the matching serum because one of the main issues with my skin was my uneven skin tone. I had white splotches on my forehead that really bothered me. This set did my skin wonders even though I have trouble with being super consistent with my skincare routine. I don't even see the white splotches anymore and of course, it helped with the rest of my face too! 10/10 totally recommend!

productName: On Galactomyces Pure Vitamin C Glow Toner
review: Vitamin C is one of my favorite ingredients! Love this toner and recommended to my friends.

productName: On Galactomyces Pure Vitamin C Glow Toner
review: Perfect for every types of skin. It’s the best toner i have used till today. Thanks soko glam

productName: On Galactomyces Pure Vitamin C Glow Toner
review: I feel it leaves my skin amazing and radiant! I have a glow to my skin. I love it!
I have dry/sensitive. My skin feels so nice after using this.

I love love this toner so much! I’ve noticed it really helps with my acne and soothes my skin.

Personally, I did not see any visible difference after using this toner. I do have sensitive and reactive skin and it does not bother it in any way and feels nice to put on my face in the morning but nothing wow worthy.
This is the one! Done with all others. Never going back. My skin is thriving because of this. I want mugwort everything!!

productName: On Blueberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: Love this cleanser. I’ve been using the green tea version and decided to switch it up. So glad I tried this one

productName: On Blueberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser

productName: On Blueberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: its a classic. i love this line of cleansers and this one specifically is my favorite. I have very dry skin that is prone to hormonal acne and it never lets me down.

Acne prone skin, ended up damaging skin barrier due to new acne treatment, so needed mask that wouldn't further irritate and attack active acne and blackheads, gentle and effective. Didn't cause any further damage and use it once a week. Washes off easily too!
Loved this mask does dry me out a little, but leaves my skin so smooth
good for exfoliating

THISSSS MASK!!! okay I have combination skin, it gets oily through out the day. I also have sensitive skin but this skin doesn't give me any bad reaction or break me out. It actually makes my skin feel so soft and has brightened my red marks on my cheek from pimples and blackheads i've picked at. (BAD IK LOL) I recomend this mask for anybody who has oily and sensitive skin!

You need this! I have dry combo skin and am hesitant using bentonite because of how stripped it tends to leave my face but this mask didn't. After just one use my blackheads are hardly visible and my skin is super clear. Love it!! Can't wait to keep using it.

One of my favorites, my skin feels so soft after use and it’s really good at clearing the dry skin patches gently without having to scrub or use harsher physical exfoliants. My skin doesn’t feel dried out after use which some others do.
Best one I have ever tried
Decent overall
It’s a gentle exfoliator and I love how my skin feels afterwards.

This peeling gel replaced ExfoliKate in my weekly routine and I think I like it more! Especially at this price point, it does an amazing job and my early 40s skin stays super smooth using it once a week before a sheet mask. Absolutely a winner!

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skin Care Routine Set (Normal Skin Type)
review: All products seem to work good, but the serum and essence leave a sticky or tacky feeling on my face after.

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skin Care Routine Set (Normal Skin Type)
review: Have honestly only used this set so far for three days, but can already see the difference in my skin's overall appearance. Definitely a well curated set for normal skin types!

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skin Care Routine Set (Normal Skin Type)
review: I must admit to slacking on my skincare this past year. So I decided to get back into this month with a designated routine. This set is amazing for those with Normal Skin. I seriously cannot love the oil cleansing pads enough! They are my favorite product in this set. My skin has no reaction to them and just feels amazingly clean afterwards. PRO TIP: Take a page straight out of Charlotte Cho's Book and massage your face at this point before rinsing it off. Literally the reason why it's my favorite step.

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skin Care Routine Set (Normal Skin Type)
review: The Egg-Zyme cleanser is the only product I'm debating on switching out. (Routines are not a one size fits all and I knew going in I might have to swap out a product or two). This cleanser just makes my face feel SQUEAKY clean but a bit too tight. It also has a slight small that some may find irritating on the skin. They clay mask also feels good. If you've tried the Aztec clay mask that was trendy, this has a similar feel.

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skin Care Routine Set (Normal Skin Type)
review: I love the Toner Pads, but I might be biased due to the Vitamin C and its smell. The Essence and Serum are nice -- but might swap them out for another product only to pick one that's targeted for a specific skin concern. And it's hard not to love a good sheet mask but I feel like you can swap for a cute face mask if you want.

productName: On Plant-Rich Antioxidant Pore Cleansing Oil
review: I was looking for a great oil based cleanser to start my double cleansing journey. I love how light and calming this is for the first step of my routine.

productName: On Plant-Rich Antioxidant Pore Cleansing Oil
review: This works amazing!! I love this and I pair it with The Klog soft foaming polish scrub and my skin always feels amazing and looks fantastic! Love love love

productName: On Plant-Rich Antioxidant Pore Cleansing Oil
review: I was in the market for a new face wash and decided to take a chance on this one, and I'm glad I did. Not only is the price point decent, but you also get a good amount in the bottle for what you pay. The pore-cleansing oil feels very silky when you're using it. I tried it two different ways. The first was by taking my makeup off and then washing my face with the cleansing oil. The result was incredible, your face feels silky and smooth, the makeup is cleared from your pores, and you can see how clean your face is, as well as feel it. The second way I cleaned my face was to not remove my makeup first. This way really put the product to the test, but it really works. The pore-cleansing oil makes it look like it melts the makeup off of your face as you're washing it. The results are almost identical. You do get a better cleanse by removing your makeup first. For example, stubborn mascara, things like that. But if you're just too lazy or not feeling well, you can still wash your face with just the cleansing oil, and it will still take it off. You might just have to use an extra pump of the face wash. Personally, I think that's pretty impressive when other face washes I've tried can't even do that.

productName: On Plant-Rich Antioxidant Pore Cleansing Oil
review: An excelent product to wash your face and make it feel soft

productName: On Plant-Rich Antioxidant Pore Cleansing Oil
review: I used to hate the feeling of any oil on my skin so I was skeptical about using this at first. I was surprised how much I love it! It feels refreshing rather than greasy and it leaves my skin smooth and clean.
Perfect for my skin
I enjoy this serum so much. To me, it just feels so luxurious. I use it day and night and it really hydrates my skin. There’s a slight hint of ginseng fragrance but it’s nice.

I saw many great review about this product. However, after finishing the whole bottle I would not consider repurchasing it because I did not see a big difference or improvement on my skin. Great ingredients but not much results.

This was very good for my skin, but it left a tacky residue on my hands for a long time (too much glycerin?). Nonetheless, left my hands soft afterward. I just wished the gloves would be biodegradable!
I got these as a gift after my mother saw me using a set. Going to be part of her Valentine’s gift this year.
My hands are the driest they have ever been. This mask helped so much and there is a definite difference. Thank you !!!!
These masks are the real deal, super moisturizing, and keeps your hands looking great! Great scent!

These are great before bed, I often have trouble sleeping because of dry hands but this really locked moisture in and it’s a relaxing spa routine to keep these gloves on for a half an hour. I put hand lotion on after and it worked well for me.

I will say this product makes my skin feel really nice. I have combination type skin, and typically my skin has a hard time absorbing product. I use this as my nighttime moisturizer since I do feel that it takes longer for this to absorb on my face, however, it still feels very light and not thick at all. With that being said, my only dislike is that it has a slight chemical smell to it that I would prefer if there was no smell at all.

La texture est top ! Très agréable sur la peau, elle pénétre rapidement sans effet gras ni collant. Même pour les peaux mixtes comme la mienne ! La peau est douce et nourrie. Elle est adaptée aux peaux sensibles.
Instant hydration for the days where my skin is dry. Very lightweight and smooth on skin. Definitely will be adding this product to my daily routine.

I wanted to like this product so badly. I love Klairs and the vitamin C serum works well for me so I thought this product would too. I have pretty dry skin and I read mostly good reviews. However, this product hurt my skin!! It was painful and stinging after I put it on, and my skin started breaking out and having a lot more discoloration. I was sad because I love Klairs. I am not sure why it didn't work for me but I hope it does for others.

This is such a nice eye cream. It keeps my under eye skin calm and soothed without being sticky, too heavy, or not heavy enough. It's easy to pat in and absorbs qiucly, stays smooth under makeup. This is a routine repurchase for me.
Didn't notice crazy difference in the fine lines on my undereyes but it was hydrating. Have sensitive skin and it did not irritate my skin.

Light and moisturizing, great for everyday use. But I didn’t notice much of a difference compared to my normal moisturizer. The texture is a little on the light side, but I guess I was wanting something a little thicker and more overtly moisturizing. I still use it, just not the eye cream of my dreams.
J'aime beaucoup ce contour des yeux. La texture pénétre rapidement dans la peau sans effet gras ni collant. Le contour des yeux est hydraté. Il est adapté aux peaux sensibles.

This eye cream has a wonderful texture and absorbed really well into my skin. This is one of the first eye creams I ever tried and I found it to be very hydrating and improved the quality of my skin. It never broke me out or irritated the sensitive skin around my eyes. There's a good amount of product in the tube and it lasted a really long time for me. It has great ingredients and I love that it's vegan and cruelty free. I'm loving Klairs and all of their products I've tried. It is slowly becoming my favorite brand. This is definitely worth repurchasing! I would recommend trying this if you struggle with sensitive skin or are just starting out on your skin care journey!
My skin is so soft after using this
A little drying, but overall good mask.
I feel like it’s working to pores, skin goes after and is not dried out

I've only been able to use this mask twice so far and I have sensitive combination skin for reference (oil on my chin/jaw/hairline but dry forehead and cheeks). I was really excited to use this because I'm going through a flare up of hormonal acne and my pores are looking rough since the summer months are coming up where I live and it's humid. I love the way my skin looks after using this mask, I can't use it everywhere unfortunately because it burns really badly on my cheeks and forehead but the parts I can use it on when it's removed look so flawless. My complexion is even and the acne, while it isn't gone, is certainly dulled down significantly considering a single use. My second time using it I did decide to sleep in it to see if time made a difference and leaving it on overnight on problematic areas was beneficial. I asked a question about the sensitivity on here and support was very quick to get in touch with me and they were extremely kind. I couldn't return the product due to a site error and they helped me find an alternative mask for sensitive skin types, guided me on continuing to use this mask since I did like it's results and even gave me a gift card for the site issue/skin reaction which wasn't necessary but very kind of them.

I urge you to try the product if you have really oily skin because it's working great in my oil spots where breakouts happen. Also, to address other reviews I read: yes there's a decently strong fragrance but I think it's strong simply because it's being applied on your face (near your nose too) and the smell is pretty floral/clean and the mask does cause intense skin tightening but I kind of like my mask to do that so I know it's dry and getting everything out of my skin (it is a clay mask, after all).

productName: On Aloe Real Cool Soothing Gel
review: Ive been using this product with my red-light device thing, and absorbs great! No stickiness at all, with nice cooling effect. Have not tried on sun-kissed skin yet, though

productName: On Aloe Real Cool Soothing Gel
review: Its so affordable and comes with so much product! It is such a great overall product for moisturizing, nourishing, and even reducing burns from the skin. Great product!

productName: On Aloe Real Cool Soothing Gel
review: I buy this every year because let’s face it, this is a must for everyone, especially for warmer months. If you sunbathe, you definitely need to put this on afterwards to keep your skin soft and looking young. I use it all over my body and can be used on the face as well.

productName: On Aloe Real Cool Soothing Gel
review: I use this as a pre-moisturizing step before my regular moisturizer and I've noticed that the combination makes my skin feel just a bit softer than usual. I also love how light is it.

productName: On Aloe Real Cool Soothing Gel
review: i love this. i tried the nature republic version but they have alcohol in it so it leaves my face feeling super dried out, but this one does not do that. it doesn't leave a sticky feeling either. it absorbs into my skin nicely and it's lightweight. i use it a lot during the winter when my face is the most dehydrated. i usually use it after my serum, before my moisturizer.

I am a licensed esthetician. Korean and Japanese skincare never cease to amaze me. This moisturizer can be used on all skin types. It does an impeccable job at keeping hydration from serums and essences locked in for a long period of time. I used it AM and PM and it lasted me a little longer than 2 months.
I bought this as I love the facial scrub from this company and I wanted to try out other moisturizers.
Pros:
- Does not leave a smell

I really like this moisturizer, but it comes in a jar that takes a long time to use up. After awhile, it seems not good to use something you've stuck your fingers into repeatedly, even though I airways use clean hands. I wish they'd use one of those vacuum sealed pump type of dispensers so it will stay pure longer.
So light and soft, my skin just drinks this product in and feels great all day!

This is definitely a water-based product which is good for oily, combo and sensitive skin types. However, don’t expect it to be a deep moisturizer by no means. Better for summer months or perhaps more suitable oily skin types who don’t need a heavy type of cream. It works well without adding any greasiness.

Needed a light but moisturizing lotion. Found it! Not heavy at all. Goes on smooth and my skin feels nice and soft after. I can use it for both my night and morning routines. Night routine I go a little heavier with it. My skin is sometimes sensitive to the texture of products. Not with this one. And don’t forget the neck, chest and back of hands (I include these areas with my toner, essence, serums and creams. Makes a difference!)

I have been using this moisturizer for over a year and bought multiple times. I needed something that was less of a water cream and slightly thicker. It’s super light weight and had cleared my skin after a couple weeks of using it. It’s not fragrant so I see it as a hypoallergenic moisturizer. My skin is sensitive and has broken out with the little of changes. I had attempted a different moisturizer before just for fun and my skin had reacted negatively. Once I returned to this moisturizer I cleared up. This isn’t a fancy moisturizer but the simplicity of it is great and it works.

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cream 12
review: Battling dehydrated skin, this helped so much. Not heavy weight which is also a plus for me.

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cream 12
review: My skin is super dry and this moisturizer works well on my skin!

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cream 12
review: Great basic moisturizer. I like to try new skincare products but this is a staple that I always like going back to, especially when I'm unhappy with my skin. It never irritates my skin and always feels good going on

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cream 12
review: Saved my skin! I cannot go a day without it, it is that good!

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cream 12
review: Winter in Canada is brutal and with my sensitive skin, anything too rich breaks me out. This cream is just perfectly moisturizing, rich enough while having all the right ingredients. It takes me from winter until summer without needing to change. It's easily layered for more moisture and goes on lightly for just that touch of moisture without leading my skin wanting.
Worked for my sensitive skin

These are my go-to treat when I've been lazy and my skin is mad at me or irritated from hormones. It's like an undo button for bad habits and time itself. My tired eyes and chapped lips, creeping wrinkles are erased like literal magic. It leaves my skin with this buttery, silk finish that is stunning. Important night? Definitely doing one of these first. I use facial wash (cosmic dew) then toner (first essence rx) then a little serum (watermelon dew all over) *then* one of these masks. I try to not "wash" it off but just put a little water on my hands, wipe off the excess, then pat/air dry. Then I finish my routine with glow serum and lotion (super ceramide renewal cream). My dry sensitive skin doesn't stand a chance against these healers. (25yrs old)
Yet another soothing and lovely face mask
I love this brand haven't tried a product from them I haven't liked. This mask is perfect for when your skin starts breaking out helps clear it up quicker and didn't upset my already irritated skin
got as a gift it works so amazing

productName: On pH Balancing Watery Cleansing Oil
review: It works well. Doesn't dry out my skin and pairs nicely with the water cleansing gel. If anything, lasts twice as long as a bottle of that.

productName: On pH Balancing Watery Cleansing Oil
review: I really did like it and gets better when my daily skin cleaning

productName: On pH Balancing Watery Cleansing Oil
review: I'm new to double cleansing so before buying anything, I spoke to Lisa, one of their skin experts, and she recommended this product to me along with the cleansing gel. So coming from someone with acne who've tried almost everything before, I'm telling you this cleansing oil and the gel are the best ever. They work wonders on my skin, I definitely recommend!

productName: On pH Balancing Watery Cleansing Oil
review: I have a combinated type of skin. It`s my first time I have tried Acwell product. I will definitely buy it nex time when mine is run out. There is no artificial smells and it is perfectly suits me as I`m allergic to many fragrances and parfumes. The liquid is transparent.

productName: On pH Balancing Watery Cleansing Oil
review: I have adult hormonal acne with mostly oily combination skin. Buying skincare for myself has been tricky. I recently decided to try double washing, so I started using this before my regular face cleanser. My skin has been much less oily, clearer, and more even in tone. My makeup stays on better and for longer, too. I am thrilled and plan on repurchasing it when I need to - you only need a little to use for your whole face, so it'll take me a while to get through this bottle.

I have tried a few products with cica and the same thing happens each time...after using the moisturizer for about a week, my skin gets super irritated and red and sometimes it even burns. This moisturizer was no exception to that. The texture was only ok as well...I am not a fan of the sticky texture, but that is a personal preference.
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

I have acne prone skin that gets very dry in the winter. I find that the skin around my nose and mouth especially, stings when I apply skincare but ever since I started using this moisturizer, I have noticed that my skin is much less sensitive. It never stings my skin so I would highly recommend it for people with sensitive skin!
I usually have normal skin but during the winter months I get pretty dry. I've been using this as a dry cream and it's been great. Non-scented, thick and works well under sunscreen.

Oh my gosh, it definitely does what it says in terms of repairing you skin carrier. I use this pretty much every night and I wake up with very hydrated and plump skin. It is thick but feels cooling and everytime I put it on, I feel like my skin rejoicing. I use retinol and bha so this cream is amazing in protecting my skin and not letting it get dry, sensitive, or irritated. Sometimes if I happen to skin my night routine, I'll use it in the morning and dilute it with some toner which brings it back to life.

I was looking for a moisturizer that was a bit thicker to protect my skin in the upcoming cold months. I used skinRx lab madecera cream last year and it was lovely, but i just couldn’t justify the price again to splurge this year.
