This was recommended by a soko glam team member during a skin concierge conversation so i decided to give it a go. It is just perfect! I’d compare it to be like a mix between skinRx lab’s made cera cream and for anyone that’s familiar, Freck. beauty’s RICH B*TCH moisturizer. It’s thick and dewy but not overly so where I can comfortably wear it during the day without looking greasy, just wonderfully dewy. It may be a bit too much for those with oily skin, or combo skin in the summer time, but personally im very pleased with this for the winter months at least.

This may be my favourite moisturizer yet. My skin has never felt softer and more plump. I live in a harsh climate and have dehydrated skin. Usually nothing touches my dryness, especially in winter. Enter this.

You barely need anything, it spreads so well and soaks in within 5 minutes. I use it when my skin feels tight or before an event when I wear makeup and it just calms and soothes my skin. New favourite!
It feels so soft and hydrating on my face, and a little goes a long way! My new go-to moisturizer for my morning routine!

i use this to slug in the summer—it does a great job of locking in moisture but not being too heavy or clogging like vaseline can be. it's very light and non-sticky while hydrating and soothing very well.
i tried this after using the 2x intensive cream and i prefer this as a moisturizer a lot more. it keeps my skin so freaking hydrated and clear

I use just a dab of this on the red areas around my nose every night and it works wonders to calm my skin and reduce reduce redness. It's particularly helpful on the nights I use a retinoid, but it is also a great compliment to my regular moisturizer.
This creamy but not heavy formula is perfect for my sensitive skin
Very thick, use it when my skin feels extra dry

I really like the serum in this set but I feel like my skin has gotten worse since using this product combo. Specifically, having more breakouts, uneven tone, and dullness. Not sure if it's just the toner (which I've noticed causes more redness on my skin) or some combination of ingredients.
We are sorry to hear that the products didn't work for you. Please reach out to us via email at
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On Sun Project Shimmer Sun Essence
review: My face is sun sensitive and burns so easily. This is amazing because I have never been burnt! It is so light weight so it’s great for layering and smells so clean. The slight shimmer helps my skin appear radiant and healthy. I wear it alone and also use it as part of my skin prep for makeup.

productName: On Sun Project Shimmer Sun Essence
review: I love everything about this magical potion. I am religious about SPF and don’t like to wear anything heavy on my face. As a result, I’m always on the hunt for the perfect BB cream or tinted moisturizer that gives me all of the sun protection and light coverage without suffocating my skin. This fits the bill. It evens out my skin tone without hiding it, and it gives me an absolutely gorgeous (natural) glow. This is the holy grail for me. (Side note: it does have a bit of scent to it which may turn some off. I’m usually fairly sensitive to stuff like that but somehow am not bothered here)

productName: On Sun Project Shimmer Sun Essence
review: I do not really notice the shimmer, so if you are looking for something easily noticeable, this is not it. But it is super hydrating, light, and a little goes a long way with this tube. I have ordered this twice so far and it has worked for me in the spring and summer!

productName: On Sun Project Shimmer Sun Essence
review: I love how light this feels…and the shimmer is really subtle!

productName: On Sun Project Shimmer Sun Essence
review: I’ve been using this sunscreen every day forever now and it’s the best ever, most of the time now I even wear it in place of makeup, because it’s made my skin look so much better that now I don’t need foundation or tinted moisturizer- the sheer glow on this is enough, although it wears incredibly well under makeup. One of the first sunscreens I’ve used that truly agrees with my skin, doesn’t clog my pores or leave a white cast and I feel like it’s just made an overall improvement in my skin

After I started using this shampoo and conditioner, I began to experience major hair loss. Initially, I thought it was from stress, but once I stopped using it, hair loss was extremely less. This was just my own experience. I believe this product is made with sulfates. I would not recommend this product.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I’m sorry that this shampoo did not work for you, and that you experienced hair loss. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences:)
Cleans without drying out your scalp.

I love the cooling sensation this wash gives. It doesn’t feel at all like an exfoliator which I was hoping for a little more of BUT I still really like it. I feel like it gives a deep clean without the squeaky dry feeling afterwards.
Creamy gel cleanser, yet doesn't have the cool sensation as mentioned in the description. Feels like a normal cleanser with no wow factor.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Natural Brightening Velvet Mask (6 pack)
review: I was surprised how this mask works well on my sensitive skin. It did not results to any break out at all. I would recommend this if you have sensitive skin. It’s worth it.

productName: On Natural Brightening Velvet Mask (6 pack)
review: I bought different types of masks on the Black Friday sale and this one was one of the best. My skin looked so hydrated and bright afterward. The quality of the sheet is outstanding also. I will repurchase.

productName: On Natural Brightening Velvet Mask (6 pack)
review: I've been eyeing these for a while but they were out of stock at one point and I was so bummed. Now that I've had a chance to try them, I understand why they were sold out! I love the milky essence and I think my skin tends to get more benefit out of that vs. a clearer/thin essence. the material is really nice. I can't say I've noticed a strong brightening effect but I've really only used one pack so not expecting the world here. Will repurchase!

productName: On Natural Brightening Velvet Mask (6 pack)
review: This is my second time to purchase, and I will probably get more in the future. They leave my skin feeling firmer and very smooth

productName: On Natural Brightening Velvet Mask (6 pack)
review: It literally makes my pores disappear!

I have partially sensitive, dry skin and acne. Most skincare products I use are usually mediocre and have little to no effects on my skin but this product has amazing effects. when I use it at night, I wake up glowing the next day, making me feel like I don't need to moisturize again. overall great to use at least once a week. buying again!!
I absolutely love this product! Each pad contains a lot of product and it worked wonders for my skin. My husband uses it as well and is really enjoying it!
Helps clear up any under the skin acne I'm experiencing without being too harsh on my sensitive skin.

A little pricey for just 20 pads, but it's a really nice treatment. The pads are huge, the size of my palm. And they're dripping w/the essence. I've tried using the essence w/o the pad but find that I get better results when I use both sides of the pad instead of just patting the essence into my skin. Was surprised to see improvements in my skin texture so quickly even though it's super gentle. A really nice treat for my skin.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Exfoliating AHA Treatment
review: Have been using once a week for over 4 months. Exfoliates well but no change to pores yet. Great for maintaining my already soft skin.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Exfoliating AHA Treatment
review: At first. However, The gentle exfoliation you get from this product is magnificent. You do need to stick with consistent usage of 2 to 3 days per week to see the benefits.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Exfoliating AHA Treatment
review: I have been using this AHA treatment for about 2 months and love how gentle it is. I use it once or twice a week as recommended and it leaves my skin smooth without irritation. A little also goes a long way so I expect this bottle will last me a year!

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Exfoliating AHA Treatment
review: Ive been using various a anti-aging toners and i think this is my new fav! My skin looks more even and glowy. It does not irritate my skin.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Exfoliating AHA Treatment
review: Smooths uneven skin texture. Finished my first bottle and realized just how effective this is for my skin while waiting for my second bottle to arrive.

From the innovation of a 2-1, to the eye candy of the amazing ingredients this serum has. Everything about this product made me fall in love. It’s also never too early for anti aging, and I’ve been using this serum every night for about 2 months now. My skin feels so hydrated and a noticeable difference in my complexion. I love that it has lactic acid (AHA) in its formulation, to help exfoliate your skin.
I started using this two weeks ago, and my face has felt both moisturized and looks brighter. This is in a must in my summer routine.
It absorbs quickly and does not just sit on the skin. Just a personal problem, but it is always hard to get an even amount of product from each side.
I’ve been waiting to try this serum since it’s a two in one plus joanday recommended! I love it so far
It's so light weight. A little goes a long way.

productName: On Dear, Klairs Fundamental Ampule Mist
review: I have sensitive eczema prone skin. This burns while I apply it. Unfortunately had to throw away.

productName: On Dear, Klairs Fundamental Ampule Mist
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I’m sorry that this mist did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Dear, Klairs Fundamental Ampule Mist
review: I am so glad I bought this, it is so light but moisturizing. Love using in between my serum and moisturizer.

productName: On Coconut Water Hibiscus + Rosehip Toner
review: The flower petals alone is what drawn me to this product. It was something different that I wanted to try, especially with hibiscus. It was pretty hydrating and provide good antioxidant properties. For the claim on acne and anti-aging, I don't think I've seen results in that area. But if you want a hydrating toner with some antioxidant boost, then this is it.

productName: On Coconut Water Hibiscus + Rosehip Toner
review: I like to try new things, but sometimes you just hit on things you can't do without. This is one of those for me. It's the perfect way to start my care routine both morning and night.

productName: On Coconut Water Hibiscus + Rosehip Toner
review: I really like the toner it is light and very refreshing

productName: On Coconut Water Hibiscus + Rosehip Toner
review: This was not for me. The texture feels oddly grainy and after consistent use, I haven't noticed any change in my skin. It felt like I was just rubbing tap water on my face
Loved this product, rich and creamy! The only complaint is the price, too much for the amount of product you get in my opinion.
Perfect

It absorbs pretty well. It calmed my skin down and when paired with an acne cream it didn't react. I woke up and my skin was moisturized....not like dewy how I would want but it felt and looked really good. A bit small hence the 4 stars but I know it'll go a long way. Perfect for an easy calming moisturizer. I might pair this with another thicker cream to really moisturize my skin.

I receive Ipsy monthly actually yearly. I was introduced to this product thru Ipsy. I am retired fashion, make up, hair etc designer cosmetologist for over 40yrs here in Texas. This is one of the Best worthy products including ingredients etc. I have had the pleasure of using and now investing for it. Stay safe. CGR
Very rich, my skin feels so dewy and hydrated in the mornings. I don’t think I’ll live without this now that I’ve tried it!

I buy this 2 at a time so I never run out. My skin loves it, I always feel hydrated after using it. It is a thicker moisturizer but absorbs quickly leaving my skin feeling soft. Would be great if they offered a larger container

I am 24 with dry/sensitive skin. This is by far the worst moisturizer I have ever used. I would use a drug store product before using this again. This cream does not provide my skin with any hydration at all. It is extremely oily on my skin and takes forever to absorb. My skins stays greasy all day and that is rare for how dry my skin is. I cannot put makeup on at all when using this product. The scent is unpleasant as well. I would not recommend this product to anyone!

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

Since there were so many good reviews on this toner, I decided to give it a try. My skin is sensitive & slightly oily. I did not have any adverse reaction to it...which is good...have been using it for a week. It hasn't "wowed" me yet. For now, I would say it's an okay toner.
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

This toner is perfect. It is $23, but for 500 ml, this will surely last. I love its milky texture, and how you don’t need to use a lot of product to get your entire face saturated in it. My face feels so smooth after using it.
I love this toner. It makes my skin so soft, plump, and dewy. It feels a little bit more like a super liquidy lotion so I tend to put a light toner on first then follow it with this toner.

This toner really surprised me. At first it didn't feel like it did much but over time I noticed my face felt smoother and the redness from my rosacea went down dramatically. It's a bit drying though so you need a good moisturizer to follow. This also helped control a lot of the whiteheads which was something I have really struggled to do.
First time really using a toner and I like the results!

So far over the past two weeks, this toner has significantly improved my skin texture, started to heal and decrease my hormonal acne around my jawline, and I have had absolutely NO sensitivity to it whatsoever! I use it just at night before my moisturizer.

This toner and the Oil Cut Cleanser were my first experience with the Troiareuke line. I’ve continued to purchase and use the Acsen cleanser since August 2020, but I can’t say the same for this toner. While there’s nothing overtly wrong with this product, I just felt like it wasn’t doing anything for my skin. It felt nice, but I just didn’t see any benefits from it.
it's the best thing ever my skin cleared up so well after i started using it. My only advice is to let it absorb well before applying other products over it as it would sting a bit.

This works better to refresh your puffy eyes in the morning than as a long term solution which I think is what it is intended for. Which it does very well for me. A very light texture to it, doesn’t feel like I have it on which is a plus.
Feels refreshing and hydrating, and doesn't go on heavy/greasy or make me break out.

Bought this for anti aging and it is very light weight and doesn't cause bumps like the other eye creams BUT I didn't notice anything different after 2 weeks of using this. It didn't get worse but it didn't get better. Maybe I should use it longer before noticing a change?
But I probably wouldn't get this again.

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: These are okay. They leave skin feeling soft and silky smooth but they're very drippy. You spend the whole time wiping upwards because it leaks down the face while on.

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: I love all of Dr Athlea’s products! It’s perfect — the gold packaging, the hydration, the gel texture . . . instantly one of my favorites after first time use.

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: I love these masks so much- winter heat and traveling make my skin and lips so dry even when I am hydrating, but these masks always do the job in saving my face

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: My friend got these for me as a gift a while ago, and once I used them all up I had to buy them again. They are definitely on the expensive side so I don't use them very often. However, when I feel like my skin needs some deep hydration I will definitely reach for one of these. The quality is so nice and it really feels like such a treat.

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: Tried one sachet so far but I love it. It has a lot of essence in the pack which was great so I used it all over. My skin felt hydrated even the next day.

productName: On Time Is Running Out Mist
review: The scent is light and dissipates quickly. Feels good and moisturizing on the face. Despite sensitive skin, no break outs. Also combination skin, but it does not make my oily sections oily. Just a good balance!

productName: On Time Is Running Out Mist
review: After I wash my face in the morning I pat my skin dry (but still a tiny bit dampish), then spray this all over my face probably three quick passes. I LOVE IT. I really think this gets my skin ready for my serums, moisturizer and SPF. I use this basically as a toner and have noticed subtle changes. It has a very nature scent to it which keeps me coming back to it. I do not however suggest using this for moister during the day because it can look too shiny.

productName: On Time Is Running Out Mist
review: Listen, some nights I just feel way to lazy to do my full 7 step skincare routine, so on those nights, I cleanse, spray this, and have great skin still! Love the scent it has as well.

productName: On Time Is Running Out Mist
review: I'm loving this mist!! It's so perfect for the cold weather. It's super hydrating, leaves this beautiful glow and the hydration feel lasts a while. I've become sensitive to scents as I've gotten older but love the citrus scent this has, and it doesn't linger for long. I've bought two full sizes during the sale and a mini travel one from another site since Soko doesn't carry it. I'm so happy I tired this mist, such a plus that this Sioris line is organic as well! A must try!

productName: On Time Is Running Out Mist
review: I needed a new mist and was looking around, saw this and decided to pick it up. I know it seems a little counterproductive to add oil to your routine if you're oily but this is a good way to do so. This has help keep my face hydrated throughout the day that I was never an oil slick at the end of the day. Also the product is very light even the mist is super fine that it is refreshing. Would definitely recommend this to anyone.

productName: On The Little Book of Skin Care
review: I read this book about 4 years ago and since applying what I’ve learned to my skin care routine, I’ve never looked back! My skin has never been better in my whole life! This book is a must for anyone interested in learning about skin care!

productName: On The Little Book of Skin Care
review: I'm surprised by how much I'm enjoying this book. I thought it would be useful but didn't anticipate it being fun to read. The description in the book is clear and honest and immersive - it almost has an erotic quality. Definitely has motivated me to make taking care of my skin a priority.

productName: On The Little Book of Skin Care
review: A good start and good read to skincare, very informative.

productName: On The Little Book of Skin Care
review: I love this book so much!! It is very informative and really helped me out with learning more about my skin! 10 out of 10 would recommend getting this book! Very helpful!

productName: On The Little Book of Skin Care
review: Very happy with my purchase
I like that this is a physical, sustainable sunscreen that doesn't pill!
- Like: no pilling, lightweight, layers well
- Dislike: minor white cast (I have a light-medium skin tone), slightly sticky

I wanted to like this but it leaves the worst feeling on your face in addition to the sickly white cast. Not only that but it’s nearly impossible to wear this under makeup without your makeup looking awful and pilling. Best way I could describe it is that body spf you use in the summer that never dries down and feels icky on you.
First time I tried this product was a sample , I fell in love with the silky feel on my face and neck. Absorbs nicely not sticky just silky smooth.

I added this as final step in my nighttime routine and it did not disappoint. Since adding this product, even my aesthitician said that my skin is glowing. I go to bed looking like a glazed donut and wake up with smooth/moisturized skin everyday! For someone with sensitive skin with slight rosacea, this is the real deal.

This is a must for anyone dealing with dry skin or just trying to make it through in a dry climate area. This moisturizer is potent! I use it at night and wake up with glowy skin that lasts throughout the day. The best part is that it works well with sensitive skin and does not have a harsh smell.

I bought this bc of the good reviews, but it turned out different from what I expected. This moisturizer leaves my skin very oily and it is sticky even after a couple of hours in. I only use this at night time. The container is made of plastic and it feels cheap, same with the consistency of the moisturizer; it has a gel like texture.
Works wonders! Leaves my hair shiny, tangle free, and soft.

this does wonderful things for my long breakage prone hair. What I really love about this product is that it can be used in a variety of ways successfully. First can be used as a deep conditioning treatment after shampooing with a clarifying shampoo and left on for a length of time and rinsed out. Second it can be used as a regular conditioner left on after shampooing for however long you leave on your conditioner in the shower and then rinse out. Lastly it can be used as a leave in conditioner now this is where it gets really special- on wet hair or on dry as a smoothing balm. I tried to extend the life of my blown out hair and by Day four, My hair is screaming for more moisture. To survive that fourth day I will put some of this balm in- sometimes with a little water sometimes without. What can I say I’m a mad scientist.

i’ve bought many things from soko glam just for fun and honestly, most things didn’t work for me and was ultimately a waste of money. However, i’ve had this product for over a year (a little goes a long way) and it’s sooo good. I dye/bleach my hair pretty often and it can look really damaged and dry, but using this after a shower really helps. I also like how easy it is to use because I don’t have the patience to use products that have to be used in between the shampoo and conditioner. I highly recommend this product! Your hair will look and feel sooo soft 😍

This product lasts a while since I use it once or twice a week, but my hair is noticeably healthier especially with the scalp treatment. My hair feels thicker and softer throughout the week and it feels great.

productName: On 7 Wonders Tundra Cranberry Anti-Aging Mask
review: There’s a bit of a learning curve to this mask, it took me a minute to figure it out, but once it was on my face, I was in love. It fits and sticks to my face better than any mask I’ve tried, and there is SO much product in the packet that I used it the next morning. It left my skin feeling so hydrated and plump and glowing. I will buy this again and again.

productName: On 7 Wonders Tundra Cranberry Anti-Aging Mask
review: Maybe it’s a good mask if you have a large, flat face. The aren’t enough cuts in it to adjust to fit the jaw and sides of the face. I’m disappointed because it’s a thick fiber and seems to be good quality.

productName: On 7 Wonders Tundra Cranberry Anti-Aging Mask
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

The change this has made to my hair is ridiculous! The amount of compliments I get on my hair nowwww, this is my first and last hair oil. my frizz is under control, and my hair is so shiny and soft. A little goes a real long way so be careful, or else it could look and feel oily instead. I use it when my hair is damp, before blow drying.

I have fine, long hair, color treated at the ends. I found this made my hair incredibly soft and shiny - I use a little bit post-wash, pre-dry. I find it absorbs fine and doesn't leave any oiliness when I use it then. I use a larger amount pre-wash: rub into hair a few hours before showering, it doesn't absorb fast this way, but I think it contributes to keeping my hair moisturized and sleek! Love love love this hair oil.
This might be a user error, but it makes my hair look greasy. My hair does look shinier but not in a good way.
Makes my skin feel like velvet
I have been bouncing around moisturizers for some time now, and this one just was not it. It moisturized my skin but was nothing spectacular. Probably would not revisit this one.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
doesn't give me that greasy feeling that most body lotions do. definitely something I plan to keep in my routine.
This absorbs quickly and leaves my skin moisturized but not greasy.
great lotion that is unscented & non-greasy.
Super fast absorbing, and unscented. No greasy feeling afterwards. I use it every day

I have dry and sensitive skin and this lotion has been great! It is not greasy and keeps my skin moisturized and from drying out. I need to stock up on it when it is back in stock because it runs out fast.

productName: On Hydra Shield Anti-Pollution Jelly Toner
review: I've got dry skin and when I use this toner, my skin feels nourished and supple for my old skin. Love it!

productName: On Hydra Shield Anti-Pollution Jelly Toner
review: Looooove it! I originally used an AHA+BHA toner, but during the winter my skin had started peeling, flaking and my face was overall super textured. This product here? SAVED ME from having to deal with all the nastiness and gave me the much needed moisture that other products failed at! Will definitely come back and purchase!

productName: On Hydra Shield Anti-Pollution Jelly Toner
review: Wow. I am obsessed.

productName: On Hydra Shield Anti-Pollution Jelly Toner
review: 1. I love the applicator- so easy!

productName: On Hydra Shield Anti-Pollution Jelly Toner
review: 2. feels so good after cleansing. soft and silky
Great value, as I bought this during the sale. All the products are great!

I didn't know how to hand-select my skincare routine myself, so I went for this set...I am blown away by all of it! Especially the toner (so moisturizing) and the Klairs cream is making my skin so bright and glowy!! You won't regret giving this set a try if you're new to a full-out skincare regimen :)
all of them apart from Swanicoco Multi Solution Triple V Ampoule which didn't work well with my skin. Overall though great starting kit

This was the first time that I used a full 5 steps like this and introduced me to toner, omg soo good ! Really gave me glass skin super hydrated, It did not get rid of my dark spot on the side of my eye and it’s been 6 mos so you probably need to use a vitamin c!

My skin feels so much better! The products run out so quickly though - lol. Other than that they are amazing. No complaints. I will be purchasing again at the end of the month. I wish there was a whitening product in the pack though.

productName: On AHA-BHA-PHA Real Cica 92% Cool Calming Soothing Gel
review: Light and absorbant. Tea tree and rosemary reminds me of eucalyptus. Has a pleasant scent with a clean finish my skin, absorbing fast and dries quickly. Comes in a generously sized container; I apply this gel to my shoulders and chest, too. I love it. Great for summer.

productName: On AHA-BHA-PHA Real Cica 92% Cool Calming Soothing Gel
review: I absolutely love the feeling of it and it is super hydrating! The best way to finish my routine.

productName: On AHA-BHA-PHA Real Cica 92% Cool Calming Soothing Gel
review: I use this moisturizer every other night, ( I have 2 moisturizers) and I normally use this one with my exfoliating toner and my hydrating essence and a hydrating serum. My skin drinks this moisturizer up.

productName: On AHA-BHA-PHA Real Cica 92% Cool Calming Soothing Gel
review: I wanted to buy this product for some time now, but never thought I needed it that desperately in my skincare. Until I saw Euni feature it in one of her videos where she used it to kind of refresh her scalp. And I knew I HAD TO try it out. See, I have seborrheic dermatitis all over my front hairline and although I do use a medicated shampoo, I also need to and have used countless products to apply during those in-between wash days, which is when the condition makes my skin really itchy, scaly and irritated. Unfortunately nothing calms all that irritation...until now. I had to put this really to the test under different conditions my scalp was in and had the same results. I haven't had any irritation in two weeks, the itchiness is a bit better and as long as I keep applying it 2 to 3 times a week, I get no noticeable flakes. It does freshen up and soothes my scalp until it's time to wash it. But even better, all that relief allows me to sleep better at night and not be so self conscious of how my hairline looks during the day. So, thanks to Euni for talking about it on her channel, to you Soko Glam for featuring it in your site, and to Some By Mi for coming out with a product that I belatedly realized needed in my life. And you can't beat that size and price. Definitely repurchase it.

productName: On AHA-BHA-PHA Real Cica 92% Cool Calming Soothing Gel
review: I easily breakout and this keeps my breakouts at bay. I use this as a serum. It’s so lightweight, it not enough to be a moisturizer and if you use this too much, this could potentially dry out your face (which could lead to more breakouts) so make sure you have maybe a moisturizing toner or essence to help balance it out. ( I did that, for the ginger essence water and it has balanced everything. I looking flawless like Beyoncé y’all). So for you oil/combo acne prone ppl, use this. You can use on ur body too not just ur face. I hear it’s good for sunburns (I got lots of melanin tho and have been shut in due to covid so I wouldn’t know. But maybe this summer?)

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence
review: I truly don't know why I love this stuff, I don't notice much of a difference in my skin but I use it anyway. Its supposed to be calming, I don't notice calmer skin, I have Rosacea and not much helps but this feels nice, and hasn't caused any disruption to my skin.

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence
review: My skin loves all the ingredients in this bottle. It's hydrating and calming. Feels great on my skin. Missha essences never fails.

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence
review: I gave this to my mother as a gift without trying it myself. My mother loved it so much that she got my sister and I to use it.

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence
review: This treatment toner soothes and preps the skin for other products in my skincare routine so well that it is essential.

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence
review: Soothes irritated, itchy skin

This lovely thing is wonderful. Lightly viscous, and cool to the touch. This essence servers as a wonderful skin soother in my routine. This has not broken me out, and has caused no irritation for my skin. I would recommend for someone with acne-prone or sensitive skin!
**I’m posting for the second time as I could not find my original review**

This lovely thing is wonderful. Lightly viscous, and cool to the touch. This essence servers as a wonderful skin soother in my routine. This has not broken me out, and has caused no irritation for my skin. I would recommend for someone with acne-prone or sensitive skin!

This essence is super hydrating and it leaves my skin feeling plump and soft. At nighttime I like to layer it 3x. I also keep the bottle in my skincare fridge so when I splash it on my face and neck it feels amazing. I have normal skin so this works perfect for me.

I got interested in this after Kelly Driscoll mentioned it -- I swear by galactomyces in my routine because it really helps with my pore size and skin brightness. I've been using this, functionally, as a first treatment essence (think Missha, SK-II etc). It's a bit heavy for that, frankly, but layers beautifully. I appreciate that it adds other ferments, niacinamide and sea buckthorn extract, too, because this makes it a go-to on days when I'm feeling a shorter routine.
Hydrate et prépare bien ma peau à mes sérums
I usually skip the toner when I double cleanse and go straight to this essence. It is very hydrating and does not leave a sticky residue that interferes with your serums or creams.

I was hesitant to purchase this as it is a bit pricey for me, but there is a lot of product in the bottle! My skin breaks out easily and is on the dryer side. This was very moisturizing and smoothing and didn't leave a sticky film! I typically don't like the way toners feel but this one is amazing! I definitely felt like this made my skin more smooth and healthy. Once the bottle was gone I noticed that my skin wasn't as bright. Worth repurchasing!

Wow, for the longest time, I've been eyeing this mask. I received a sample and was compelled to buy the full-size product. I am pleased with the result, just as I was with the sample! It is truly calming. When washing off, there is this slip it creates when it makes contact with water. Hydrating, calming, and great for sensitive skin!
I love the cooling effect on my skin and it definitely calms my skin down and makes it softer.

Great results, does exactly what it says it will do. I don't use it nearly as often as recommended, though, because of two reasons. One is the large pieces of crushed plants in the mask are very sensory unfriendly (I'm autistic), but it's bearable if you're careful when rinsing to not get it in your eyes or nose. The other is that it smells awful, I joke when I use it that it's my "pond mud" mask because that's exactly what it smells like to me, a pond or swamp. But again, I'll repurchase this when I run out, because it really does give good results for my sensitive, dry skin.

Pop this mask in the fridge! The cooling effect of the gel is a lifesaver for sensitive skin. I love to put this on whenever I’ve been out in the sun for too long, or if my skin is just generally irritable and stressed. It leaves you feeling de-puffed and glowing. I enjoy the herbal smell, but it is strong and may not be for everyone. The mask also has flecks of organic matter which are a bit difficult to rinse off with just water-a gentle wipe with a washcloth will help!

I love the cooling effect of this mask. Especially because I keep it in the fridge it’s very cool and helps give it a calming effect. I like the way my skin feels afterward. I do not feel dried out or “stripped.” I will say I am not fond of the smell, but I think the mask itself is great so I am not deterred.

productName: On Gentle Black Fresh Cleansing Oil
review: It's gentle on my sensitive skin and removes all my makeup. I love that it doesn't have fragrance. It has a slightly thicker consistency than other cleansing oils I've tried, but this doesn't affect efficacy. Overall an excellent first step in my cleansing routine!

productName: On Gentle Black Fresh Cleansing Oil
review: I am devastated that this is sold out because it is so good!! It WIPES away my makeup like no other product has done before. Definitely give it a chance!

productName: On Gentle Black Fresh Cleansing Oil
review: This product is amazing as part of a double cleansing routine! I used to have to use makeup remover for the more stubborn parts of my makeup like mascara and this breaks down even that! I follow it up with a water based cleanser to make sure everything is washed off and it is perfect. Definitely recommend!!

productName: On Gentle Black Fresh Cleansing Oil
review: This is my go to cleansing oil. It’s so easy to use. Washes off all my makeup in one go. Even waterproof mascara and I use it to easily remove hair dye stains. Everyone I recommend it to becomes a fan.

productName: On Gentle Black Fresh Cleansing Oil
review: It was a good basic oil cleanser. It didn't remove much of my makeup but it was a gentle clean.
Cleared my skin within a few uses.
I cant really say ive seen any change it kinda reminds me of innisfree green tea serum. has that cooling effect, for the price I say it does what it do

I really wanted to LOVE this product, but I don't. However, I do really LIKE it. I tried it for the green tea benefits and the hydraulic acid ingredients, but I did not notice a significant difference in my skin. The serum goes on smooth, and is nice and light. It smells nice, and feels nice. However, it did not improve my skin condition, and it stayed the same.
I had been looking for a product to help reduce acne and scars and I’m happy to say I’ve found it! In just a week my skin had cleared up a ton and it is great at fighting new breakouts.

Green tea was recommended to me as an anti-acne ingredient and I began to search for skincare with it. This serum did not disappoint. Although it absorbs quickly it does not leave a residue. I apply it in the morning and it helps control my oil. The only thing is I didn’t like was the packaging since the push mechanism inside makes it harder to recycle.

productName: On Skin Essentials Barrier Repair Face Oil
review: It absorbs well into my face and makes my skin very soft, but I don't know if I can get over the RANCID smell of it. I would say it smells like burning oil, but that's not quite right... more like some kind of mix of burning plastic and burning trash. I will not order again and am sad other oils were out of stock when I placed this order. :(

productName: On Skin Essentials Barrier Repair Face Oil
review: Thanks for your feedback!

I use this at night since it’s a thicker, creamy consistency, and it’s works really great! I wake up to my eyes looking hydrated and less tired. It’s also helped minimize the appearance of my dark circles.
Will be a staple in my winter skincare routine. I have dry sensitive skin and this eye cream is perfect for the cold winter months or dry weather climate. The texture is absolutely luxurious!!!

My tired eyes always feel good after using it. The amount you get is quite large. I've never gotten so much eye cream in 1 jar before. No milia or irritation but my eyes aren't very sensitive. This eyecream is good for day and night
This eye cream is very rich and nourishing so a little goes a long way to give your eyes some TLC

The Ginseng Eye Cream is a heavy, thick moisturizer for eyes. I have seen improvements in my undereye circles. My preexisting smile lines/wrinkles have stayed the same and not decreased. Since it is thick cream, the Milia spots under my eyes have worsened, which caused me to score it lower. I am combating them with a retinol spot treatment. Still using the cream because the spot treatment has been workiing m

productName: On We Come in Peace Microbiome Serum
review: If I can say one thing about this is that you need this product in your skincare routine. Probiotics I think yes! My skin eats this up and for good reason. I was going through some awful hormonal acne and within a few days of adding this product into my routine the pimples and redness started going down. Once gone there was no dark spots or pie left either. I will forever repurchase this product. I have just seen such an improvement on my over all skin health and texture.

productName: On We Come in Peace Microbiome Serum
review: This serum is lightly scented and very gentle. I'm sensitive to smells and this doesn't bother me at all. I've only been using it after weeks but already see a difference in my skin.

productName: On We Come in Peace Microbiome Serum
review: This was recommended to me during my skin consultation with Emily. I use this in my night routine. I am so happy I tried this product. I have been looking for the perfect serum for a long time. This seems to be perfect for me in so many ways after learning about this product. I am using this because it has Bakucihol, a natural retinol alternative (I tried retinol in the past and didn't like it. My skin became irritated). This helps with strengthening the skin barrier, stimulating cell turnover, and targeting hyperpigmentation. I've also seen a difference in how hydrated my skin looks. It also plumps skin for a more youthful complexion, something I appreciate. I also have redness in my skin and this has carrot, morringa seed, and blue tansy oils to help bring relief to redness and irritation. This product has so many benefits and is everything I've been looking for and more. I would never have chosen it without the recommendation.

productName: On We Come in Peace Microbiome Serum
review: I love this! The consistency, texture, feeling, effectiveness! Everything. I love a good serum that benefits my skin barrier and this serum is definitely worth a try for anyone who wants to improve their skin barrier and skin health! Loved this so much I just had to restock and it has been in my skincare routine rotation ever since.

productName: On We Come in Peace Microbiome Serum
review: This serum has a great consistency and feels good at first application; however, I feel like it made me break out. I might have not given it a chance, but it definitely did not produce good results during the first few days of usage.
This moisturizer Brightens up my skin giving me a radiate look.
This has been my daily moisturizer for the last year! It's great to put on skin right before makeup and hydrating enough to put on before bed. Creamy texture and neutral smell. I love the refill too!

I tried this when my previous moisturizer ran out and it was out of stock, but now I can't possibly go back. I use it day & night and my sensitive combination skin loves it! I also really like that the packaging has refills, it feels way less wasteful than other moisturizers I've tried. Neogen really knocked it out of the park with this one!
I really enjoyed this mask, very hydrating and a nice cooling effect since I placed in the refrigerator. I like the 5 pack as I can use at a later time when I want more hydration.

After I finished using this brightening mask, my face felt very sticky. I just don't like the feeling of stickiness on my face. I think it will be more suited for very dry skin condition than mine having combination skin.
Very unique mask, the texture feels different than other masks.
I got this mask in a pack and found it to be very hydrating and brightening! I love to put my masks in the fridge for a calming effect too!

productName: On Houttuynia Cordata Calming Moisture Cream
review: Love it. It is lightweight and dries quickly so perfect for daytime. I have it under make-up no issue.

productName: On Houttuynia Cordata Calming Moisture Cream
review: This smells and feels amazing, and it's very hydrating, but I've noticed it pills under makeup. I will only use this at night now.

productName: On Houttuynia Cordata Calming Moisture Cream
review: SOOO SOOTHIG HYDRATING GREAT FOR INFLAMMATION it’s marker d as a cream however and wish it was much thicker this is more of a gel

productName: On Houttuynia Cordata Calming Moisture Cream
review: My skin is really sensitive and I was looking for a nighttime moisturizer. This is more like a gel than a cream, and it has a pleasant, light smell. It absorbs pretty quickly and didn’t sting, give me any redness or irritation, or break me out. I’d say it wasn’t super moisturizing but it was still heavier than what I’d typically wear during the day. I’m in the middle of buying it again.

productName: On Houttuynia Cordata Calming Moisture Cream
review: I was very disappointed with this product as I really wanted to like it. I don't usually have sensitive skin but this product gave me a terrible reaction. This product was recommended to me from the concierge skin consultation and within seconds of applying to my face, I felt it become very itchy and super hot. Using it within the week had led my face to to a very bad breakout that took a few weeks for it to fully recover. This had been my first time going along with a proper skincare routine and led me to quit using any kind of skincare within the future. Thankfully, keeping my skincare routine to just rinsing with water allowed it to heal from this horrible first experience.

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Powder Cleanser
review: I travel for work weekly. I LOOVE that this product is travel friendly. In the past I’ve had trouble with liquids leaking, pumps breaking, balms melting. This product solved all those problems. With just a touch of water it turns sudsy and smooth. I recommend this to all my traveling co workers!

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Powder Cleanser
review: Love this item a lot. I chanced by it on a clearance shelf at TJMaxx ironically and tried it. It really did make my skin feel noticeably softer during cleansing and it's a mild formula.

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Powder Cleanser
review: **However, I feel the company missed a GREAT marketing opportunity with this product and hope this is a possibility in the future: they should sell refills in compostable bags. This is a dry product and the plastic container could be refillable. Lower the cost a bit to consumers and still make the same profit. With more climate awareness, this would have an excellent pitch next to an already excellent product.
I love this spf so much I purchased the jumbo size. The only thing I wish was that it was more hydrating it makes my skin feel very dry after about an hour.
Love that this is a clean product however it doesn’t provide that Tinted Moisturized look. Hoping in the future they will broaden their shades.

The tint is an odd orangey yellow that doesn't work with my skin. I have fair, slightly warm-toned skin. Typically primers with a yellow tint work great to balance out redness in my skin. This doesn't do that. It leaves an orangey cast. I love that it's a clean product with good ingredients. The texture of it is slightly sticky but a little dry or chalky, just sort of odd. It doesn't feel soft, if that makes any sense. (Especially at this price point) its just not for me!

productName: On Wrinkle Tox Skin Clinic Mask
review: Nice sheet mask, used in the evening and layered on the extra serum. Kind of sticky after feel, but I think sheet masks are often like that.

productName: On Wrinkle Tox Skin Clinic Mask
review: My favorite mask so far. You can actually see the difference in your skin when you remove the mask. I love this one and will buy more.

productName: On Wrinkle Tox Skin Clinic Mask
review: My skin was refreshed and smooth after use.

productName: On Wrinkle Tox Skin Clinic Mask
review: I really love this mask and keep it for days when I have a special day or night out and want that extra TLC for my skin. I have sensitive skin and it's worked very well. Love how my skin feels the next day and I think it also helps to calm it plus minimize the lines Overall will keep going back to it.

productName: On Wrinkle Tox Skin Clinic Mask
review: This mask makes me look like a newborn. It is MIRACULOUS. Anything by Leaders is typically a win!

productName: On Back To Relax Soothing Gel Mask
review: I have very sensitive skin. This mask is great! I always waking up feeling soft, moisturized and replenished! Love it after a long day at the beach.

productName: On Back To Relax Soothing Gel Mask
review: Wore this for 10min and washed it off. The next day I woke up with my face COVERED in whiteheads and red patches. I’m not allergic to any of the botanical ingredients so I suspect one of the chemicals in this mask is not safe for sensitive skin.

productName: On Back To Relax Soothing Gel Mask
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

So I’m almost through the bottle of this stuff. I bought this to try instead of a vitamin c serum made with ascorbic acid because I’ve had a hard time finding a good one. This serum feels nice on the skin, is fragrance-free, and is non-irritating. However, I haven’t noticed any benefits to my skin claimed. This product definitely doesn’t deliver the same results as an actual vitamin C serum, and the niacinamide in it I know is good for skin but I haven’t really noticed any effects from that either. This product is akin to putting on a water gel to my skin and that’s it. I also want to note that this product doesn’t tell you the concentration of niacinamide so I don’t think it’s very much and that may be why I haven’t seen much benefit. I’m using the bottle up so not to waste it, but I won’t repurchase. This product was disappointing.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
A great multi-purpose serum for the mornings, saw skin visibly brighten and dark spots fade faster with consistent use

productName: On Dear, Klairs Fundamental Watery Oil Drop
review: In searching for hydration and glow I decided to purchase this. It really helps my skin to look plump and hydrated all day. I use it morning and night and it really gives me a glow that lasts all day, also the little wrinkles on my forehead are less visible. Definitely a great addition to my routine

productName: On Dear, Klairs Fundamental Watery Oil Drop
review: I bought this on a whim and have not regretted it. I have very dry, highly sensive, very reactive skin. I have reactions to so many ingredients it makes shopping for new skincare a problem, but this worked into my routine seamlessly. I haven't gotten this many compliments on my skin in years. As A woman rapidly approaching middle aged I am greatful for any simple product that can overwhealm the tide of time, even if it is short term. I will be perchasing again.

productName: On Dear, Klairs Fundamental Watery Oil Drop
review: I don't see much of a visual difference in the morning when I use it at night but it has conditioned my skin very nicely and my skin feels supple. I wouldn't say its a necessity but definitely a great addition. If you are scared of oil having oily skin like me don't worry it doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy.

productName: On Dear, Klairs Fundamental Watery Oil Drop
review: This oil is super lightweight and it brings the color back into my complexion after I cleanse. Not greasy or sticky and leaves a slight shine which I personally like.

productName: On Dear, Klairs Fundamental Watery Oil Drop
review: Absolutely love this. Not oily, just hydrating. My skin is super unhappy right now on Acutane and this just makes it feel comfortable.

productName: On White Truffle First Spray Serum
review: Im starting to think that by using D'ALBA PIEDMONT White Truffle First Spray along with D'ALBA White Truffle Intensive Ampoule is why my complexion is appearing "Glass Like Skin" Ive been using the D'ALBA White Truffle Inentsive Ampoule for over 2 years now. Im on my 2nd bottle when I noticed the D'ALBA First Spray. Together, and along with a moisturizer to top them off, has given my 61 year old a complexion comparable to when I was in my 30s. I have very few lines on my face and no wrinkles. The D'ALBA White Truffle First Spray is a dual phase formula. The top appears to be a light, drier oil and the bottom layer a creamy white serum. By shaking the bottle and mixing the two, allows the formula to spray out a fine mist to my face and neck. Dry time is minimal. There is no sticky after effect either. 5 minutes later, I apply the D'ALBA White Truffle Intesive Ampoule...Youll love using these two skin care products together. My Winter skin loves tge deep hydrating & moisturizing effect...highly recommended.

productName: On White Truffle First Spray Serum
review: I wanted to love this but I just didn’t. Sure it is refreshing and I have a glow for about 5 minutes but that is it. It did not hydrate my skin. Not worth it for the price.

productName: On White Truffle First Spray Serum
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I was really glad I tried this as a trial set. The eye cream drys out my eyes and irritates my skin. I also found the serum drying. The toner is nice, but not so great that I would seek it out in a full size.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I received this trial as a part of the lunar new year promotion and I have to say, I am loving it so far. The toner is so so refreshing. The serum is easy for my skin to absorb (my skin often has a hard time absorbing product which then leads to a goopy feeling on my face). I paired these products with the hanskin calming toner and wowwwwww my skin has been so soft and nourished I feel so great. I will definitely buy the full products of these.
Literally applied this before bed on a hormonal acne spot - and the NEXT morning it was nearly gone!

I have used this product for about six months and love it. It helps heal any acne blemishes in a way that is less harsh and is less prone to dry out my face. My skin just feels healthier since using this in my skincare routine.

I love this. I was skeptical especially since it is only $15 but oh my god, this works. It helps so much with clearing acne (I mainly get whiteheads and cystic) and I will definitely buy again when I run out of my current one. The only downside is the bottle is a bit small.

productName: On Moisture Boost Gel To Water Morning Cleanser
review: I had a really strange experience with this cleanser. It produced absolutely no foam, so I was just rubbing cold gel onto my skin. Trying to rinse it off was also a strange experience. Ended up giving this away after trying it once.

productName: On Moisture Boost Gel To Water Morning Cleanser
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Moisture Boost Gel To Water Morning Cleanser
review: This cleanser is good for the dry fall and winter season since it's not too stripping. However during the summer months it's a bit too gentle for my oily skin. The consistency is a bit too watery so it can leak out a bit when it's upright or when opening the container it comes out even without squeezing

productName: On Green Pearlsation PHA Calming Toner
review: i loved this bottle of goodness. It was the extra step i needed to help with my acne and i couldnt be happier. I wish it was in stock. I used it till the very end, not a single complaint.

productName: On Green Pearlsation PHA Calming Toner
review: The toner is gentle to my skin. I used this to reduced Rosacea and it brilliantly work. I'm happy.

productName: On Green Pearlsation PHA Calming Toner
review: I use this twice daily to help with acne and it lights bumps and texture within my skin

productName: On Green Pearlsation PHA Calming Toner
review: I love everything about this toner. It is so gentle on my skin and works better than the 30 days miracle toner. it has reduce my redness and my breakouts are better. This for me has become a holy grail. Ladies if you have acne prone oily skin like me give this a try!!!!!!

productName: On Green Pearlsation PHA Calming Toner
review: Really helped refine my skin texture and decrease the end of the day greasiness I usually experience. Love it!

productName: On Squeeze Green Watery Gel Cream
review: I never thought I could find a moisturizer that beat my favorite Neutrogena hydrogel but I was wrong. This is the perfect gel moisturizer that is light but hydrating!

productName: On Squeeze Green Watery Gel Cream
review: Awesome moisturizer! Makes your skin feel hydrated, like it just drank a glass of water. Nice and light but still does a great job moisturizing, unlike some other "light" moisturizer that leaves your skin dry and flaky. Really love how this sits after applied. Never had an issue with it breaking me out at all, my skin loves this! No irritation at all, kind of a cooling nice soothing feeling.

productName: On Squeeze Green Watery Gel Cream
review: Excellent for oily skin.

productName: On Squeeze Green Watery Gel Cream
review: Goes on and absorbs pretty nicely. Super light and hydrating

productName: On Baggage Claim Eye Masks - Gold
review: A little disappointed the mask wasn’t gold on both sides but was one of the most hydrating eye masks I’ve used so far. A definite must-buy when it gets restocked!

productName: On Baggage Claim Eye Masks - Gold
review: I really enjoy products that deliver beneficial ingredients and results as well as have an experiential appeal. These eye masks really tick off all those boxes. I noticed a pretty big transformation the first time I used them on puffy /swollen morning eyes and now sometimes go over top of them with a cold spoon to double up the goodness. Honestly, they also just make me feel extra fancy which I believe is good for the spirit too :)

productName: On Baggage Claim Eye Masks - Gold
review: didn't depuff my eyes

productName: On Baggage Claim Eye Masks - Gold
review: and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence [Mist Type]
review: I like that it is a must and feels great on my skin!

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence [Mist Type]
review: I have tried many things for hypersensitive skin and this has been my holy grail essence ! Absolutely must have.

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence [Mist Type]
review: I love face mists for my lazy days or when I want a light layer to incorporate into my routine. It’s great to spray in between steps and I love that it’s fermented mugwort. It’s pricey for what you get so I would suggest waiting for sales

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence [Mist Type]
review: I got this because I'm a huge fan of Missha and also of the specific ingredients in this product. For the price point I was expecting more. It just doesn't live up to the hype IMO. I really wanted to love it but I think the first treatment essence mist which Soko stopped carrying (bring back the mist!) was a much better product for the cost.

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence [Mist Type]
review: I will say the product does feel nice and refreshing....but I really did not notice any difference in my skin with the product. I did not feel like it added any extra moisture or helped tremendously in anyway. It also has a bit of an odd smell. It does dissipate after awhile but until it does everything is just a bit off smell wise around you.

Like the light consistency (slightly thicker than water) and faint scent (very fresh). I can't tell if it made any difference to my skin, although I've been using it for about 1.5 weeks so maybe it needs more time. I wish it was more hydrating. I will most likely repurchase because I like hybrid products
and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

I pump this on my palm and then press it gently on my face. It is about the consistency of water but feels much more hydrating on my skin, especially when sealed in with moisturizer. I like it enough that I've already bought a second bottle.

Moist Toning Lotion is a true savior for my sensitive, reactive and often inflamed skin. It calmed and moisturized my skin without leaving any residue. Its pleasure to use before moisturizer and I am very happy with results.
I've been using this product for ~2 months now. Not really sure how effective this product is. The cream is very lightweight/watery.
I really wanted to like this item but it gave me rough patches and made my skin dry :(
We're so sorry to hear that this product didn't work out for you! Please reach out to our team at

I am a mask junkie so always looking to try new products. Some clay masks can be pretty drying so wasn't sure how this one would work out. I was pleasantly surprised that it is a cream mask with little soft microbeads (filled with good stuff!). It goes on smoothly and doesn't dry out (no crackles!). I feel it does brighten my complexion and leaves it feeling smooth and soft. No irritation at all and no breakouts. I rotate this in at least once/week with my other masks to give me the Vit. C boost my skin needs. A little goes a long way so the product size is generous and will last a while.

I like vitamin c, but my skin is pretty sensitive and I tend to overuse it when I have a vitamin c serum. I like this because I can use it once or twice a week, and it feels like a fun indulgence. I’m trying to do more wash off masks in general because it’s better for the environment than sheet masks, and this was a pretty unique wash off mask. It doesn’t dry my face at all, which is good since I have dry skin to begin with. My skin tone looks brighter and more even after I use it.

I bought this to go along with some recommendations from my skin concierge. I wanted the free gift promotion and figured I’d add a mask. At first I wasn’t sure, it doesn’t really feel like a mask let alone a typical clay mask and I wasn’t really seeing any difference. But after using it 1/2 times a week over the last 3 weeks, tonight after washing it off I could finally see a difference. My face looked brighter, my scars and pigmentation looked a hair lighter, my complexion more even. I will continue using it as part of my nighttime routine a couple times a week until I’ve finished it before I decide on repurchasing. I have combo skin more dry in the winter, it does make my skin feel a little tight after use but I follow with my full routine and have no problems with dryness.

I purchased this mask to help treat some pimples around my mouth/chin area. It didn't seem to do anything for the acne but diminish the scaring a bit that usually happens to my skin when I get pimples of any size. I was hoping it would dry out the pimples and help speed up the process but I saw no difference.

Most clay masks have been making my skin sting and burn lately, but this one didn't! It goes on like a cream and washes off easily. My skin was bright and soft afterwards, and it helped to fade some dark spots caused by acne scars. I will definitely repurchase!
I’ve been using this toner for about a week and I like the how fresh my face feels after using it. It doesn’t leave me too dry or tight.

I have found my new holy grail for dehydrated sensitive skin! I used to use the I'm From Rice Toner but I was on the market for smth cheaper, and I'm so happy I found this! Like the description, it's not sticky at all and your skin will feel significantly smoother after a few uses without stripping the natural moisture on your skin. It's a good balance b/w hydrating and also gentle daily exfoliation! Never made my skin feel raw or irritated! ALSO! You get more bang for your buck bc of how much you get in one bottle! Worth the try if you're looking for a new all-season toner :) No wonder this product has so much hype in Korea. Soko glam pls never take this out of your inventory !!
Hydrating and slightly exfoliating, this is a good all around toner

I actually bought this a couple of months ago for my teenage daughter. She has dry acne prone skin during the winter. This is great as a moisturizing toner or a skin friendly toner that gently exfoliates the skin. I love the ingredients such sugarcane extract which is an exfoliating ingredient that can smooth and brighten skin’s appearance. Sea water which is rich in minerals to help heal and protect the skin barrier. Panthenol which improves skin hydration and reduces inflammation. My daughter says that it has helped her maintain skin balance and leaves her skin feeling refreshed without any sticky feel.

I switched from the 30 Day Miracle Toner to this, just to try. My skin is super clear, more moisturized (great for winter), and all-around more glow-y. I can see why this toner got as much hype as it did, it's fantastic.

productName: On Multi Solution Triple V Ampoule
review: Results are amazing, my skin glows after each use! One bottle lasts for a long time.

productName: On Multi Solution Triple V Ampoule
review: I saw results after two weeks of consistent use, it helped fade my hyperpigmentation in combination with my other products. It’s very light feeling, not sticky, and is gentle on my sensitive skin. I’ve tried other vitamin c serums but have yet to find one that I like as much as this one

productName: On Multi Solution Triple V Ampoule
review: Good product

productName: On Multi Solution Triple V Ampoule
review: Really liked this, reduced redness and acne scars

productName: On Multi Solution Triple V Ampoule
review: I received this with the brightening set and it turned my face bright red for hours after using. Wouldn’t recommend if you have sensitive skin.

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
review: I liked the compact size but at the same time wish it was a little bigger. I think it does a great job doing a gentle cleaning of the dead skin on lips. Although wish the product had more in it because it can be pricy for $12.

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
review: This is my first chemical lip scrub (I've used a physical one before). It's so oddly satisfying to see the dead skin shed off! It's a great addition to my lip care routine; I've always been a lip balm addict and now I'm happy to prep with this bubbly scrub!

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
review: Refreshed. Cleasing lips

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
review: I know others are saying this did nothing but to be honest im not sure if they’ve used the product properly. This removed 70% of the dry skin on my lips and was awesome.

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
review: I read so many awesome reviews about this scrub, but I feel like it’s just mediocre. I don’t feel it exfoliates at all, but I do like how it bubbles!
I have been using this Serum for about a week now and I love it. It makes my skin super smooth and bright.
I highly recommend this serum
I love the texture of it and I am still currently using it!
I love this serum, my face looks 100% lighter all my dark spots are fading. Buy it!! I highly recommend it!!

This serum is moisturizing without leaving your skin feeling or looking greasy. A little goes a long way, and I felt like my skin looked more "plump" if that makes sense! :) Due to the packaging you have to work a bit to get the last portion of the serum out, but the product itself worked great for my sensitive skin.

I did not look at the photo of the mask above, and was very surprised by the herbs-in-goo consistency when I first opened it. (That was my bad, so no points docked there... Just suggesting that you check the pic yourself!) It's kinda messy to apply and it kinda feels like it's going to slide off my face. Also: when I washed it off I always get nervous that all the leafy bits are going to clog my sink.

Ignoring all that, I still just don't love the product. Perhaps my skin type (combination, a little acne prone, minor redness, not very sensitive) isn't the target market and that's why I didn't see or feel any difference. I'll use up this mask because it doesn't negatively effect my skin, but I won't be repurchasing either.

I would highly recommend this product. It has a nice tea/herbal smell to it and is not offensive at all. There is no added fragrance, the smell comes straight from the herbs within the mask. I have sensitive, somewhat oily skin and this product is very soothing and calming and definitely helps with redness. It leaves my face feeling smooth, calm and happy. I have used it several times and still have a lot left, so it is definitely worth the price. If you have concerns with sensitivity and redness, I highly recommend this product. I will say though, application and washing off can be quite messy due to the watery and herbal nature of this mask.

Smells and feels great. It’s a bit messier than I expected — it’s really just bits of leaf in gel. It doesn’t dry or stiffen such as other masks I’ve used. It remains wet until I wash it off. So, I’m not sure how much it’s really pulling out of my skin, or how much exfoliating or purifying it does. However, my skin looks nice and feels nice and soft post-rinse, and following it up with toner/essence/vitamin c is producing a nice, even result and my pores and rosacea seem reduced. Overall, it doesn’t HURT my skin, and anything that doesn’t make me break out is a win. However, but I’m not sure if it’s really scrubbed, purified, or improved it the way I would expect a mask to.
The first time I used this I saw it was effective in helping stop breakouts. Now, I break out less, but this doesn't do anything for me.
My skin feels and looks amazing !

I don’t use this daily, but have been rotating it into my routine every few days… I have splotchy redness and active chin breakouts. I use this ampoule at night, layering over real firming bakuchiol serum on my whole face. When I wake up my skin is less red and active acne spots are reduced. I can’t say whether it’s this product, or the combo of products, but I’m happy to keep using it.

It certainly made one of my stubborn pimples go away in roughly one week, but after trying to use it to calm my redness a bunch of other papule pimples showed up? I’m not sure if I’m purging or if this is what caused them but… idk. It works? But also maybe it really Really doesn’t? Do with that what you will

I enjoyed this product, it was lightweight, had a cooling, refreshing feel to it and great for the summer. It unfortunately doesn’t do enough for the dryer months but I will definitely want to revisit this product come June.

I used the whole jar, but I didn’t enjoy it personally. I really wanted to like this one but it’s just too sticky for my taste, made it feel heavy and wouldn’t let me forget it was there all day. It definitely sounds like it does great things so I feel like I’m missing out, plus it never bothered my sensitive skin or left it dry. Just not for me, but I’m sure someone else’s skin may love it! What’s heavy feeling for me may be the amount of moisture someone else’s dry skin needs

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Serum Mask
review: I picked this up on a whim, because why not -- their serum from the same line has been getting a lot of play. This had the immediate hydrating effects you'd expect from a sheet mask, and did have some glow to it, though it's quite temporary. The mask fit well, though it was surprisingly hard to unfold

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Serum Mask
review: I was very surprised by this mask. There is a lot of essence in the package. Mask is soft and fit my face very well. Skin was super hydrated and glowing after use. I will definitely repurchase and use for those days when I have a special event or when I want an extra hydration boost.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Serum Mask
review: I always pick up a new sheet mask with every order as a fun way to try new ones and honestly I wasn't expecting to love this. I wish it didn't contain the essential oils, but despite that, it really left the most healthy and glowy skin. I followed up with my moisturizer and my skin looked so healthy and radiance I didn't want makeup at all. I popped mine in the fridge for a half hour before using - highly recommend!

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Serum Mask
review: This is one of my favorite sheet mask. My skin gets a glow that stays all day after I use this product.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Serum Mask
review: I love this serum.. it does everything that I want to do. The texture makes it amazing.. some vitamin c has an oily feeling but with this, it's not like that. Runs out fast though
I am so glad that this is back… It brightened up my skin and i am so happy with results. Already purchased another bottle, highly recommended!

I added this serum to my routine to see if it'll improve a few dark spots, and I started seeing results after 2 weeks of regular use! My dark spots are clearing up and blending with my face more and more everyday.

I was really excited for this because I haven’t really met a Cosrx product my skin doesn’t like but every time I tried to incorporate this into my routine, it left me waking with new blemishes/spots. There are a lot better vitamin c products for cheaper
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!
I started using this as my morning cleanser and just love the way it leaves my skin so smooth. It seems really gentle and non-drying, too.

This is a must have! Repurchased as soon as I ran out. Light and calming but effective. Leaves you feeling clean but not tight and stripped. Love the light scent as well. I will continue to repurchase.

I use this as my morning or in-between cleanser and I love it. There's also a nice calming effect if I go in for blackhead treatment and need something to sooth the swelling/redness. Very nice and easy to use product!
It smells so good, and my skin feels soft and clean. I wish it came in a giant shower gel form!
I use this every day. I love it. It does a good job at getting my face clean, but I don't wear a whole lot of makeup.
I love all Leaders sheet masks and this one did not disappoint. Your skin will thank you after one use; highly recommend!!!

I love sheet masks and have purchased many throughout the years, this one however isn't quite doing it. It's a little bit of a hassle to untangle the mask from the protective layers its encased in (not to mention wasteful). I'm confused why the mask is encased in so many layers because I didn't find it particularly hydrating at all. The mask didn't fit well, and actually stung my face and I'm usually not irritated by anything. There's so many other great sheet masks on this website, I'd recommend you purchase another instead.
Work well
I have dry sensitive skin and this doesn't irritate it while moisturizing.
The mask was very soothing and refreshing but unlike most, it really didn't fit well over my face. The mask was too big for my face and i had trouble keeping it on especially in the nose area

productName: On Pore Clarifying Toner 10% Glycolic Acid
review: I've been trying to find a new toner for a while now that will exfoliate but not sting my sensitive skin and I've found it. I decided to try the travel size version and see if it'd co-operate with my skin and it did. I also like that this formula works well with other serums in my routine. I'm not fond of the smell but it's not completely overbearing. I'll definitely look into repurchasing a larger bottle.

productName: On Pore Clarifying Toner 10% Glycolic Acid
review: I have oily skin. I got this in a set. It felt like it was burning my skin when I put it on. Genuinely horrible. Maybe this just isn’t for oily types? I still love SokoGlam.

productName: On Pore Clarifying Toner 10% Glycolic Acid
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I’m almost finished with the bottle. I have dry, sensitive skin tendencies. I wash my face and then follow with this before applying a prescription retinoid or the occasional AHA at night. It’s liquid, almost a soft water like consistency. Someone mentioned the bottle being convenient and I would agree with that. The valve on top acts as a good portion control. The product itself is just okay (especially for the price). There are definitely more effective products out there. It does have soothing qualities but even that I find to just be kind of meh.

I have sensitive skin that gets red easily but with this stuff, it calms my skin and the itchiness disappears fast. I use it morning and night and notice it does help other products sink into my skin better. Cica is a skin saver
This product is great. I do not break out as often as I did since I started to use this product.

I have to say, the design of the bottle is great. When I tip it over, not a lot comes out. Just a good amount . I tap 2-3 times and it is enough for my entire face. I like this a lot because for other products, I tap once and a lot comes out. this is totally worth it.
I have very sensitive skin--Why? Simply because I use prescription Retin- A every night--which is amazing---but it destroys the skin barrier. So, I am using this Cica Essence and LOVING IT!!!

I got this lip balm and was incredibly surprised by how different it looked compared to the picture. I got the Lychee one and it was a much darker shade than in the photo. It was a pleasant surprise though because the Lychee one matched my natural lip color which is awesome! I don't use too much to get color, just one swipe on one of the lips and then spread the color across both lips.
Just found out that I was looking at the first photo which is the Petal shade even though the shade selected for checkout is Lychee! Glad I made the mistake
