Not drying, good smell, good texture and pretty color. Stays on for quite a long time!

I've tried a few lip balms from nivea to laneige and they never sit comfortably on my lips. It always just creates an uncomfortable film throughout the day. But this formula thoughhhh *chefs kiss*. Never feels heavy even if you apply too much. Smells freaking delicious. And I finally understand what people mean when they say, they woke up with lush lips because this does that when used as an overnight lip mask! Thank you sokoglam for curating this!
The serum was calming, little to no scent, very watery gel like texture, the plump is a little loose. I use it to calm freshly squeezed pimples or to smooth the maskne area.

I've had extremely acne prone skin for longer than I can remember and I've tried so many different products without any results so for me discovering Soko Glam was an absolute game changer! My skin is in the best condition it's ever been but unfortunately having to wear a mask every time I go out means I'm still fighting breakouts. Being a massage therapist, I have to move around a lot a work, which means sometimes I get a little sweaty under my mask so by the time I get home my skin tends to be very red and inflamed. Now whenever I get a bad flare up, I know exactly what to grab! This serum has been amazing for reducing my inflammation and keeping my acne under control. I would 100% recommend this and I'm so happy I found this product.

I've used this for a few weeks and have been satisfied with the results. It is definitely hydrating (not oily or overly moisturizing though) and helps calm and cool my skin like it claims to. I haven't seen much difference with my acne, however, but it hasn't made it it worse at all. It's worth a try and quite affordable!

I love the Tea Tree Cleansing Water having repurchased it several times and overall it’s a much better value. As many have said this is a small bottle, so I only use it when needed. This is an extra step when breakouts occur particularly during the summer. It’s nice to have but not a necessity for me.

I enjoy the texture and very subtle rose scent as well are the glass packaging. I plan on putting a tiny bouquet of dried flowers in the bottle when I'm done with this product. I enjoy the thicker texture and that my skin is left looking plump and hydrated. My only issue is that it is kind of hard to get the product out of the small hole since it is a thicker texture, but I think it's coming out a bit easier now that I have used some.

I’m not sure if I’m being too harsh, but I had high hopes for this product and feel a little let down. I love mugwort, and Missha’s Artemesia First Treatment Essence is one of my favorite products because it prepares my skin beautifully for the rest of my routine. I was hoping with the added benefit of green tea, plus the thicker consistency, this would add an extra punch and would be a step up. Unfortunately, I definitely prefer the Missha mugwort product to this one, and once I run out of the Essencer I will probably not repurchase it.

First things first, the elephant in the room- yes, this is as difficult to get out of the bottle as everyone says. I’ve never experienced another product like it. You have to shake the bottle really hard to get one drop out, and I use 2 to 3 drops as part of my routine. It feels a little messy because I’m shaking the bottle so hard that the drops are haphazardly flying onto my hand (side note: this product is so thick you can/should apply it with your hands, not a cotton round). I love that the product is thick, I just wish there was a better way to dispense it. A dropper, maybe?

I got to try this moisturizer before launch and I really enjoy it. It’s great for my combination skin that leans more towards oily in the summer, it’s super lightweight and just melts into your skin super quickly. I love the packaging, the pump makes it super easy to get a regular amount and keep the product clean, and the rest of the packaging is very pretty. I also love the finish on my skin, it leans more towards matte but my skin still feels hydrated. If you want a super dewy finish from your moisturizer, you wouldn’t like this, but I appreciate the more matte finish because I feel less oily and shiny throughout the day. I do feel this helps balance my sebum and keeps my skin from over producing. Overall, a fantastic moisturizer, especially for people with more oily skin

There must be some magic in this bottle because my skin improved overnight after first use. I have sensitive skin and I have redness area around and under my cheeks which I couldn't figure out how to minimize. This gel moisturizer is the solution to one of my long-term skin concerns.

It feels amazing on the skin. It's lightweight but moisturizing enough to use it for my night routine. On top of that, no fragrance! We love that for her. I'm gonna have to stock up on this moisturizer because, seriously, my skin never looked this good.

I've been using this moisturizer for about a week. I love how lightweight it feels. I'm definitely planning on adding this to my weekly routine, if not daily! It leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated, without being too heavy. It's great for daytime moisturizing.
Another hit from Naturium. This is a great serum.
My skin glows after using this! This is my new daily serum

Beautiful vitamin C which helps to brighten my skin and work with my spf against free radicals. I have been wanting to the Naturium since I started seeing this on various YouTube videos and I am so happy that it’s available on Soko Glam as they ship to the UK. I love that the products are fragrance free. The packing is wonderful as I like the pumps. The package arrived in good time.
Naturium is now available in the UK through Space NK but will still be using Soko Glam due to not all products have been released to the UK yet

productName: On Shea Butter and Olive Hand Cream
review: I wanted to love this, but it's just ok. It has a medicinal, herbal smell that some people might not care for, but I like it. It just did not provide the amount of hydration and protection I need. This is probably better for people in more humid climates. I will use it but won't repurchase.

productName: On Shea Butter and Olive Hand Cream
review: I love this hand cream. I have very dry hands and nothing short of a heavy cream will keep my hands soft and moisturized. I also wash a lot so I need a good cream that doesn't have a lot of perfumes. This cream is light but very hydrating. Leaves my skin really soft and has a natural light smell that doesn't overwhelm me or my dog. I love it! Will be buying more!

productName: On Shea Butter and Olive Hand Cream
review: Good cream. Moisturizes well. Leaves my hands soft. I like how it’s in a tube dispenser for hygiene. Smells good too!

productName: On Shea Butter and Olive Hand Cream
review: Nice thick cream to relieve the winter dryness. I also like that it fits in my purse or work jacket easily.

productName: On Shea Butter and Olive Hand Cream
review: Light herbal scent, nice consistency and dies a decent job of moisturizing my hands. This is a smaller tube that easily fits in a purse.

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser
review: Absolutely love the versatility of this mask. Depending on my skin, I'll leave it on as a mask or just use it as a face wash. Love the clay to foam effect. Not drying, but still deep cleans.

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser
review: I used the entire bottle before giving a review, and I can honestly say that I can't live without this. Coming from somone with skin too sensitive for cerave, cetaphil and roche posay, this was perfect! My skin is glowing, no breakouts, and I can't wait to buy again!

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser
review: I’ve only used this for a few days but my enlarged pores around my nose look so much better now! Not to mention the few blemishes I have are starting to get smaller too. When I used the cleanser last night in the shower, I smeared it all over my face and then left it on for 2 minutes and rinsed with a cloth. When I say my skin has never been so soft using only ONE product, I mean it. I hadn’t even put my night cream on yet and I just couldn’t get over how soft and glowy my skin was. And it didn’t make my skin feel tight and pinched like other clay masks do. Forever keeping this in my arsenal!

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser
review: This is the best cleanser ever! I’ve been slowly switching to more rice based products and I noticed a complete difference. I’m waiting for this is come back in stock so I can order more than one to have on hand. I have oily sensitive skin and this was not harsh in any way and didn’t strip away the oils completely.

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser
review: Great cleanser that doesn't strip away the oils from face. I have oily acne prone sensitive skin and this is great! It calms my skin.

productName: On The Sustainable Cleansing Pad Set
review: These are okay cotton pads. Smoother than the texture you would get with disposables, if you prefer the light exfoliation. After one wash they already got a little wavy, and the tags stick out, but still function well. I used the net bag they came in to wash them as well, and about half of them escaped during wash, hahaha. So I will have to use one with a zipper. Unsure if worth the price, but I am always glad to add a reusable item to my drawer.

productName: On The Sustainable Cleansing Pad Set
review: I wanted to find washable, reusable pads with a laundry bag that would help with the application of my AM cleanse (micellar water). It helps distribute the product and cleanse my face and stays super soft after washes. I personally wouldn't use this for toner, but feel that it helps with my mess-free cleansing.

productName: On The Sustainable Cleansing Pad Set
review: I bought these on a whim because I was out of cotton pads. I don't mind them so far. I don't have sensitive skin, but I could see how these might feel a little rough for someone who does. Although, I personally like the extra exfoliation. The mesh storage and washing bag will shrink significantly if you dry it.

productName: On The Sustainable Cleansing Pad Set
review: and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On Wide Awake Brightening Eye Cream
review: I have only been using it a week but I can already see brightening under my eyes!

productName: On Wide Awake Brightening Eye Cream
review: I discovered this brand at Nordstrom and am in love with this eye cream. A little really does go a long way. I actually keep this in the refrigerator and it feels great and very smooth during application. My eyes do not look puffy at all!

productName: On Wide Awake Brightening Eye Cream
review: I've wanted to try this for a while because it's highly rated and I'm glad I did. The eye cream is worth all the hype and goes on very smooth. My eyes do look brighter in the morning so I will definitely buy again.

productName: On Wide Awake Brightening Eye Cream
review: Just another ordinare eyecream for me...
I have been using this for 2 weeks. Fine lines not as noticeable & no adverse reaction (I have sensitive skin). You don't need alot so it should last for quite awhile. Would purchase again.
I love the way this eye cream feels! It’s soothing and did not cause any issues.
Amazing product it’s a must !!!

I got this eye cream as a sample and the sample has lasted me SO long. A little goes a long way and it’s genuinely one of the best eye creams I have ever used. Sometimes I don’t know if eye creams are a scam or not but this is the real deal. I also have extremely sensitive skin and psoriasis. A lot of eye creams tend to burn or irritate my skin but this one does not at all! Loved this so much I just purchased the full size!
There is a lot of product - especially for the price. I haven't noticed a huge difference in my skin but it glides on nicely and I really enjoy using it.
This is what a real essence feels like, literally the best thing.
I just bought my second bottle of this toner, and I really love it. It makes my skin feel dewy, even, and moisturized.

I've been using this daily in the morning since I received it a few weeks ago. It hasn't made me breakout, but I'm not sure it's really doing anything either. I thought it would be more moisturizing than it is for me. My skin is sensitive and tends to be dry in places during the winter. I've been having an issue with products creating redness and this doesn't do that. I'm just not sure if it really is a product I needed in my skincare routine. I agree with another reviewer that sometimes it feels like it wants to pill when applying. A little does go a long way. So if this product works well for you it is worth it.
I love how simple the ingredient list is
Def hydrates my skin and feels good going on. Absorbs nicely but has a slightly strange texture (sort of pill-y) sometimes.

Smells like noxzema so the smell is strong if scent bothers you. Move on. I really enjoyed how the small sample that was sent to me smelled. Since I only got a sample I only gave 4 star cause I cant say how continued use does but from the sample I'm willing to try it! It cleaned thoroughly without making my skin feel tight or irritated.
I really wanted to like this cleanser…a tiny bit goes a long way but as soon as I used it for the first time, my skin got right and also itchy and got redness on my face.
Also it smells very much like medicine
But I don’t feel like my skin gets any brighter. My licorice toner is still top notch!
Holy grail (but the bottle got smaller)

I absolutely love this one! It’s so light and hydrating! Water like consistency and barely any scent at all. Perfect for day and night. It does it’s job by keeping my face bright and hydrated throughout the day. This is one product I’d like to have year round!!
I immediately saw an improvement in texture and tone of my skin! Smooth, even toned and hydrated skin. Neogen Rocks!

I have really big pores from years of not taking care of my skin and sleeping makeup on. I know y’all are cringing. This stuff though has really helped. I can see a noticeable difference. The only thing though I’d it is very drying and I have oily skin. It was making me peel. I switched to using every other day and that helped a lot.
i always come back to this product as it has saved my skin over and over again !
Leaves my skin so even and helps reduce my breakouts!! Would repurchase
This serum has clean, effective ingredients that your skin will love. Naturium products never disappoint. Leaves my skin hydrated and refreshed.
one of the few niacinimide serums that didn’t ruin my skin it was super nice !!!

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule
review: Just got this and have been using for a week! It’s a little thick in consistency but goes on very smoothly. It has a citrusy scent which I don’t mind. I like it so far!

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule
review: Product absorbs easily and doesn’t feel sticky. It had lightened up some discoloration on my face. I highly recommend it. It was recommended to me by the Soko aesthetician.

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule
review: I am using it for a month now. Observing that my dark spots are fading. Will keep using it. Leaves the skin very soft

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule
review: Really enjoy this serum, my skin feels firmer and brighter

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule
review: She says it makes her feel young and I've seen some difference in her face so far.

I don’t wear makeup but I love using this balm. A tiny bit goes a long way and I just love how it smells. The first time I used it it seemed to pull up a ton of yucky stuff out of my pores. Love this.

I’m in love with this cleansing balm. First of all, it’s pink so I was immediately happy. It completely melted into my skin and it thoroughly cleaned my skin. Lastly, I love the smell. Overall, it just feels luxurious to me. I definitely want to repurchase.

This was a great oil cleanser that smelled nice and worked well! The product itself is great! I just didn't like the packaging. The lid broke early on so I was no longer able to screw it back on. It was just awkward and an inconvenience for it to then on, have no lid.

Gave me one of my worst breakouts in years! Something I love about oil cleansing is the way it leaves your skin feeling moisturized. This one doesn’t do that. Don’t buy this. There are so many other good ones like Enature’s moringa balm

After suffering with severe sensitivity that included redness and swelling, I switched my skin care to a 2-step cleanse. I've been using this foam cleaner for nearly a year now, through all 4 seasons, and my face has done very well with this product. During the winter, it has become a bit more drying but a good moisturizer to follow does the trick.

The only issue I have is the the pump sticking and not returning to the upright position after pumping. This has happened on my last two bottles but it doesn't change my decision for 5 stars, just needs packing improvements.
nice product

I wanted a foam cleanser for traveling to replace my usual Soon Jung foaming cleanser, and this was a great choice except I didn’t like the smell very much. The smell is very mild though, so it wasn’t a big deal.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Eye Serum
review: This eye serum is fantastic for hydration and fine lines. I keep it in my skincare fridge, so when I apply the eye serum, it's nice and cool. I have been using the serum for the last three months, and during that time, I have found that it has actually gotten rid of 90% of the dark circles under my eyes, making them look much brighter. The only downside that I've found is that for me it doesn't do anything for the puffiness on the days when I don't get enough sleep.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Eye Serum
review: I’ve never had this kind of applicator before and I have to say I’m not sure I’m a fan. I tried this eye serum because I like their moisturizer but I’m not sure that this is doing anything for me.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Eye Serum
review: We are so sorry to hear this product did not work out for you. Please reach out to us via e-mail with your order number and we'll be happy to get you all sorted!

This stuff smells very good. I have figured out The mask version is great. Using the bottled version every night on my face was too much. I started using it on my décolletage and neck though and I’m honestly on my 4th bottle. I love it and it’s really brightened up the skin.
I had an inclination toward this stuff and I was correct. It's a little tacky when it first touches the skin, but it really helps absorb sheet mask serums and moisturizer.
This personally clogged my pores and didn’t work for my combo skin type, but I know of others who love it.

productName: On Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream
review: Doesn’t feel greasy or creasy ! Moisturizing for atriums the eyes and helps with circles under the eyes .

productName: On Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream
review: Like this eye cream. I noticed a slight difference in the texture of the skin around my eyes.

productName: On Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream
review: Love this eye cream! Minimizes fine lines. No burning my eyes.

productName: On Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream
review: I have been using this for about two weeks. It might have helped my crows feet and under eyes a bit, but I will need to continue with it, and time will tell.

productName: On Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream
review: I’ve been using this eye cream for about seven months now, morning and night. I’ve been trying to figure out a routine that works with my very sensitive, dry skin, and this has worked, while helping to combat the aging/tightening skin around my eyes. I find I can’t use a full pump-it is too much and would leave a shiny film that I am not going to wait to absorb. I do also use on patches of dry skin to keep them from flaking as much. Basically, I quite like this product. I might prefer a cream texture, but this has worked well for me.

productName: On Tako Pore One Shot Nose Pack
review: I would have rated it higher but I did not realize it doesn't go on the sides of my nose. I would rather have a strip that covers my entire nose.

productName: On Tako Pore One Shot Nose Pack
review: Sheet masks

productName: On Tako Pore One Shot Nose Pack
review: This works a lot better than other pore strips I’ve tried and you can see the dirt on the strip afterwards! I keep buying more!

productName: On Tako Pore One Shot Nose Pack
review: This works a lot better than other pore strips and you actually see the dirt on the strip when you take it off! I keep buying more of these and definitely recommend.

I liked this mask a lot. I wouldn't consider it the most moisturizing mask I've ever used, but my skin felt prepped and ready for my next skincare steps. I'm not sure about it's claims of evening out my skin, but ultimately I think it helped the other products soak in after it. I also felt like my skin looked fresh afterwards. The mask itself is soaked in product. I used the excess on my chest and literally both of my arms, both felt great after. Overall would recommend.

The mask is made of a thick material that absorbs a lot of product and really left my face moisturized. My skin has been getting drier during the transition into fall and this was a great addition to my skincare routine. Would definitely purchase again!

I’m writing this review after having just taken the mask off, and, WOW! I wasn’t sure what to expect from this product, but I was very pleasantly surprised. The first thing I noticed when I took the mask out was how drenched in serum it was, definitely a good sign. Besides that, the actual material of the mask felt very thick and of high quality. Not so thick that it was uncomfortable, but not as thin and flimsy as some other sheet masks I’ve tried. I left it on for 20 minutes per the instructions, and my skin felt quite soft and hydrated. I didn’t immediately notice any irritation on my reactive, combo skin, so I’m happy about that. All in all, I enjoyed this mask and would likely try it again.
Made my skin much more hydrated, less dry, and more clear. I recommend for those with dry skin

this is my new holy grail. i'm on tretinoin and the sides of my face are dry while my t-zone gets super oily throughout the day. this moisturizer is perfect for my crazy skin! it feels like an ointment but goes on smooth (leaves a sort of satin-y finish, like a primer). it's not wet or liquid-y at all but it is super moisturizing for every section of my face. it noticeably helps me control oil production around my nose and forehead. i do get hormonal acne and this doesn't agitate my skin or ever make me breakout; it's super gentle. i put this on right before i do my makeup and it helps my foundation go on beautifully. i wear makeup often and was looking for the right moisturizer to go underneath for so long. this is a great moisturizer and primer in one and can be used day and night. the only thing is that it's a bit pricey and the tube runs out fast if you use it every day. in my opinion, it's worth it!

I was looking for a moisturizer that could combat my dry skin, which is actually a new development for me. I used to have ‘normal’ skin, but I noticed it was feeling really dry suddenly. My skin does NOT absorb shea butter very well so was having a hard time finding a moisturizer for dry skin without that ingredient. Gave the Super Ceramide 100 Renewal Cream a try and YES MA’AM it works!! And it’s not heavy feeling AT ALL, which is so surprising considering the thick texture. It isn’t clogging my pores or any negative impacts on the rest of my skincare routine. I am almost finished with my first tube after around 3 months of use and just bought a second one. My new go-to!

I have sensitive skin (eczema, highly prone to rashes) and this moisturizer is my go-to when I want to hydrate my skin. On the rare occasion that I end up wearing make-up, I always follow my cleanse routine and then use this moisturizer as a primer for a smooth and hydrating base to prevent any flaking for a smooth BB cream application. I don't use this moisturizer daily as it's relatively pricey for less than 2fl oz, but it's great for travel and whenever you feel the need to deeply hydrate. It doesn't leave your skin oily and absorbs quickly, but it does go on thicker than a daily facial lotion.
I like this moisturizer. It is heavier than I am used to but it absorbs fairly quickly and doesn’t leave my face feelings greasy or oily.

It’s a rich moisturizer that hydrates your skin and leaves it soft. It doesn’t get your skin greasy. It’s perfect for winter time when your skin is very dry or when you need that well balanced hydration to fight fine lines. I love it everything it does for my skin.
Love this cream from Saturday Skin. The texture is whipped and creamy but light and absorbs into the skin well. It just feels very nourishing and the ingredients are top notch!

I have never loved a Moisturizer as much as this. I have oily, dry, normal and sensitive skin depending on where on my face. I asked the skin concierge to recommend a cream to help even out tone and texture while hydrating my skin and I'm so glad I listened to them and gave this a try. This sinks deeply into my skin and I actually feel like it hydrates my skin several layers deep. I've also seen an improvement in tone and texture and it works great at night and during the day under makeup. Really a little goes a long way. The key to applying this is take a small pea sized amount, warm between fingers and then smooth and press into the skin. If you apply straight to face it feels thick but when you warm up first, it melts into an almost serum like texture. Best part is the results! Cant say enough good things about this. LOVE!
This cream is gorgeous. It’s PACKED with incredible ingredients. It’s perfect for day or night. I like it for day and it looks bomb under makeup and sunscreen. I will be repurchasing
This cream is very good. I use it at night for my bedtime routine and it leaves my skin feeling soft the next morning.

I love to double cleanse and this oil makes it easy to do. It is light yet effective in removing all the city grime and makeup. A beautiful texture and barely there scent. I then follow with my cream cleanser.

I am a skin care junkie, but this cleansing oil is so amazing that I tried it once two years ago, and have never used another oil cleanser since. It is so gentle. The packaging is also amazing, which makes it easy to bring on trips with me.
This is a nice eye cream but when I first started applying this at night, the area around my eyes and neck would get red
Used entire bottle in 3wk because its so small, no difference and even felt drying

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

It's not the strongest retinol, so you won't get the best results. I compared it to a higher retinol formula I've been using for years. There is a stronger version of this eye cream from this brand. I'm trying that next.
This is my favourite cleansing balm. It melts as you massage it onto your skin and the smell is divine! My face feels squeaky clean without the uncomfortable stretchy feel! Love it!!
Pleasant scent, melts makeup easily, and I'm noticing that it clears out my pores better than a couple of other cleansing balms.
this is so good at taking off my makeup and sunscreen products! it smells mild and is not irritating at all! I would definitely buy it again.
This cleanser has helped my skin sooo much and has reduced my pores by a lot.
This balm completely melts when it meets water. It is a great summer balm, it helps brighten the mood with its citrus scent. The included spatula also helps scoop the balm.

I miss the old rose scent. The new scent smells heavily of tea tree, which is not my favorite. BUT this all-in-one moisturizing magic concoction is still one of my favorites. I use it when I’m having one of my lazy days. It keeps me moisturized and happy!

Sometimes I just cannot do all the steps in my routine. This was absolutely perfect. Worked well with my sensitive, acne prone, and combination skin. I just wish the price was a bit better. But it was kind of my holy grail for tough times.

I bought this product is for convenience when traveling. So, don’t have to carry 3 different bottles. However, after putting it on, it is sticky and a bit oily. After putting a thin layer moisturizer and a layer of sunblock, it is more sticky and oily. I had to use tissue to get rid of the oil after 10-15 minutes of putting them on. I hope they make this all-in-one multitem for oily skin and make it less oily. I have some outbreak at my forehead and my chin, but not too bad. However, I still consider purchase more for its convenience, especially when I have to get out of the door quickly! Still love this, but again, if they can make it for oily skin, that will be perfect!
and we will be happy to get you all sorted!
Love the way this smells, it smells kind of luxurious.
I use it as body wash and I can see how it vanishes the little pimples caused by sweating from working out. The scent is so calming too!
I received this product in my Ispy bag and fell in love. My skin just feels amazing after each use. I have not found a better product out there for my skin.

first off, i'm in love with the (non-fragranced) scent––think herbal, citrus, mint. but more importantly, i have really important needs when it comes to a cleanser: i like foam cleansers but I also really need something gentle that doesn't totally strip my skin, but the best gentle cleansers often come in a gel-type... this one is perfect. it's so gentle, it foams, and it cleans my skin perfectly. with my consistent skincare routine, i noticed a difference in that my skin looked clearer and felt lighter! in other words, this cleanser practically doubled the absorbency of my products. don't buy this if you don't like foam or if u expect this product alone to do something... it works best by amplifying what's already in your routine. but if you have your routine all worked out, don't hesitate to add this to your bathroom counter!!
I really like this cleanser, and a little really does go a long way. It doesn't dry my skin out, nor does it irritate my skin. It feels gentle but also like it works.

The combination of this ampoule and the Manyo toner cleared up a stubborn breakout and lingering redness in two days. I love the texture of it (little product is needed) and my skin has appeared much more even after one week of usage. I have used the Inward Agas ACue serum for almost two years, so this is a great alternative, especially with colder weather approaching.
I love the dropper that comes with this. The ampoule is lightweight and absorbs quickly. My skin looks calm and heathy since using it.

Before I started using this ampoule, I had a few breakouts, bumps, and redness on my face, which I presume is from a disrupted skin barrier. The morning after I used this ampoule, I noticed my skin looking a bit more calm and smoother. After a few more uses, my skin has started clearing up a bit. I'm not sure if it's because of this ampoule specifically that's helping, but the addition of it to my routine has definitely improved my skin texture. This is a product that I will most definitely be keeping in my routine!

I love a good ampule. I was going through some hormonal break outs and I paired this up with a vitamin c and together it visibly reduced my pimples redness by more than 60%. And that's just in 1 night. The ampule sinks into your skin, it's not heavy and oily. The ampule is definitely worth trying.
Really great addition to my winter skincare routine! It's moisturizing without being too harsh. I can combine it with my exfoliating products and feel my skin is more vibrant after just a few uses.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Toner Pad
review: I bought a couple jars of this for my teenage son to fade his blemishes quicker but I'm loving using this toner pad on mornings when I don't feel like cleansing. My skin feels clean and hydrated after using it.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Toner Pad
review: Best part of my morning routine. Instantly refreshes my skin and makes me feel energised.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Toner Pad
review: it's excellent to get rid of dirt and unseen particles stuck on your face at the end of the day. I love the scent, it's refreshing. I have sensitive and combination skin. Although it cleaned my face well but left my face red for a while. I use it once or twice a week for now.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Toner Pad
review: I love this product. I used to use the serum and recently bought this to use in the morning when I have to dash out my place. The pads are big to cover large areas of the face. One quick swipe on all four sides and I’m ready to apply the rest of my skincare routine. My face looks brighter and more even toned.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Toner Pad
review: Love this product my third time buying after trying the trial pack with the sample eye patches and serum which i also love these wipes make my skin feel fresh and non drying they also have lighten my dark spots a great product

productName: On Calming Clear Milk Peel Cleansing Balm
review: Absolutely adore this product, makes my skin so soft and smooth without irritation.

productName: On Calming Clear Milk Peel Cleansing Balm
review: As a person with moderately sensitive skin, I am always a bit wary when adding in an exfoliant to my routine. **HOWEVER** this cleansing balm is so light and refreshes my skin after each use. I have combo/sensitive skin with my t-zone being the prime area for where I get clogged pores and hormonal breakouts. I have to say that even after a few uses my pores were noticeably smaller and clear. This product will definitely be a staple in my routine.

productName: On Calming Clear Milk Peel Cleansing Balm
review: I liked it when I first started using it, partially because I liked the idea of a balm so traveling with it is less of a mess, but after I tried a regular cleaning oil I realized this didn't do as good of a job getting the daily grime off my skin. Soo there's nothing wrong with it but I wouldn't recommend it to anyone either.
At first I bought this just because of the packaging, but the masks are very hydrating and great for sensitive skin. I will buy again!
Hydrating and soothing and most importantly, doesn't break me out! Would repurchase again.
The mask itself is so soft! It leaves my skin feeling very hydrated and soothed. Will buy again and again!
Worth trying

Something about products with snail in them cause me to break out. I had removed everything new in my regime to determine the cause of my new breakouts and these weird bumps I got and determined it was this product. Don’t know if it’s my sensitive skin but I didn’t like it

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
Love, love, love this! My skin is so soft and it smells amazing!!
This is a great serum! It has such a nice texture, didn't make my skin feel greasy or sticky at all. I do think I notice visible improvement in my skin as well, for hydration. Loved it.
Benton
Let's Carrot
Multi Oil
Dermatologically Tested
I really like how thin the wand is because the product clump less and is easy to apply on both upper and lower lashes. I do see some lengthening and the product does last long hours.
The only minus point I can see is that when I just curl my lashes and apply the product, the curl doesn't hold super well after a couple of hours.

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Ve (Glow)
review: The serum is really thick and the applicator doesn't work super well. Is also pretty small compared to other products on Soko at a similar price point.

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Ve (Glow)
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Ve (Glow)
review: Has a goopy consistency and a weird applicator. Also there's not enough product in the bottle so it's hard to tell if it's provided any results before running out.

productName: On Yuja Niacin Brightening Peeling Gel
review: Brighting skin great smell nice have use daily

productName: On Yuja Niacin Brightening Peeling Gel
review: Love how bright and clean it leaves my skin, and it is very gentle as it smooths out the skin!

productName: On Yuja Niacin Brightening Peeling Gel
review: i've been using this for the past few weeks, and am amazed at how well this peeling gel exfoliates my skin! i've used other peeling gels like this, but none of them have made my skin feel as soft and moisturized as this one. 5/5 stars for me!

productName: On Yuja Niacin Brightening Peeling Gel
review: This is the first peeling gel I've used in a long time, and I really like it. My skin feels so soft afterwards. I took off one star because the removal process is very messy -- it gets everywhere! -- but the results speak for themselves. I also love that it contains Yuzu, a Vitamin C superstar.

productName: On Yuja Niacin Brightening Peeling Gel
review: I was expecting this to be harsh but actually it is very gentle on the skin. I saw a difference in brightness even after the first use. Citrus scent, gentle on the skin, easy to wash off and leaves no residue. I use this everyday and my acne marks are fading rapidly.
It definitely does clean your face but i think it for someone with oily skin it will be great
I expected something different but it is still a nice cleanser. More creamier than I thought. Probably good for dry skin rather than oily

My favorite cleanser I've ever used. I use it as the second step after a cleansing balm and my face is in love. At first I was like ... $34? For a daily cleanser? That size? But a little goes a LONG way with this stuff. A pea size amount is enough to lather over my whole face, so I tell it will last a good long while.
Almost every product recommended to me by SokoGlam's skin concierge has been a good one. However, I don't know what it is about this toner that causes me to have a reaction. Big disappointment.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
This one my favorite of all.

I absolutely love this lip mask. I've been using it for 2 weeks now and my lips feel more plump and moisturized during the day. My lip stick goes on more smoothly and stays longer. I feel like there has been barrier repair. The formula texture is nice. It goes on like a thick lip balm. Not tacky or oily. No smell. Not much product is needed so the small volume will last for quite sometime.
Legit love this product. My lips are soft. I put it on every night with my skincare routine. Just very easy to keep up with. My lips are conditioned. Love this.
Everyone who says you can’t see the color is lying. Which is fine at night, but you can definitely see the color on your lips. Despite this, it’s a great product and is super moisturizing

This was the only item I bought recently that I didn't feel I "need" and was a fun splurge. This lip mask is most definitely a need and I don't even get dry lips. I wake up and my lips do look smoother and just better. Plus it smells amazing and feels rich but not toooooo sticky.

I’ve never used a lip mask before, but the Bubi Bubi Lip Mask has been the PERFECT first experience! Before this lip mask, I was having to reapply chapstick 4-6 times a day, and my lips still burned and felt dry. The FIRST night I used this lip mask, I only had to apply chapstick twice the next day! Now I only use chapstick once towards the end of the day. I LOVE this!
Not sure if this product really reflects the results as described in the purchase/product description. I will not purchase this item nor recommend to someone.
We're so sorry to hear that this cream didn't work out for you. Please reach out to us at
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

I got this mask in a skin brightening mask pack, and I LOVED it, It tightened and brightened my skin, and left me with soft, supple clear skin. The scent was subtle and the remaining serum patted in so nicely, I sealed with my moisturiser and went about my day! LOVE! Can't wait for it to come back in stock!

Best sheet mask I have tried so far. It almost has a gel like texture and it feels so soothing on my skin. It doesn’t slide around my face while using it which was nice. Honestly, I didn’t even want to take it off. Will buy again for sure!
Helps your skin recover from environmental stressors! Put it in the fridge to chill a bit and it’ll feel so refreshing!

I never write reviews but this sheet mask has become one of my all time favorites - and I've used a LOT. IT's extremely moisturizing and hydrating. If you don't like very wet sheet masks this might not be the one for you - but for someone with dry or dehydrated skin this is perfection.
this face mask is so great for when skin is dry and irritated from cold weather

productName: On Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch
review: I am currently wearing some as I write this. They are such a delightful treat after a long day. After using these eye patches, my under eyes look incredible and my skin feels so refreshed.

productName: On Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch
review: I’ve tried quite a few eyepatches and I adore these. I actually put the smaller patches on my eyelids sometimes and they adhere quite well. I like to keep these in my skincare

productName: On Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch
review: The second lid/ inner lid was really hard to pop / pull off. The product itself is great- but not if sure I will get again or if it’s even worth it due to how difficult it was to get the lid off.

productName: On Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch
review: -1 star because opening the lid is a pain. I had to pry it off with tweezers after breaking the plastic cover because it would not budge (maybe too much mucin suction?).

productName: On Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch
review: Otherwise it's great. I pop it in the fridge and use them whenever I exfoliate or use retinol to hydrate and soothe my skin. Fit well under my eyes/cheek and fits well under my mouth/on my chin. I have no issues with it sliding off.

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Po (Pore Tightening)
review: Have not used long enough to see if helps with what claims to help with. But my skin feels good after application.

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Po (Pore Tightening)
review: My sister has been using this for two weeks and she could see her pores shrinking and blackheads decreasing. She had severe acne on her cheeks, chin, and forehead. But after using this serum and moisturizer, her acne has lessened.

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Po (Pore Tightening)
review: Purchased this for the first time, gave it a 2 week trial and I can say it is working. It goes on velvety & it smells really nice. I have noticed my pores seems to be a minimizing around my cheeks & nose area. Will continue to purchase this in the future!

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Po (Pore Tightening)
review: I bought this during the sale since I’ve been eyeing it for a while. I’ve used it 3 or 4 times and it really does what it claims. I have oily skin and when I wear this my pores look smoother and less visible. My skin is also less oily throughout the day. This makes an excellent makeup primer as well. I’ve tried it under tinted moisturizer and my skin looks so smooth and even. The texture is light and when you rub it into your skin, it leaves an almost velvety finish. I’d definitely buy this again.

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Po (Pore Tightening)
review: I was gifted this product and I was super nervous because I have sensitive skin, but no bad reactions and I’ve been using this for a month now! This product product was perfect for my big pores, especially for skin care before makeup! Absolutely love love love and it minimizes my pores for sure!

i have been using this for about a month and find that it's been really good for my dry skin. i haven't found it to be too sticky after application, it's just dewy! i also have very sensitive skin and it hasn't broken me out or irritated it at all. a little goes a long way; i haven't even made a dent in it. i will be repurchasing for sure!

I was really looking forward to this product and the initial application was truly so refreshing and soothing. But, the product doesn't seem to sink into the skin and though it provided a nice glow, I was left with a very sticky face.

This is my new "night cream," and I love it! The ingredients are awesome, it feels good on my skin, and it helped sooth some irritation I had from a glycolic acid toner I used this week. Personally, I feel it is a little too heavy for me for daytime use (I have combo skin), but I had bought this with the intention of using it at night only, so that's fine with me.
I am using this as my new night cream, and I love it! My skin feels soft, moisturized, and has a lovely glow. Love the ingredients, too.
Using this product in 90+ degree weather it is silky, glides right on and has an airy feeling to it also no fragrance is a big plus.
It’s really moisturizing but it pulls soooo bad especially if you are layering it :( I might have to stick it in my night routine instead.
and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

i'm really on the fence about this cream, on the one hand it is really hydrating for my skin and doesn't leave a greasy residue like other creams with oils in them (especially since i have oily skin) and i definitely think my face is a lot more clearer since i've been using it. however, it really smells like celery (it disappears in a few minutes) and whenever i use my sunscreen after (either a matte one or a water-based one) my skin begins to flake, as if the cream is causing the sunscreen to start peeling off my face. it makes my skin look like it's flaking :((

productName: On Fresh Herb Origin Eye Cream
review: This eye cream is very moisturizing and easily applied to the skin. You only need a small amount and there’s so much that comes in the tube. Just with a couple uses of it, I already see and feel a difference in the moisture of my under eyes. Not sure of other claims but I use it for the moisturizing properties

productName: On Fresh Herb Origin Eye Cream
review: I was recommended this eye cream from the Soko Glam team and have loved it since. It's light and moisturizing with a really pleasant scent that reminds me of fruity pebbles. For me, I liked it better than the Etude House Moistfull Collagen Eye Cream because it seemed to hydrate a bit better for longer.

productName: On Fresh Herb Origin Eye Cream
review: I bought this after using a Nacific sheet mask and really enjoying the fresh herbal scent and results. This eye cream is nice for PM use (too sticky/too long to absorb for my daytime routine) but at my age I need a thicker, bouncier, firming eye cream for night that targets wrinkles. So this won’t be a repurchase for me, but for a younger person looking for a solid PM eye cream as a preventative and moisturizing measure, this could be a great choice.

productName: On Fresh Herb Origin Eye Cream
review: I actually got this product in my monthly Ipsy bag. I love it! I really wanted a product that would brighten my eye area and this has worked a lot better than the former cream I was using. The fact that it is clean and cruelty-free makes it a winner in my book!

productName: On Full Fit Propolis Synergy Toner
review: I've been using this along with the COSRX Snail 92. It's worked wonders on my skin, keeping it well hydrated. The toner is thicker compared to others that I have, but I don't mind it since I own serums that are similar in consistency.

productName: On Full Fit Propolis Synergy Toner
review: I have dry sensitive skin. And this toner is great! It is hydrating and it doesn’t burn. I’ve always had a particular dry patch on my left face cheek for years, I’m talking years, and this toner along with the Cosrx propolis ampoule and face cream smoothed out all dry texture on my face including that dry patch. And thats when I realized I have found my holy grail products.

productName: On Full Fit Propolis Synergy Toner
review: Propolis is an amazing ingredient for the skin! Definitely moisturizing and helps with texture. I do prefer it in a serum rather than a toner. I think this toner feels too sticky and not as potent as I want it for propolis.

productName: On Full Fit Propolis Synergy Toner
review: my skin definitely loved this product! i bought this in aug and its the 2nd of nov and im close to running out, will be repurchasing cause it’s that good

productName: On Full Fit Propolis Synergy Toner
review: First bought when the supply chain made my normal toner impossible to find.

This face lotion is a little heavy and slow to absorb. I much prefer gel creams over something like this. The first couple of times I used it, it made me break out. I have somewhat sensitive skin, but it tends to be dry and breakouts are rarely ever a problem for me. I can’t imagine someone with oily or combination skin could use this and not have problems. It’s also kind of strongly scented, and not a scent that I enjoy. I will probably return it.
and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

I love this product but it's a bit too much as a day moisturizer for my skin. Great overnight but leaves my skin a bit greasy by the time I wake up. My husband has drier skin and loves it for any time of day. I may use it during they day in the drier winter months but it's overkill in the summer months, for me.

I have combination skin, but lately during the colder months, my skin has been feeling extra dry. The egg mellow cream not only hydrated my skin, it was gentle enough that it was soothing to my sensitive skin and left my face feeling smooth. It’s my favorite moisturizer. A little goes a long way.

I purchased this product back in September when I had gone back to work full time so that meant wearing two masks for 8+hours everyday. This product has helped me control my maskne so much! After two weeks of use I noticed the small irritated bumps around my chin and jaw have gone down. Since then, I've repurchased twice! It also helps keep the oils in my T-zone in control!
Smells really good

I have really oily skin that’s acne prone and I was looking for a good niacinamide serum that wouldn’t make my skin more oily. So far so good with this one! Makes my skin a little bit tacky after applying but feels fine with moisturizer. No breakouts so far with it at all

I bought this after a recommendation from a skin concierge for my oily and hormonal breakouts. I've used it for a few months now 3-4 days on and couple days off. Hasn't really done anything for me and I'm just as oily if not more and continued to have breakouts. Pretty disappointed since it was recommended so highly by the skin concierge and its quite pricey compared to other products on Soko Glam.

I've been using this product for about 2 months now. I do not recommend it. The product leaves a super greasy look and it also looks very glowy on top of that. I purchased both the serum and cream and have been very disappointed with both products. It feels very sticky when you apply it and it does have a mild smell some might consider strong. It is a good amount of serum but not worth the price or the hassle.

I have long, thick, wavy, and red died hair. It is damaged and many shampoos and conditioners do not work. I had recently received a purchase for hair products from Soko Glam and it worked great, so I said to give this a shot. I left it in for about 10 minutes and when I rinsed my hair was so soft and easy to brush. The end result smooth tangle free locks! A must try!

A little bit thick for my liking, I thought it will be more like a cream, I didn't see any change after I used, my hair is thick, no like 4C or something like that, but thick and treatment with a paste consistency didn't work for me
My hair is extremely coarse and dry it really made my hair soft just after one treatment it is very rich
Iam glad I purchased it this hair cream
My hair looked so much healthier after just a few times using this

productName: On 7 Wonders Mediterranean Olive Brightening Mask
review: Love this mask it left my skin feeling hydrated and it looked more even. I recommend using these items before you apply makeup

productName: On 7 Wonders Mediterranean Olive Brightening Mask
review: This mask was kinda hard to handle, the instructions weren't exactly right as there were protective gauze on both sides that needed to be taken off. It was a little hard to get on, but stayed on well one I got it on. I liked the jelly like soft texture of the mask itself.

This face wash has lots of fragrance but more importantly leaves an almost sticky residue like cheap soaps do on the skin. Very disappointed with this product. I suggest Good Light cosmic dew instead.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

okay i’m picky when it comes to face wash but this is UNREAL. it foams really well, doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry, and you only need a little bit and it goes a long way!! it hasn’t made me break out which is something i struggle with when trying new products. i really like the scent too!
Love the ingredients.

Purchased this for my mom and she didn't really see any changes in her skin after finishing the bottle. Her skin is slightly more nourished but there wasn't a brightening or smoothing effect seen. Maybe this is better for the younger folks, whose wrinkles or spots haven't been around for too long.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I had dehydrated skin for a long time without realizing it - I always thought it was just dry because dry and dehydrated skin present the same (dry). Dry skin is treated with oil/ceramides, while dehydrated skin needs water. No amount of oil improved my skin's hydration, however this little serum completely changed my skin! My skin is back to a normal water content and is dewy and lovely, and my barrier is restored. This serum is excellent for dehydrated skin - I've tried other water based serums but this is my favorite, I'm on my 5th bottle with no plans of stopping. I highly recommended IF your skin is dehydrated. I've seen a few reviews saying it didn't work for them - could be that they need oil not water. If you feel like your skin is dry but nothing helps, give this serum a try!

I've struggled to find a good serum or ampoule that hydrates my skin without clogging my pores. This doesn't clog my pores resulting in a break out or cystic acne the next morning, but it also is only mildly hydrating. It's thin and watery, and barely feels like I'm adding any additional moisture. Maybe 10%. I'll finish the bottle, but definitely wouldn't repurchase.
Had high hopes for this, but didn't hydrate as much as I would've loved!

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Capsule Lotion
review: Received a sample of this product with one of my orders. Felt my skin get softer over a few days. Need to purchase a full bottle of this stuff. It's the best!

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Capsule Lotion
review: I started with the sample and went from there. No breakouts and I've notice the difference with my dark spots. Thanks!

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Capsule Lotion
review: This has been one of my favorite moisturizers! It really went far and felt smooth with no residue! I love the ingredients and the vitamin C capsules!just an overall very well formulated moisturizer!

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Capsule Lotion
review: It's a great lightweight face lotion for the summertime but a little too lightweight for cold winter.

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Capsule Lotion
review: This feels like a light moisturizer. Application was great but after a while, my face feels tight. I would layer another light moisturizer on top of this. Great packaging though!

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: Great product. Leaves my face feeling soft and hydrated. Absorbs well. Would buy again.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: I brought this product because to get some extra skincare benefits. I’m dealing with a lot of irritation and redness at the moment. And since I’ve been using this, I’ve seen a difference. I really like this product, there is no scent and it absorbs quickly!

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: I use this product after the cleanser , I like the texture and accept well of the products that I put after it.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: I have pretty sensitive skin and this helps keep it mellow all day long. It does have a slimy texture but it soaks in rather quick and doesn’t leave a sticky residue. Recommend for anyone who needs something to keep their skin calm all day

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: Instantly calms my skin. absorbs quickly.

This works well for my scalp I think! I use it once a week, on alternating weeks. I like to pH balance my scalp, since it's really my scalp that needs the work. Smells like apple fragrance, and is a good ACV sulfate shampoo.
Got this as an order gift and have reordered since. I find that it clears scalp debris/irritation without drying out my hair. Happy to have found this!
I love using this product whenever I feel like my scalp has build up and needs to be purified! It leaves my head feeling very fresh afterward.
Cleanses all dirt and grime you collect throughout the day without stripping your hair from its naturals oils!

It felt nice at first but just irritated my scalp as I continued using it. I had to stop. I wanted to like it and wished it could have helped my dry scalp, but it didn’t and I was losing more hair in the process.

I've been purchasing my skincare products exclusively from Soko for close to 4 years now and I'm a little ashamed to admit that I think this might be the first review I have written. I CANNOT live without this product. I use it mostly as a spot treatment but will occasionally use it all over my face. I feel like it's most effective as a spot treatment. I experience hormonal breakouts and will sometimes have a really deep cystic spot beginning to form. When that happens I will spot treat the area with this at night. If I can tell the breakout has extra potential, I'll use a tiny dab of it in the morning. This product makes my breakout completely disappear, and quickly. I have never used a product that works this well. 10000/10
Works well against acne and other irregularities on the face but against fine wrinkles or stronger, it doesn't work. Tretinoin is much better choice.
Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you.

I love this product and use it twice a day. It works in the morning by itself at gently removing the oil that accumulated overnight without drying out my skin. It works great as a second step after a cream cleanser to remove the last of my make up.

This cleanser is nice but expensive for the amount you get. I also feel like I end up using more because it doesn't It doesn't really lather since it is oil-cut. It is not overly drying and has nice light and pleasing scent. I might use this as a travel combo cleaner when I don't want to bring both my oil cleaner and water-based cleaner. 5 stars for overall quality, 4 stars from a value for cost perspective.
This cleanser removes *all* the oils from your skin. If you need that every now and again, it's great. When you need balance, it's not for the every day.
This is definitely being added to my skin care routine. I love how it makes my skin look amazing!
I love this gua sha! A great product for the price. I broke mine (dropped it on tile floor) so I am repurchasing.

I have a habit of clenching my jaw and that leads to tension headaches. Not only is this a great way to get the products absorbed into your skin, but is a wonderful way to massage my tight facial muscles.
Pretty and does its job.

I like the shape of this gua sha - it’s easy to hold. I just received this so it’s too soon to say much. However, I have enjoyed using it and love the rose quartz. I am following the directions and I do see some changes in reduction of excess fluid in my face.
I wasn’t expecting too much because it seems watery at first but it feels great. My skin is less oily and feels fresh after using it. Def buying again.

My skin has become more sensitive & dryer as I'm approaching my 40's, this is a great serum that's perfect for combo skin & Sensitive skin! It gently moisturizes the dry areas while Tea Tree keeps breakouts at bay! The HUGE size is Well worth the price; you definitely get what you pay for! I took a chance on this product and I'm so happy I did! I would recommend & purchase again!

I was intrigued by the ingredients and its benefit claims so I tried it out. I was amazed by how big the bottle was! the teatree smell upon application is definitely noticeable but disappears almost immediately. It's runny, feels lightweight, and sinks in the skin almost immediately. I don't really notice any amazing aftereffects from application but when trying out new products and said product/s anger my skin and rebel, this ampoule definitely helps calm my skin tf down. It definitely feels hydrating too. To me, just the right amount of hydration. I like it overall!
This really helps my face cool down.
Bottle is really big and you get so much product!
It has a nice texture and easy to absorb on my face. But the scent is quick strong for my liking.

I bought this moisturizer for the humid DC summertime and have enjoyed it so far. It goes on light and absorbs quick, which is nice when I want to put it on and go to sleep. However, for the price, I won't be replacing the pot once it's over -- it's does its job but doesn't blow my mind.

I have been using this for several months, and it's a great moisturizer if you have sensitive or acne-prone skin. I was dealing with some hormonal acne just on my chin (normal skin type on rest of my face), and this leaves my skin hydrated without causing breakouts. I also have pretty sensitive skin and this is gentle with no harsh components. It has a slightly stretchy texture, but smells nice and a little goes a long way. I'm on my third jar of it, and would definitely recommend it for people with oily or combination or sensitive skin.

I like the way my skin feels after I use this. I have oily skin so this moisturizes my skin without making it greasy. There are 2 draw backs for me. One was the fact that it feels sticky as if you're putting glue on you face. The second was the smell. It's not super strong but I'm not a fan of the scent.

This is such a lovely cream moisturizer. There is a light/lovely scent that goes away after a while, which I don’t mind because I think it’s divine. The cream is on the thicker size, so I use a pea size amount in the AM (face and neck) and double that amount at night. The consistency is whipped like and has a luxurious feel to it. My skin can seriously get so dry in the fall/winter months to the point where its flaky, tight and painful. This cream has been a life saver, I feel so hydrated all day when using this!

I have comb/oily skin and this cream is extremely thick. There’s such a thing as over moisturizing that ends up not working too well on my skin and creates build up faster. Would pass on this if you’re an oily person.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I've bought this product about four or five times now, and I must say it has become a staple in my skincare routine! I currently have pretty normal skin, not too oily or too dry, but I try to focus on hydration because I like for my skin to look supple and maintain its youthfulness. This toner has helped with that A TON! Also, I'm vegan, so it's great that not only is this an amazing product, but also none of its ingredients are causing unnecessary harm or torture to animals!
i've been using this twice a day for a few months now and it's pretty good! can't say i notice a huge difference in my skin but it does help w hydration i think

First time I used it it felt that it was hydrating my skin which felt nice. I've been using it for 3 weeks now and so far it feels like my skin is less dry despite the California summer heat. Definitely recommended. My skin is more on the dry side now /slight oily but back when I was living in Asia it was more on the oily side. I'm really happy with my purchase worth it.

Up until now, the toners that I have used always felt very dry or a bit hot and I thought that was normal (apparently not lol). I'm still trying a lot to eventually find products that work with my skin but for the toner I think this is the one!

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Cream
review: I really wanted to love this moisturizer because it has some amazing ingredients, but something in it seems to be clogging my pores. I've tried switching out other products, but every time I use this multiple times in a row, I notice clogged pores. However, it's definitely gentle and hydrating and might work really well for others! There is a slight candy-like scent to it, but I found it to fade quickly so it didn't bother me. It's also has a gel-cream texture, which worked surprisingly well for my dry skin as the weather got colder. I don't regret giving this a shot, but I won't be repurchasing.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Cream
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Cream
review: all-rounded moisturizer that I would recommend to someone who has oily to normal skin type. Comapred to other snail moisturizers that have a more sticky feeling than yea ... this is an alternative.

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Essential Cream
review: Love this moisturizer. Been using it as a night cream since it doesn’t have spf. It’s light and hydrating. The first tube lasted half a year maybe and just got my second one. This time I’m pairing it with the serum in the same series for extra moisture in the winter. So far so good!

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Essential Cream
review: I've used this cream in the past, but I like to try different products. I've come back because too many creams are gel creams and, while those are great at moisturizing, they tend to fill my pores. This one does not, gets absorbed easily, and isn't tacky. I guess it really is balanced. :)

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Essential Cream
review: Tried to use this as a night moisturizer and I love it! Doesn’t leave a sticky residue on my skin and I didn’t break out. It definitely left my skin looking bright in the morning. Will repurchase in the future!

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Essential Cream
review: Wow this was like trying to rub glue on my face. My hair kept sticking to my chin/cheeks and making me itchy. It did not moisturize enough and I found myself using several pumps per use. I had to return this.

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Lip Plumper
review: I was surprised by how much it tingled. I like the glossiness of the plumper but TBH, I thought I was purchasing just a lip gloss. But the added tingly is ok.

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Lip Plumper
review: It completes my evening skin care routine!

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Lip Plumper
review: definitely can feel the plump king effect! visually not sure if there’s a difference but i like the tingle and the moisturizing effect

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Lip Plumper
review: Love this product than all the plumping products at Sephora.

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Lip Plumper
review: It plumps but leaves my lips feeling dried out when the product is wiped off. My lips began to flake and peel after 2 days of use. 😭 I think I would need to pair it with a separate lip balm for moisture.
Unfortunately, I was not too happy with this product. It was too oily and leaves a shiny residue on my face. I really wanted to like it, but will not be repurchasing again.

I love this cream. It’s thick enough for my combination skin but isn’t too oily. I like the texture and the slight fragrance. I’ve purchased twice and will purchase again. It also isn’t irritating when my skin is sensitive after being outdoors.

I purchased because of the great reviews but this is VERY oily. Be careful to bot use too much. I don't mind using on my neck and hands but it's a bit much, too oily for my skin. Would probably work well in cold dry areas, just use a little.

This product has a light, natural scent and doesn't irritate sensitive combination skin, which is great. But I have to second the observation someone else made in their review: it is SO shiny. It makes my face look and feel oily. It doesn't absorb as well as I'd expect. It might be ideal if they explicitly labeled this as a night cream. My rating reflects that I'm a tad disappointed because I hoped I could use it both night and day.
That said, as a night cream, it works well. It's rich stuff without making me break out, despite that I'm somewhat prone to breakouts from moisturizers. I like the gentle, herby fragrance.

I have dry skin and I did enjoy the feeling and smell of the product. Not overwhelming in my opinion. However, I still typically need a more moisturizing cleanser but this is nice when I am breaking out due to hormonal acne. I gifted it to my sister since she leans oily and she is a fan.
I have dry, sensitive skin and this cleanser has not irritated it or dried it out. It lathers up wonderfully and leaves me with a great base for the rest of my routine.

I received this product as complimentary. I have dry, sensitive, thin skin. I would not buy this for myself. However, for someone who has oily or acneic skin, this would probably be helpful. With this said, I did try it and found that it dried my skin. I did like the aroma.
and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

I am a huge fan of bakuchiol, and I like this mask. But it’s very runny, and I’ve noticed it’s not as moisturizing as I’d like it to be. I don’t know if I’ll repurchase it, but I’ll use the rest of the pot.
This product didn’t really do anything for me- I don’t see any exfoliating results

productName: On Cleanse Me Softly Milk Cleanser
review: This has been such a great milk cleanser for me during the start of the cold/winter season. My skin usually gets incredibly dry once there is any signs of the cold coming in and this has been such a great morning cleanser, soft, gentle, non irritating for my sensitive skin! As i've gotten older I've become sensitive to a lot of artifical/scents, but I found this line refreshing as the natural light scents are herbal/tea like and actually pleasant. I have the whole Sioris line, I use it for morning and night and it's been so gentle and super hydrating! I've been using it for over two weeks (even on the first day I felt the hydration instantly) and it really soothes a lot of the dry skin pains I would usually have in the morning after washing up. I can tell the difference on the days I'm lazy and don't use the Sioris line! I also break out easily when using new lines of skin care and seemed to especially with Korean cosmetics/skin care (IDK why and I get super sad about it bc I know Korean skincare lines are more advanced than US lines.) I'm just so happy Ive finally found something that works for me!!

productName: On Cleanse Me Softly Milk Cleanser
review: Absolutely one of the best cleansers I've ever used! If not because I understand how skin routine works, I wouldn't be using moisturizers; it leaves my skin feeling so silky soft, bouncy, and still feels hydrated. I absolutely love it, so much so, I literally cannot imagine my routine without it anymore. I use it as its own in my am routine and match it up with a jelly-like cleanser for the pm routine. My skin has never been this soft and so healthy. Even my mom, who has super sensitive and dry skin nowadays, loves it. It works miracles!

productName: On Cleanse Me Softly Milk Cleanser
review: I bought this cleanser as I really like milk cleansers as the first step of my skincare routine but this one has not wowed me. The pump gets stuck after one pump but you need more than one pump of product to really cleanse your face. My bottle has stayed mostly full because of this, I wish I would've returned it during the return window. I think there are probably more functional and beneficial milk cleansers out there.

I for one do not have any sort of eye cream so trying this was very nice. The cream did not burn my eyes and actually really moistures my under eye which is a huge plus because I usually have really dry under eye on top of having dark circles. I tried it both with other products and Neogen products and it works great. Will definitely repurchase

This eye cream does indeed hydrate the skin and does not carry a scent. Great for folks with sensitive skin! Fragrance is just an incessant ingredient. However aside from them hydration, I did not find a significant improvement in wrinkles or dark circles. This may also be due to the fact it requires extended use though as I know these things take time.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I've been using this product since March 2022, and it remains to be my favorite cleanser. It's very gentle and leaves my skin feeling clean and soft without being stripped. I love that it's free of sulfates, silicones, parabens, alcohol, fragrances, and certain essential oils that irritate my skin. I also love that its ingredients are minimal and that the featured ingredient, niacinamide, is listed high in the list of ingredients. Thank you SokoGlam for adding Naturium!
It doesnt strip oil, it leaves me feeling clean and soft and results in no irritation, exactly what i want from a cleanser.
I’ve made a conscious effort to add Niacinamide to my routine, and I’m really loving this. It smells terrific, and foams up just enough, leaving my face soft and smooth.

There's so much I LOVE about this cleanser! I have oily skin that is acne prone, along with very noticeable pores on my nose and cheeks (thanks genetics!!!). After only 3 days of using this cleanser, my skin is: glowing, excess oil has been reduced, my pores are less noticeable and my complexion is brighter than ever! This cleanser does not strip my skin and leaves it very hydrated/clean! My skin LOVES niacinamide and any discoloration I had has now been reduced! I was hesitant on trying Naturium products after the whole Susan Yara controversy, but this cleanser has changed my skin for the best! HIGHLY HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!

I’ve been using this cleanser after trying so many different brands marketed for dry skin. I used to have a combination oily skin type but became dry since I got pregnant and even postpartum. This cleanser does not strip off natural moisture off my face but cleans very well. My husband who has oily skin type also uses this and works well for him, too.

productName: On Vitamin Tree Water Gel Cream
review: Very hydrating but it does leave a sticky film on your face for a couple of hours. I like to use it in the morning right when I wake up so that my skin isn't too dry when I put my sunscreen on.

productName: On Vitamin Tree Water Gel Cream
review: I use this in the morning and it doesn’t make my oily t-zone worse while still hydrating my drier areas. It also hasn’t caused me to breakout or have any sort of redness so far

productName: On Vitamin Tree Water Gel Cream
review: I really like the consistency of this product, I've been using it day and night for like a month already, it gives a cool sensation and maintain my oily skin hydrated the whole day and night.

productName: On Vitamin Tree Water Gel Cream
review: This gel feels nice and cooling but i do get oily quickly when i wear it so i only use it at night now.

productName: On Vitamin Tree Water Gel Cream
review: I have dry skin and need very rich or moisturizing creams. Unfortunately this one does not do it for me as my skin becomes dry later in the day. I noticed that any gel creams does not keep my face moisturized throughout the day.

Honestly, I'm not sure exactly what this targets, but it made my skin feel amazing. It was gentle with my oily skin and never made me break out or produce more oil. It made my skin feel like silk. There isn't a noticeable odor either. Great product, I would definitely repurchase it.
After adding this product to my routine my skin looked and felt much better, I really enjoy this product
I had a high expectation about this product but unfortunately it broke me out. I stopped using it only after a few applications. Maybe need to use the remainder for my neck or body

Great, gentle formula for getting into retinol. Has a higher percentage of bakuchiol than most other products on the market and still remains gentle. Saw a difference with each use, but wish the smell wasn’t as strong.
