I liked the way this felt on my skin but I didnt see any major difference it dark spots and fine lines. May need to use for a long period.

I use this probably twice a week because I wanted something a little more gentle on my skin that would make it feel more firm. It definitely worked, although not as good as the retinol I use. However, it is definitely more gentle and feels super soothing so would probably work well for people with sensitive skin.

At the age of 30, it’s been really hard not to notice the little creases in my face. Was using this product religiously with no change at all. Great for maintaining skin. Hope it can work wonders for others.
I’ve been using for a while. Brightened my dark circles a tad but seems like the results are temporary
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!
This is probably the biggest container of eye cream I've ever seen. Despite the size, the quality is unbeatable for the price.

I just finished a tube of this and it really helped sooth my irritated skin while adjusting to a tretinoin cream I've been using this year. The cream is very moisturizing, but not heavy and leaves my skin feeling protected when my skin barrier feels compromised. While the cream itself doesn't stand out, it integrated well with all of my skincare products and was a go-to product when I wanted a basic moisturizer at night.
I like this cream a lot after a peel or acid treatment, it’s very soothing and hydrating. Leave in overnight and skin is calm in the morning
I got this moisturizer as an add on to an order and I am in love. It actually helped calm and heal my skin after hormonal acne breakouts, plus is a great night time moisturizer.
This is really moisturizing and gentle. Love the smell too.

I am 25 and have highly sensitive/combination skin. I love this stuff and I didn't think it would. I use it as a part of my night time routine and its like magic in an aluminum tube. My breakout is cleared up and my skin is smooth/moisturized. I was a little intimidated by the medicinal look/smell because I didn't want it to make my skin worse, but it proved me wrong. If you are on the fence, I would give it a shot

productName: On MadeCera Cream Mild Whipped Cleanser
review: I received this product purely by chance, and I have no regrets! I love the amount of slip and lather. I notice the smell may be vital for people sensitive to fragrance. I've used this foam cleanser without using a cleansing balm, and it removes stubborn makeup. I TRULY enjoyed this product, and you don't need a lot of products to cover your entire face.

productName: On MadeCera Cream Mild Whipped Cleanser
review: I really like the silky feel of this one, and I’m glad I read the reviews before use because yes, a little goes a long way. If you feel like it’s drying you out, try using a little less before giving up. I like the smell, it’s like a fresh out of the shower clean smell and it gives a nice lather. Most importantly, it doesn’t sting or irritate my sensitive skin at all!

productName: On MadeCera Cream Mild Whipped Cleanser
review: I had such an amazing experience with this cleanser. I initially got a trial size, then ordered a full size and then left my full size at a hotel while I was traveling. I use a tiny, tiny amount and I love it so much. The texture is creamy and as long as I use a tiny bit, it isn't drying at all. I also think it is a really good value considering you don't need a lot. I have very dry cheeks and oily t-zone so I start at my t-zone with my washing and then I use less on the dry area.

productName: On MadeCera Cream Mild Whipped Cleanser
review: I enjoy using this cleanser. A little goes such a long way. It helped get my makeup off completely after a long day of work.

productName: On MadeCera Cream Mild Whipped Cleanser
review: I got this as a free item and tried it out. A little goes a long way! However it is a bit drying for my skin so I use this as a backup cleaner if I run out of my others ^^
I've been using this for two years now and it's so great. I feel like it really cleanses my skin without taking away any mositure or irritating it

I first received this product as a free gift. I used it initially as first part in double cleanse and then read it is supposed to be used as second step, water based cleanser. Either way this product is the best cleanser I have ever used. It has a distinct smell but I have learned to love it. It feels like I get the perfect clean, my skin is well prepped for moisturizing and it is never harsh. I love to use this with glycolic acid scrub from saturday skin and it has made wonders in how my skin feels.

I have used this product for almost a year now. I actually didn’t like it at first. The smell was strong and it felt a bit harsh. I was gonna give up on it, but I realized I could use it as a super gentle chemical exfoliator. I have sensitive skin, so this is great. Using it twice a day is way too much for me, but if I use it every other day, it’s perfect.

The fruit acids do a good job of exfoliating. My skin is smooth afterwards. It does get rid of some dullness and brightens up my skin. I don’t need a strong exfoliator, so this is perfect if I use it consistently every 2-3 days. I don’t recommend it as a second step to the double cleans though.
I am so happy with these patches! they are cute but really helped clear up a hormonal breakout fast

This essence is LIFE..I use this when I have a breakout or some redness/irritation. It's cooling and refreshing on the skin, and feels as light as water. It really helps soothe the irritated skin. On the pricier side but definitely worth every cent.
Amazing! Feels so great! A little product goes a long way!

it pains me to write this review being that this is my first one star review regarding Korean skincare.I am a big advocate when it comes to KBeauty and i always convince my friends and family join the Kbeauty family.I purchased this essence when i was running low on the 'Then I Met You' essence,at first i had no idea what was causing me to breakout because i had purchased a couple of other items too.So i did the process of elimination and started using the new products with my holy grails and alas it turned out to be this essence i was actually very sad and i really wanted to like it now I'm left with an almost full bottle and i don't know what to do with. I would give it away but i don't want them to have the same reaction as me.

productName: On Egg Cream Mask Hydration Set (5 pack)
review: This was not the product for me. The shape of the face mask is odd so there's not a way to put it on without getting serum in your eyes. The fumes alone burn my eyes pretty bad. The serum is nice and rich but given the shape of the sheet mask, I wish it was in a bottle to apply instead.

productName: On Egg Cream Mask Hydration Set (5 pack)
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Egg Cream Mask Hydration Set (5 pack)
review: I like to use this mask at night. I use this as my last step after completing my night regimen. I like that my skins stays firm and moisturized until the following morning.
does as advertised, really good

I agree with other reviewers that this stick mask definitely turns your face turmeric colored. That said, I used a gentle cleanser—two times—to wash off the mask and was good to go with no yellow residue.

As someone who studied Ayurveda, I appreciate the known efficacy of turmeric, and the stick does make the application less messy and stain-prone. So overall, I’m happy with the purchase, because I knew what I was getting into with turmeric.
It doesn't work fast, so multiple uses are needed. I DOES however keep you looking like you have patchy jaundice. i'm not a fan and regret the purchase, but hey, I use what I buy. Three stars.

productName: On Deep In A Barrier Cream
review: To the best of my knowledge this is one of only two moisturizers that utilize tamanu oil--the other being Krave (in the same price range when taking size into account). It appears all of the negative reviews are from those who did not do their research on this ingredient so be warned tamanu oil is a fairly heavy oil and has a distinct nutty scent (somewhat reminds me of maple syrup and since Sioris doesn't use artificial fragrances you will be smelling this oil) the main point of contention with all of the reviews under 4 stars aside from one which listed a nut allergy. It is an amazing ingredient that does wonders with skin discoloration, fine lines, dry skin, and a generally calming ingredient for the skin. What I like about this formulation in comparison to the Krave barrier cream is that it is lighter and so can be used in some cases during the day and the scent dissipates quicker as well (for me the scent dissipates usually within 10 minutes though I don't really mind it). And this saves me from having to purchase the oil separately and trying to mix with a separate moisturizer. The sole reason to purchase this product is for the formulation with tamanu oil. If that's not an ingredient you are looking for then there are probably better products for you. If the scent of tamanu oil doesn't bother you are you're looking for all the benefits this ingredient offers then I highly recommend this formulation with the other great ingredients offered and a much lighter experience than straight tamanu oil. If the scent is something you are worried about, tamanu oil is sold as an oil in many health supplement stores for around $10 so I'd highly recommend testing it out there before trying this out.

productName: On Deep In A Barrier Cream
review: Fantastic night cream and I like the small but more important that my skin loves it.

productName: On Deep In A Barrier Cream
review: I am so happy that I bought this cream))))

productName: On Deep In A Barrier Cream
review: I cannot put this on my face without gagging. It smells so bad. I’ve never had a problem with smells before, but this just makes me want to puke. I don’t know how well it works because I cannot get past the horrible stench.
I love this Vitamin C serum. It kept my skin hydrated and bright during the winter. Cannot wait to purchase this again.

I love the texture of this serum and how it made my skin feel. It is super silky and is really enjoyable to put on. I'm not sure if it has had any long term or super drastic effects after finishing a bottle, but it gives a great glow to the skin. It also looks great under any makeup!

Definitely noticed some brightening and hydrating effects of this serum, but not so much on skin elasticity. It is pretty good and I will probably get through the whole bottle, but didn't have the most visible effects.

productName: On Clean Lotus Water Calming Sheet Mask
review: Absolutely fabulous sheet masks. They fit perfectly and work incredibly well. This is great after being blasted with cold air in winter time. It helps keep the skin moisturized and hydrated while keeping fine lines at bay.

productName: On Clean Lotus Water Calming Sheet Mask
review: Love this face mask. Very hydrating and left me with an amazing glow! Would definitely purchase more next time!

productName: On Clean Lotus Water Calming Sheet Mask
review: My combo skin absorbed it so well and after putting on moisturiser to lock the masks benefits i woke up with the softest skin ever.

productName: On Clean Lotus Water Calming Sheet Mask
review: I like to try a new sheet mask every time I place an order - and as usual, this sheet mask is great! I haven't tried one I haven't liked fro Soko Glam. I really gravitate towards the sheet masks that don't have so much fragrance, mineral oil, and in general are hydrating and very gentle - a really good one to try for dehydrated skin this winter!

productName: On Clean Lotus Water Calming Sheet Mask
review: Je le recommande, il est facile à utiliser, il est adapté aux peaux sensibles, la peaux est douce et hydratée !

I LOVE this product! and have gifted it to several friends. With consistent use it's really improved my hyperpigmentation. I also use it as a spot treatment over areas of inflammation, acne and have found it helps resolve irritation very quickly.
this serum has been a skin care game changer for me! it's really brightened and evened out my skin. it's nourishing and easy to use as well!

I am pale with hyperpigmentation and rosacea on my cheeks, I saw almost immediate results in a few days. After a few weeks I’m really pleased. It has not completely removed the saturated areas but they are much less noticeable. My (sensitive) skin feels great!
This is a statement in my skincare.
I love it

The moisturizer I would say is good for autumn. For the winter, you might need some extra layers (ie. Essence etc). The jar is more on the tall cylinder side. It has an interesting stick to grab the moisturizer but it's harder to grab enough in one go. (Or maybe I am supposed to use my fingers and use the stick when the cream is running low).

Great product! I live in a desert, work in a kitchen and have dry skin and this moisturizer saved my skin. I noticed a difference right away and continued to notice a difference until the end of the container. I will definitely order again.
Been using this for 3 weeks, haven't seen any changes. It actually seems to be very drying

productName: On SoonJung Lip & Eye Makeup Remover
review: The makeup remover stings my eyes when I accidently get it in my eyes while taking off mascara and eyeliner. Works for the rest of my makeup. I think its a good step before cleansing.

productName: On SoonJung Lip & Eye Makeup Remover
review: i do regret buying this but it didn’t irritate my skin which i appreciated didn’t dry it out which was cool but it didn’t take my makeup all the way off pretty disappointed about that.

productName: On SoonJung Lip & Eye Makeup Remover
review: We're so sorry to hear that this product didn't work out for you. Please reach out to us at
This product is good for acne and various irregularities on face but against fine wrinkles or stronger, this product is useless. Tretinoin 0.5% is much better choice.
Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you.

productName: On All Filter Mask Zone Mist
review: Just got the product so can't speak for efficacy yet but the spray is awful. It's not a fine mist like face sprays should be, it sprays a lot very unevenly so I have to pour the product into a better spray bottle. Please fix.

productName: On All Filter Mask Zone Mist
review: We're so sorry to hear that this mist didn't work out for you. Please reach out to us at

productName: On All Filter Mask Zone Mist
review: with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted:)

productName: On Surmedic+ Perfection 100tm All In One Facial Eyecream
review: I bought it but I haven't use it yet but base on my friend recommendation she said it works wonder.

productName: On Surmedic+ Perfection 100tm All In One Facial Eyecream
review: This is my new favorite eye cream. I mostly use it at night as it is a little thicker than my others (Saturday Skin), but I absolutely love this product. It's incredibly hydrating. I recommend everyone add this cream to your routine!

productName: On Surmedic+ Perfection 100tm All In One Facial Eyecream
review: Love this eye cream that can be applied to entire face! It has a nice, buttery texture which is applied to the skin easily and feel that my skin gets firmer and brighter after applying for a few days! LOVE this!!!!

productName: On Surmedic+ Perfection 100tm All In One Facial Eyecream
review: This is a nice cream for around eyes and is very moisturizing, however, I felt it sting a little by my crows feet. I’m usually sensitive in that area, so was hoping this eye cream wouldn’t sting, however it’s not bad enough to stop using it.
I layer this serum into my routine when I have some rosacea starting to show and it eliminates it pretty quickly. Super moisturizing, nice texture.

I like this serum ok. I am in my late 30's with rosacea and opted for this serum for it's anti-inflammatory properties. It comes out silky and is thick for a serum, but not overly so. A single pump easily coats face, neck and decollete. It feels almost like a smooth jelly as you apply it, but it dries down very sticky. Unfortunately, putting a moisturizer on top doesn't help with the stickiness much. It's great for a no-makeup day and does give skin a nice healthy glow and it has helped with my redness, so there's that. Pros: light natural fragrance, rich texture upon application, nice glide over skin, a little goes a long way. Cons: Leaves skin sticky at finish, doesn't go away with layering of a moisturizer on top.

i love this serum so much, i've only been using it for a few days at night. When I use it, my skin looks so radiant in the morning. It's a very thick consistency which I appreciated. I use my gua sha right after applying this and it works great !

I've never tried another product with such a texture before, but after I tried it I can't be without it. It glides on silk-like and feels a bit like velvet on the skin, very nourishing, and it sits like a film that protect the skin. Since being in AC all day everyday I had been looking for products to keep the moisture in my skin locked in and this one hit the mark, I even feel it performs better than some creams and moisturizers I've tried thus far. I most definitely burned through the first bottle and just purchased the second. The amazing glass skin dewy look is an added plus. I really feel amazing when I use this product.

I'm not a fan. I wanted to love it because of the reviews. I have combination skin (extremely dry everywhere but the T-Zone). I applied the serum only on the dry areas of my face, it did nothing (positive) for my skin, and I started to break out. The texture is a thick gel-like consistency; too think for a serum IMO. Just like some of the previous reviewers stated, the serum doesn't absorb well into the skin, and it just sits on top like a slippery substance. I don't like the smell of it either - it has this lingering plastic smell. I don't recommend and will not be purchasing this again.

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Green Ampoule
review: This is a great product. If I had never tried the p:rem safe me cream, I would probably give this a 4.5/5. This is a nice product, very hydrating, but feels slightly sensitizing for some reason that I can't put my finger on. Overall nice but the cream is my all time favorite.

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Green Ampoule
review: I do not breakout easily unless it's my time of the month. This serum made my face absolutely explode with deep, painful breakouts. This serum even caused my cheeks to break out which is never a problem area for me. I am confident that this is the culprit because it was the only new product I added. I am disappointed too because I did feel like it was very hydrating!

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Green Ampoule
review: I'm very sorry to hear that this product did not work out for you! Our team is happy to provide further assistance! Please kindly email us at

I 1st read about this toner when it was still hard to find. A few months later, a sample of it appeared in 1 of my subscription boxes. And I fell in love. I love that it's a slight more viscous of what u may think of as a toner, but its still thinner than a serum. Its just lovely & nourishing & fragrance-free & that perfect hydrating step. Some AM's, I've only applied this, then SPF, and I am good! I love its versatility, ability to absorb, hydrate and it's fragrance-free & doesn't bother my acne & sensitivity.

This toner is truly a game-changer to my whole routine. Since I have been using it, the product has been really gentle with my acne-prone skin. I have a habit of not doing a patch test on my skin, though I'm glad to report that nothing negative came out of it!
Sad to say that my bottle is about to run empty, but I look forward to restocking it.

This is my favorite toner. I am on my third bottle. It has the best skin-loving ingredients and is the perfect start to my skin care routine. I put it in the palm of my hand and press it into my face and neck. It preps my skin for everything I put on after. Definitely will continue to purchase this toner. I will not let myself run out.

Getting a late start in the wrinkle game but I figure why not. I do really well with this brand so I gave it a try and it's a winner. I've notice the subtle changes with no disruption to my routine. I've already order another.
Been using this for a couple of weeks now and haven’t noticed any difference. My skin did become sensitive after using this and I’ve used retinol before.
We are so sorry to hear this product did not work out for you. Please reach out to us via e-mail with your order number and we'll be happy to get you all sorted!

I'll be honest, I tried the lip product from Naturium, and I had high hopes I'd like this product. Yet, I found my skin not feeling hydrated when applied. I would use it after coming out of the shower, and it would take vigorous strokes, rubbing it into my skin. It did not absorb into my skin as I'd hoped. I did however, I tried the Klair body and loved that, even though it is a bit more expensive. My skin actually increased in dryness. I opt to use natural shea butter instead.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

My hands are very dry and I've been on a years long quest trying to find a moisturizer that would hydrate my hands for a decent amount of time without feeling greasy or with any perfumes. This baby is IT! I love it so much. So rich and thick but not greasy and doesn't smell like anything. Nice big bottle. I will always buys this. PLEASE do not stop making this...

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Ye (Vitality)
review: This is an incredible serum and for the price, it can't be beat. I use it in the morning with my vitamin C serum and at night with my honey serum. I feel like it adds to the effect of each. My skin looks more youthful and has more of a glow ever since I started using it. I will definitely repurchase - and now I want to try all of their serums!

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Ye (Vitality)
review: I use this every night and it makes my skin super soft and supple the next morning! It sinks in my skin well and it didn’t cause any irritation. I love that in contains natural ingredients without alcohol, mineral oils, essential oils, or silicone. I definitely buy this in the future! It’s skin use gifted me this product!

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Ye (Vitality)
review: Moisturizing Serum helps to soothe irritated skin with Ginkgo Leaf water and Tremella mushrooms. The serum uses fermented yeast extract, which is a highly effective ingredient for moisture. The downfall for me was the citrus scent other than that this is a true gem.

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Ye (Vitality)
review: I was gifted this serum to try, and I really enjoy it. I have dry skin, so I like a serum that hydrates & gives a glow! This serum was super hydrating and made my skin feel plump and gave it a nice glow. I also love the bit of citrus scent to it! Definitely a winner to me!

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Ye (Vitality)
review: It really revitalize the skin, make it feel more firm and bright, the formula gets absorbed easily and doesn't feel sticky like others. I also love that I can use it combineb with the Li serum, and that I can layer it up with my other Moisturizerrs and my makeup without problems.

I was hesitant to switch lotions as I had one that worked okay, but was a tad greasy. After lots of research on Soko Glam, decided to try the Dewytree emulsion lotion. Love that you don't need a lot of this product, it doesn't feel greasy, doesn't cause breakouts, and leaves my skin with a dewy look/feel which I have never been able to achieve before. Still a work in progress, but this lotion helps a lot along with the whole routine.

Perfect for combo skin. I do not have increased breakouts with this lotion, feels lightweight, works great under sunscreen and makeup (when I wear it). Also works well with sensitive skin and dry patches. I've never had redness with this product, and on a recent trip I really missed using this! The bottle is nice, stores easily and only pumps out enough lotion for your needs so you aren't wasting any product. As I always say...wish there was a travel size option available but I'll be repacking this one into a tinier bottle in the future if I ever need to do so.

Product is more expensive, however the bottle is 5 oz and like I said above, you don't need a lot so I can see this lasting a long time. Also ideal for desert climate, however, I would use this in any climate with my skin for such positive results.

The spray is a little heavy. It is no mist. I love the sleek bottle and it’s travel size friendly! I’m a huge fan of mists just for that extra touch of hydration and this one is good. It is lightweight and refreshing. It doesn’t add a lot of moisture and it doesn’t do any miracle work, but it’s perfect for a quick refresh! Definitely in my top 5 skincare mists that I grab for lately.
When I wake up and I feel my face skin dehydrated, this is my option with any doubt.
This is my first step to preparing my face for makeup and I use the mist to hydrate my face. It does feel refreshing and doing these routine has made my makeup look nice.
I loved the attractive packaging and size of the bottle in hand. The spray was just okay though so price seems fair. It gives a refreshing spray but not very much added benefits after that I felt.

As the winter weather rolls in, I needed extra moisture while also keeping the application process fast and easy as possible. This checks both of those boxes. I love having this available during and between classes, after showers, and throughout the day. It helps to add an extra layer of hydration while also keeping my face clean. Who doesn't like a facial spray?

Gave three stars because it didn’t have a scent and absorbed really well. Unfortunately my skin didn’t like this. After trying this for a week, my skin looked terrible. It looked irritated, dry, and my already big pores looked more visible.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

This product I think works well on skin that does not get irritated easily. I have combination and sensitive skin so I found this mask to be too harsh for me personally, it makes my skin red and burns a bit. It is too bad because it smells amazing and i like the texture a lot. I think this would be great for someone else, just not for me !

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
I think this product matches dry skin. it was too rich for my skin (I have acne skin)

I love the convenience of a hydration stick, but this one doesn't quite meet my standards. Since it's only coconut oil, matcha and beeswax, the consistency changes drastically in cold weather. And I'm just talking inside my house during winter, not taking it with me outside! My guess is that the coconut oil becomes a solid, thus changing the silky smooth feel to a lumpy bumpy one. I still use it before bed, but it's not my go-to.

I’ve been using as a nighttime lip balm, just tap it on and lips stay hydrated all night still slick in the am, thick, would be a bit hesitant to use on my face, I’m a water gel kinda gal, the convenience of a stick hydration sold me after using a serum stick, no mess and easy use, would be good for cuticle care by bedside

I use this during the day and sometimes at night on my t zone, and it has calmed redness in those areas. It has taken some time for this to work (about a few days of consistent application), but it is good.

After using it for nearly a year I absolutely love this moisture stick as a lip balm. Whenever my lips are dry this is my go-to and I never need to reapply it multiple times as it leaves a very thick layer. I would not recommend using this as a moisturizer as it is very thick and isn't the best for oily skin.

It feels and smells nice, but honestly once you get over the “wow this is so convenient and cute” aspect of it, you’ll notice that it’s not all that moisturizing. I only used it a few times on my lips and my elbows and it felt like it was actually drying them out? My elbows even developed some sort of rash that lasted like a week. Didn’t work for me at all unfortunately.
Smells great. This really moisturized smf softened my hair exponentially just after one use! Would purchase again.

The first time I tried this I couldn’t really tell a difference, but I used it a second time two days later and was shocked by the transformation. I have dry curly hair, and it was softer, shinier, less frizzy, with more defined curls. I used it again with the same result. By then I was running low so I decided to save it for a special occasion. Used it again after 2 months and again no big difference but after using it again the next day I had shampoo commercial hair. Concluded that it takes a couple of tries to take full effect, but worth it once it does. Recommend buying two bottles
I have hair that's quick to both take in moisture and lose it. Have used this a few times and it's nice but I can't say I notice a significant difference from my usual routine.
This product does its job very well! Makes my hair feel hydrated and it drys straight with no frizz!
Loves how my hair feels after using it

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Cleansing Foam
review: it has vitamin c which i was skeptical about since i have very sensitive skin, but its so gentle. i use to use the belief one but this one is just as good and its more affordable too! i use this when I'm double cleansing

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Cleansing Foam
review: Clean my face so well! It is light and creamy.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Cleansing Foam
review: I have fairly oily skin and my skin has never felt stripped before this product. I will say, a little goes a long way. It lathers amazingly and smells great. My only problem is that after I wash it off, my skin feels so dry and sad. Really wanted to love it but I probably won't repurchase again.
I bought 3 and I should've purchased more! I feel brighter and more plump after using these.
I really loved this mask! I’m anxiously awaiting its return to stock! I’ll need to purchase an extra amount next time to make sure I don’t ever run out of it again.
Loved trying this mask. My skin felt healed and soft. Glowed the entire day and the following one as well.
Havent noticed any dramatic change for my skin but it feels good on my skin and will continue to keep using

productName: On The Smoother Glycolic Acid Exfoliating Body Wash
review: I have seen this brand at Target but decided to order it here. This brand and this product I am completely obsessed with. After using this body wash, I was shocked at how smooth my skin was, even after a few hours, my skin felt great.

productName: On The Smoother Glycolic Acid Exfoliating Body Wash
review: I love to wash my underarms with this cleanse. The odor under my arms goes away immediately.

productName: On The Smoother Glycolic Acid Exfoliating Body Wash
review: I love this! it's perfect for when you need to chemically exfoliate your body and leaves your skin soft!

productName: On The Smoother Glycolic Acid Exfoliating Body Wash
review: I tried this out as I have recently been using a leave on glycolic acid product on my body and loved the results but it did leave my skin a little sensitised at times. But moving to this instead has been a perfect swap. It leaves my body feeling so flawlessly soft and supple, lathers nicely but not stripping and love the pump bottle.

productName: On The Smoother Glycolic Acid Exfoliating Body Wash
review: This is a nice body wash. It lathers well and I love the exfoliating value from the glycolic acid. It has helped prevent ingrown hairs! It is fragrance free (free from masking fragrances as well) so the scent is extremely chemically- smells like plastic, slightly unpleasant but a good option if you prefer fragrance free body products!

I bought this brush because I really like the British M line and I figured I would give it a try. I have fine hair but a lot of it, so needless to say my hair gets tangled easily. This brush is amazing. Super gentle, doesn’t pull so less hair comes out while brushing. Gets tangled out easily and is super easy to clean. Definitely my favorite brush I have owned.

I saw this brush on SOKO GLAM and thought I'd give it a go as my last brush was on it's last legs. So far no complaints! It does the job and it's quite a nice brush overall. Excellent for cleaning the brush too as it's got holes in the brush and isn't a paddle brush. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I don't feel it was as strong as my old brush. It takes a few tries to get through tangles compared to before, but I think it's due to this brush being slimmer than my old one. I have very thick hair which doesn't help! But I'm happy with this one, it seems cleaner and sleeker in style and is high quality so I'm sure it'll last a long time.
Bought this as a last minute add to cart for my mom. She ended up loving it so much, that I bought it for my sister. Such a great brush!!

I felt my hair is hopeless, that is why even if this brush is expensive I still bought + after reading good reviews. My problem really is after shower my hair is all tangled up and every time I brush it, hair fall is crazy, but when I use it...lo and behold!!! What?!!! It detangles my hair, no bother and super less hair fall. I don't know the science about it but is surely works!!!

productName: On Clean Forever Young Biome Ampoule
review: Je recommande ce sérum ! La texture pénétre rapidement sans effet gras ni collant. La pipette est très pratique à utiliser. Il est adapté aux peaux sensibles. La peau est plus éclatante et nourrie.

productName: On Clean Forever Young Biome Ampoule
review: This has definitely made it into my daily routine. I was a little skeptical at first because the texture is a little odd and thick. But it absorbs very well and leaves the skin feeling hydrated but not sticky. Instantly I noticed my skin was calmer, hydrated and more firm. Additionally, I noticed that some dry spots on my face pretty much went away instantly. Couldn’t recommend more.

productName: On Clean Forever Young Biome Ampoule
review: I am new to rover in, in fact I had never heard of it. Frankly, I think they have some of the best products out there. I had persistent eczema on my ear and using Rovectin products has completely eliminated it. The bombe is like a serum, I use it like one. There is absolutely no smell and it absorbs easily in the skin. Together with the cream my skin is very smooth and looks great. And the price is right too. Everything is so superior to the expensive products that I have been using from another high end brand. Finally, great skin and yet no greasy feel.

productName: On The Little Book of Jeong
review: Impressive

productName: On The Little Book of Jeong
review: My partner and I are both mixed race (he is mixed with Korean and I am mixed with black) and both of us often find ourselves feeling disconnected from our cultures. I got this book to read together and help us look into our relations, as well as developing more empathy for others. This book has also helped us learn more about his culture. I am really appreciative of that and being able to use this book to learn new things and bond with my partner. It’s greatly written and leaves you feeling positive and hopeful in a world that often leaves you disheartened. Thanks Charlotte Cho!

productName: On The Little Book of Jeong
review: A little heartwarming read that I enjoyed so much that I decided to get another one to gift to a friend.

This toner has provided me with the hydration my skin always craves during the winter months. I use it after cleansing, and my skin always feels super soft, plump, and hydrated. I’ve also noticed slight improvements in my overall skin tone. Someone even complimented me that my skin looked really clear a few days ago, and I had thought it wasn’t doing much at first. Previous toners I’d used always felt drying, but this is the exact opposite.

I truly feel like this toner saved my skin barrier. Since I started using it I cannot even put into words the difference it’s made in my skin. My redness is gone, I feel like some of my acne hyperpigmentation is fading, and when I wake up in the morning my skin feels normal instead of slick and greasy. A miracle in a bottle!
I love this toner! I think it smells so good and I like the watery consistency. I feel like my skin is clearer and refreshed. Great for other people with oily skin!
It smells so good and even leaves my skin feeling hydrated after I use it! Unlike other toners I've used in the past that were way too harsh. Its one of my favorite steps in my facial routine.

This is a great toner for my combination skin. I feel like it evens out my oily areas while still hydrating the drier sections of my face. It seems to help prevent oil buildup throughout the day as well. I can't say if it's helped with my acne/scarring because I'm using it in combination with so many other products, but it hasn't made it any worse. It smells like alcohol, which can be a turn off to some, but it dissipates pretty quickly.

productName: On Tea Time Deep Moisture Hydrogel Mask (Single)
review: This was very soothing, did not irritate my skin and left it feeling hydrated. A little pricey per mask per use but I would definitely repurchase again in the future as a treat

productName: On Tea Time Deep Moisture Hydrogel Mask (Single)
review: I got this in the lucky red envelope for free and will definitely be purchasing more. Left my skin feeling soft and hydrated after using it, didn’t irritate my sensitive skin at all

productName: On Tea Time Deep Moisture Hydrogel Mask (Single)
review: I got this mask as a free gift so I wasn't sure what to expect, but it was very soothing on my irritated skin (I also put it in the fridge beforehand) and my skin looked much better after.

productName: On Tea Time Deep Moisture Hydrogel Mask (Single)
review: This sheet face mask is amazing! First of all it’s thicker and more substantial than most sheet masks (that are goopy and like trying to stick tissue paper to your face); so easy to put on and it stays in place! No excess drippy product, either. All the ingredients are contained in the gel type mask. Also the mask is in two parts - tops of the face to the nose and a separate part for around the mouth and chin. Super easy to apply!

Honest and true this product has saved my skin so many times. I wear a mask for long periods of time at work and am in the sun for most of the day. This product not only calms any maskne I get but also delivers much needed hydration back to my skin. This looks like it will become a holy grail in my skin routine

When I first used the Cica Recue Gauze Pad I didn't notice a difference. Went to bed and when I got up my face felt so smooth. It even helped where a pimple was thinking of forming and it shut it down. I have a little bit of discoloration on the side of my face and it seems to be a bit lighter. The only question I have is this something you can use daily? I do enjoy using it and having my skin feel so smooth. Thank you!

Lately I’ve been breaking out around my mouth from wearing a mask for 8+ hours a day at work and this has saved my life. It delivers almost instant relief from redness and irritation. I normally use this in the night after work to help calm my sensitive dry combo skin. By the morning the pimples are much less red and my face doesn’t hurt. I definitely recommend anyone getting this product. Will for sure repurchase in the future

productName: On Wash All Barrier Relief Cleanser
review: I purchased this months ago and after using it every night and nearly every morning there’s still so much left in the bottle! A little goes such a long way if you lather it with water. When I feel like I need a deeper cleanse, I’ll use more and rub the oil in before lathering. It never dries my skin out, has a subtle, clean scent that I honestly love, and the packaging is great - you don’t have to worry about squeezing out too much accidentally!

productName: On Wash All Barrier Relief Cleanser
review: I figured this’d be a one-off purchase due how much you get for the price, but with how long a bottle lasts and how consistently clear my skin has been I see myself purchasing this again and again.

productName: On Wash All Barrier Relief Cleanser
review: Love this cleanser! It works so well to take off all my makeup - including my mascara! Love how it turns from an oil to a bubbly cleanser with water. Leaves my face super clean but not stripped of moisture

productName: On Wash All Barrier Relief Cleanser
review: I haven't cared about a facial cleanser this much since the sum:37 miracle rose cleansing stick. (RIP to a great one. It was discontinued five years ago and I'm still in mourning.) Every other cleanser has just been... there. Fine. I'd notice a bad one, but never found any that were particularly good. Until this one. I love the way my skin feels after using this. It's noticeable every single time. It feels clean and smooth and soft without feeling like there's residue left behind. I love the bottle. It's easy to dispense and allows for more control than a pump. I also just really like the aesthetic of this plain grey bottle for reasons that I don't entirely understand.
Bought this for my boyfriend’s blemish-prone skin. I’ve noticed an improvement in both his blemishes and texture. Will definitely be repurchasing!
I can only use this sparingly on my t zone areas as I noticed over time that this tends to dry out my skin. Will not repurchase. I have normal combo sensitive skin for reference.

productName: On Houttuynia Cordata Calming Toner Pad
review: I use it as my first step in the morning. One pad is enough for my whole face and neck. Good value! I pat it down and it feels hydrating and soothing.

productName: On Houttuynia Cordata Calming Toner Pad
review: been using this for about two weeks and so far so good! I have super sensitive and dehydrated skin and my toner I was using before this was super hydrating but burned the sh** out of my face. This toner feels so good and has noticeably reduced redness, acne scars, and acne itself. only reason I put four starts is because its not as hydrating as I’d like but my skin is pretty severe so I still love it !

productName: On Houttuynia Cordata Calming Toner Pad
review: I have sensitive skin and need a toner that can be easily carried around during travel, so I chose to give this a try. It turned out very well. My skin is visibly getting smooth and more hydrated comparing when using traditional toners. Will purchase again.

productName: On Houttuynia Cordata Calming Toner Pad
review: I bought this because I’ve always wanted to try toner pads after seeing Korean skincare YouTubers use them and luckily this was one sale during Lunar New Year so I bought it. I love it! I have some redness on my cheeks so I left the toner pads as like a mask on my cheeks and after absorbing I could tell that my redness faded a bit so I love the formula too. It’s also very lightweight for morning use since I love light formulas in the morning so I highly recommend this product!

productName: On Houttuynia Cordata Calming Toner Pad
review: These feel so soothing and also cleansing but if you want also offer super mild exfoliation if you use the barely textured grid side. There is also a ton of liquid toner left in the container so they won't dry out, and plastic tweezers that actually fit inside the tub (huge pet peeve of mine when tweezers and scoops don't fit in the product container) to keep the product clean. I also have the essence, which I love, and have used the sheet masks (also loved and plan to repurchase) and I think I may need the moisturizer too. These toner pads feel like they can do so many for someone with sensitive skin on a budget if you ask me as they can exfoliate, tone, feel similar to the essence, and since I ran out of their sheet masks I bet I can stick a few of these in the fridge and lay them on my face until I buy more. Also 70 pads for the price is a great buy!

Adding this treatment in permanently to my rotation. I bleach my hair regularly, so happy to find something that makes it soft, moisturized, but not heavy. Hard to find good treatments that are silicone free. I like the smell of the shampoo better than the treatment, but both are pleasant. Scent isn’t overwhelming. Wish they had larger sizes since my hair is long but still a good price point.

SO impressed with the results. My hair is half lightened and has been really dry and frizzy from the weather + hard water. No conditioner has really effectively made my hair feel soft or healthy since bleaching it. This makes my hair look like Virgin hair in terms of quality and health. Really really happy to have gotten this.

I can’t believe how great this is for such a decent price. I used this after color treating my hair and it was pretty dry, this worked amazingly for me. My hair tends to be pretty dry sometimes as it is, especially in the colder months, so this has been amazing for that. It looked and felt NOTICEABLY better after using this just one time, I couldn’t believe it! I definitely need to buy more of this!!

I wanted to give hyaluronic acid one more chance but I have given up. I have dry skin and I have tried hyaluronic acid from different brands before and they didn’t work out as well. The more I used this one by Cosrx, the more I felt my skin was getting drier and drier. I tried to use it in different steps of my skin care step and searched how to use it for people with dry skin. I even tried using this when my skin was a bit wet. When I have it on my skin, it seems ok, still not hydrating, but once I wash my face, my face seems terribly dry.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On The Glow Getter Multi-Oil Body Wash
review: I'm not sure if it's me or just the sensitive reaction to any oil product. I'm giving it another try in a months time to see. Love the feel of the product though.

productName: On The Glow Getter Multi-Oil Body Wash
review: with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On The Glow Getter Multi-Oil Body Wash
review: I’ve purchased this twice already! And I get hype, I have very dry skin and this is very hydrating and nourishing. It doesn’t really have a scent to it, a little goes a long way! So glad sokoglam is carrying these products now!

productName: On The Glow Getter Multi-Oil Body Wash
review: This is my favorite Naturium soap! It's very smooth and has a slight scent to it. It goes by fast but a repurchase for sure.
This is amazing. Makes my face feel and look hydrated. Love to use under makeup also. Reminds me of CosRx triple Hyaluronic acid. Very happy 😊

Have been using this for a few weeks now and the first thing I noticed was how big the bottle is compared to some of the other serums I've tried from Soko Glam! A little goes a long way and I love the texture of it - it's not sticky but very moisturizing.

I’ve been using this for a couple weeks I’ve definitely noticed my skin more glowing and my lines have been fading around my eyes. I’m 35 years old anything I can do to help my skin looking younger and fresh without surgery. It’s a must have

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Pack Foam Cleanser
review: My face feels so clean after I use this foam cleanser. I’m outside with my kids this summer and this cleaner gets all that dirt out. I have dry skin and this cleaner does both tough jobs of getting my skin clean and not dry.

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Pack Foam Cleanser
review: A+

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Pack Foam Cleanser
review: So I think this is a great cleanser, it makes my face feel clean but not in a stripped sense. However, it might just be me and my skin type, but I question if this is for everyday use. By my third night using it (I personally use it day + night) I think it really threw my skin into a frenzy and this has caused my skin's ph to be thrown off wack so maybe this can be just a night cleanser or a 2x a week cleanser.

I have VERY cracked, dry and peeling lips for the last several years. I have tried aquaphor, Carmen, Burts bees you name it basically and I've tried it with only temporary results. I have been using this for about three weeks and my lips have ever felt softer. They aren't peeling anymore, and they are much less sensitive. I apply three times a day in a very thick layer and that keeps them protected from whatever it is that bothers them.
It was just ok. Did the job, but didn’t stay put on my lips like a waxier lip balm.
We're so sorry to hear that this lip balm didn't work out for you. Please reach out to us at

I've been using Acwell Licorice pH Balancing Cleansing Toner for years now and occasionally try new toners in between but nothing has ever impressed me until now. Bifida Biome Ampoule Toner is gentle, hydrating and comes in a HUGE bottle. My (40yo) skin is somewhat sensitive, combination, and I use tretinoin at night. I haven't had any allergic reactions and skin has been feeling glowy and healthy. I still love Acwell toner and have been alternating between the two.

This toner has a slightly thicker texture than water, which is the perfect consistency. It's super hydrating. I think my skin has brightened up slightly after a month of use, It's a huge bottle that will probably last me 8 months with daily use.
Love this toner which gives a light first moisture burst after washing. Non sticky formula and super hydrating perfect for winter months.

I was worried this would make me breakout as I’m sensitive to fermented skincare ingredients but WOW this is soo good!! I’ve only been using it for a week but I already notice my skin is more balanced and generally brighter. In the past I’ve stuck with the Son and Park Beauty Water or the Only Good Skin Days toner but this one has become my go-to!
Adding this toner to my winter regiment. Noticeably smaller pores and hydrates!
It’s not moisturizing enough. My skin got drier after using it consistently for few days
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!
I love this! Has very soft hydrabeads that burst and leave my skin hydrated ALL DAY LONG. Who knew birch trees could give me such a fabulous glow!
Not impressed. I don’t use it daily coz it’s not that exciting to use.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Oil
review: I am a fan of the SOLVED Coconut Cleansing Pads but have switched over to this cleanser because I started to feel guilty about using so much material for this first step. This oil cleanser is gentle and does a great job dissolving any makeup and/or sunscreen before I use my SOLVED Coconut Foaming Cleanser. The green tea leaves at the bottom is a nice touch. Also, the bottle is a nice size so it takes a while to finish.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Oil
review: It’s been great for double cleansing. I use it before my other cleanser and it helps get all the sunscreen off. It has a very thin consistency, just like an oil.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Oil
review: i don’t like that it has a white film to it and it doesn’t take off all of my makeup. the smell isn’t the greatest and it feel like it doesn’t really do much. i will say it does make your skin feel moisturized right after you use it but that’s the only thing i like. i really wanted to love this product because i love anything that has green tea in it when it comes to skin care but just couldn’t with this product.

productName: On Time Stop Peptide Eye Cream For Face
review: My dark circles have mostly disappeared and my eyes are looking so much tighter in the areas I use it on. I'm not sure how to describe it but it really leave the eyes looking youthful and tight on the skin.

productName: On Time Stop Peptide Eye Cream For Face
review: This eye cream is very rich and keeps my eye area VERY hydrated. It doesn't really help that my skin is oily and I don't really have any dryness concerns around the eyes, so it can get a bit 'greasy' in appearance. I still do like and recommend this eye cream, but to those that have very dry under eye areas. I will keep using this product, along with applying it to my face and neck...why not? It's great to also apply in these areas.

productName: On Time Stop Peptide Eye Cream For Face
review: This eye cream is just okay — it’s not that hydrating and had a gel like, watery texture. Would prefer something thicker

productName: On Brillie Hand Wash Variety Set
review: Cute set

productName: On Brillie Hand Wash Variety Set
review: These are great. I love that it’s non drying to the hands especially since my hands are already dry enough from frequent hand washing and sanitizer use from work, and with the winter coming. I also love the refillable system concept.

productName: On Brillie Hand Wash Variety Set
review: Good refillable hand soap, if that's what you are looking for! Probably wouldn't have bought it on my own, but it is a nice product that does what it says. The scents are lovely and the foam is luxurious.

productName: On Brillie Hand Wash Variety Set
review: For the price point, I would say it’s very good. I love that the bottle is reusable but would be great if they fixed the packaging of the pouches if they were going the environmentally friendly route. These scents were not my favorite sadly. Do recommend tho.

productName: On Brillie Hand Wash Variety Set
review: I like this soap, but it’s not something I would have bought on my own. The best part is the low waste aspect, but I wish the container wasn’t plastic.

productName: On Full Fit Propolis Light Ampoule
review: I actually can’t tell how I feel about this product. Definitely no negative side effects but I can’t zero in on if it’s doing anything for my skin.

productName: On Full Fit Propolis Light Ampoule
review: with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On Full Fit Propolis Light Ampoule
review: Instant glass skin with a temporary sticky texture as a side effect lol

productName: On Full Fit Propolis Light Ampoule
review: One of the best ampoules ever. This has saved my skin while adding retinol to my routine.

I love this oil cleanser! It feels great on my skin and does a great job cleansing. There’s a slight citrus smell that makes it feel like washing my face is a luxurious experience instead of something I have to do. The consistency is like a balm that melts in your hands as it warms and doesn’t leave an overly oily residue. Would highly recommend!

This was my first time trying a cleansing balm and I'm glad to say this didn't disappoint! It melted nicely into the skin and removed makeup well. One thing I did notice was that my skin would become more oily than usual if I used it twice a day, so I stuck to only using it at night.
This cleansing balm deep cleans and leave your skin refreshed and not dired out.

I use this product once a week because I have KP. It has helped in keeping these areas smoother than usual. The parts of my skin not affected by KP are like butta and I love it. I intend on increasing usage to as much as my skin can tolerate to help my rough, bumpy skin.

So nice for my combo skin. I like it almost as much as the Then I Met You cleansing balm. Nice alternative, as I like to switch things up from time to time. It does have a citrusy scent, which would normally bother me, but somehow I don't mind it w/this product., maybe b/c it works so well.

productName: On Cotton Cloud Probiotic Power Mask
review: This mask is very gentle and leaves your face feeling soft and refreshed. It did not dry out my skin at all or cause any texture.

productName: On Cotton Cloud Probiotic Power Mask
review: Perhaps these are for skin that's much younger??? The formula was very light and the mask didn't cover the entire face.

productName: On Cotton Cloud Probiotic Power Mask
review: Love these masks! Skin feels so good after using and well hydrated!

productName: On Cotton Cloud Probiotic Power Mask
review: This is the cutest packaging and the sheet mask is amazing! I purchased 3 more after I used the first one because it was so good. Leaves your face feeling so soft and supple.

productName: On Cotton Cloud Probiotic Power Mask
review: This mask is my holy grail

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Booster Serum
review: Good Serum, It made my skin feel and look amazing. Definitely buying more!!!

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Booster Serum
review: Love the AHA/BHA Vitamin C booster. Everything I have tried from COSRX has made major changes in my skin for the better. Your products are a breath of fresh air. My skin has not looked better in many years. Thank you COSRX! I have finally found my Holy Grail in skin care!

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Booster Serum
review: I have used this product day and night and have been very happy. I do get slightly dry or irritated around the eye"s

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Booster Serum
review: in the winter, careful around the eye's. Skin is smooth ,lines softer, and over all appearance.

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Booster Serum
review: I hate putting a poor review but I purchased this because of the decent reviews and I was in the market of looking for a new vitamin c serum. When I went to open this I noticed on the bottle label it said “Cautions: people with allergy to aspirin will react poorly to the betaine one salicylate.” No where on this product page does it say that. I decided to put a little drop on the back of my hand to see if it’ll be okay and needless to say I definitely felt a burning sensation followed with an itch. I am so bummed I cannot use this because I am allergic to aspirin and unfortunately I cannot return it because I already opened it.
Since I’ve been using this set, I’ve been breaking out even more than usual. Is it purging or ?

Trying to stick it out another week to see. I like how the toner feels but the oil & the 2 other solution & cream I’m not sure why I’m greasier than usual. My eczema has fired up + the extra bad breakouts. Not sure why …

My acne is very stubborn and consistent. So far I have seen the best results and I’m really sticking to these products. At first my skin purged for a while the first couple of days but now it’s been a consistent week of using these products and my skin honestly looks so refreshed and glowy. I still have acne bumps which is the most stubborn part about my acne so I’m hoping I will see a difference in that but other than that I recommend!
I do love it but something is making me feel greasy

I was so excited to use this and only got it as a "treat yourself" purchase, but I was so disappointed. Firstly, the price tag is too high so I expected it to be amazing. Secondly, did not meet my expectations at all and made me regret buying it. I just finished using half of the bottle after months because I just don't reach for it. Doesn't leave my skin feeling hydrated or glowy or plump or anything. Rather get the Dokdo toner and put it in a spray bottle. Disappointed in Superegg...

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
A nice mist as a mid day refresh but I’m not sure it’s any better or worse than some less expensive options.

productName: On True Water Deep Moisture Cream EX
review: This product is definitely not worth the price tag. I really liked their gel mask as an overnight mask which works wonderfully so I gave this a try. So disappointed. Even though it's winter, other products I've used as my last step have held up well for most of the day. With this, I'm lucky if I get two hours before my skin feels like paper.

productName: On True Water Deep Moisture Cream EX
review: Thanks for your feedback!

I love incorporating this into my routine, and it's always super nice and cooling in the morning. After about three months I have had no issues with it, considering how many other rollers have reviews saying that they broke very quickly.
I have seen other rollers at TJ Maxx and while they might be cheaper, they are not as sturdy. Worth the extra $ in my opinion. It will last you longer.

It looks very pretty. I love the color. And it seems more stable looking than the ones I usually see in the store. I’ve been using the smaller roller for my face though. I feel like using the smaller one is more effective as I feel it more as compared to when I use the bigger one. But it could just be me.

I was needing a heavier moisturizer for winter and this is doing the job fairly well. I can't really say I've noticed it doing much beyond that, but I haven't had any problems with it either. It's a fairly thick cream and hasn't broken me out at all.
I really like this moisturizer, it really gives you a nice subtle glow. Will buy again.
I am using this moisturizer as part of my night time skin care routine. I notice that it really made my skin soft when I wake up but not oily.
Okay so the only con I found with this product was how little the bottle is that’s it.
The product itself is amazinggggg I apply some at night time as my last step and when i wake up my skin is brighter and my acne scars are a bit lightened which is what i wanted !!!!

This may be my favorite purchase I have made from Soko Glam. I struggle with mild-moderate body acne and have struggled to find something to help. I have only used this product a few times paired with the tea tree care body spray by Klavuu and WOW WOW WOW I already see a difference in my skin. I am so impressed by just a few uses. I am definitely buying the whole set and will keep purchasing in the future. What a GREAT product. It also has a nice smell to it.
It honestly doesn’t seem like the product does anything for me. I’m better off using coffee grounds and an oil mix for a scrub.
We are sorry to hear that about your Cafferonic Body Scrub. Please reach out to us via email at
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!
I love this acid treatment, I've been using for a month and already notice brightening effects.
I can't believe there's finally a product combining all the best ingredients for fading PIH. The texture is gorgeous and the effects are amazingly fast! Will repurchase it for sure.
It provides a nice layer of hydration and seems to even my skin tone out. I'm not sure how well it fades hyperpigmentation yet, because I have not used it consistently enough.
Lovely product that helps to brighten my skin. The texture is wonderful and easy to work into the skin. Definitely would recommend this and will be buying again

productName: On Moisture Boost Cooling Marine Concentrate Serum
review: I have tried a few different serums since being introduced to skin care routines 2 years ago, but this is the product I keep going back to.

productName: On Moisture Boost Cooling Marine Concentrate Serum
review: This is one of the best serums I’ve tried. It’s so calming on my skin and it the added boost I need in the winter.

productName: On Moisture Boost Cooling Marine Concentrate Serum
review: I probably purchased this based off the cute packaging alone. It was soothing but I had an allergic reaction to this product so had to stop using.

I love this makeup remover/oil cleanser. It is good for removing face makeup, but it doesn’t do a good job at removing mascara. It stings my eyes and makes me feel like my eyelashes fall out. But not a problem for me because I use micellar water on my eyes. It doesn’t irritate my skin and has a good texture for massaging your face!
This smells insanely gross. I honest-to-God gagged when I smelled this cleanser, I can't even use it. It smells like plastic, in the worst way possible. It's also pretty thin.

I’d never heard of this type of wash. I was hesitant because my skin has been acne prone in the past. I have been blown away. My skin loves it! It’s definitely an adjustment from typical washes but well worth it!

This wash is very light, and at first I thought I had to add more to cleanse more, I was wrong. With just the smallest amount my face turns into a soft milk bath. Then I rinse and the light cleanser had put so much moisture in my skin instead of away!

It sucks to write this because I was very excited about this cleanser, but it simply did not work out for me. My skin felt itchy and iritated after just few times of using it. I wanted to love this product, but unfortunatelly it was a waste of money for me.
We're so sorry to hear that this cleanser didn't work out for you. Please reach out to us at
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted:)

My skin gets a little tingly and not quite irritated but a little bumpy after I put this on. I didn’t feel it prepared my skin for the next step very well either. My skin doesn’t seem to like toners with these main ingredients so this one was a no for me.
I'm so sorry to hear this item did not work out for you! Please kindly email our team at
about this item, along with your order number. We'll be happy to get you all sorted out. Thanks! :)

productName: On Order of the Eclipse Hyaluronic Cream
review: A little goes a long way! My face feels so luxurious after I apply this cream!

productName: On Order of the Eclipse Hyaluronic Cream
review: This is by far one of the best new products to hit the beauty market. This cream is genius. It provides non-greasy, lasting hydration like no other. Truly a game-changer. I will not be without this cream. Ever.

productName: On Order of the Eclipse Hyaluronic Cream
review: Really like this cream, I’m so glad I tried it. It’s super hydrating (skin looks plump in the morning), has almost no scent, and the packaging is so cute. Will be adding to the rotation for the winter months!
This totally works but is nearly impossible to get onto your face neatly. It is so soaked, you really can't get it to lay flat.
Soothes at red blemishes and overall complexion looks revived my go to
Didn’t do much for me.

This makes my skin look and feel like nothing else I have ever tried! It feels just as moisturizing as a moisturizer and lightweight like a serum. My skin is brighter and my acne scares are leas visible. I even got my mom to give it a shot!

I love this moisturizer! I have extremely oily skin, and gel creams are the only moisturizers I use because regular face lotions are too heavy for my skin type. Every other gel cream I tried are better than regular face creams, but still made my face look kind of greasy. This gel cream moisturizes my face, and this is the only gel cream I’ve tried that doesn’t make me look greasy and oily afterwards. And it’s fragrance free, so that’s a plus! I don’t know if I would recommend this to people with dry or even normal skin, but I would definitely recommend to people with oily skin like mine. This is my new go to for gel creams!

This is my first time trying this cream and I’m pleasantly surprised. I have very oily skin and definitely gets more “ greasy” as the day goes on . I wanted to find a good day cream that would hydrate my skin well but not make it appear shiny . This cream works great , absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave a greasy shine . If you need a little more added moisture try pairing this cream with your favorite serum for a more dewy finish . Also wanted to add the ingredients are really good quality for the price .

I ordered this gel cream based on the recommendation from a customer care representative. Unfortunately I don't think this is best suited for dry skin, I've used this consistently for two weeks and no matter how much product I use my skin seems to feel extremely dehydrated. All the products I layer under it seem to sucked up by the cream. I wouldn't recommend for dry skin, perhaps oily skin? Still on the search for something to parch my dehydrated skin.

productName: On Curly Studio All Day Rise Mascara
review: This stuff holds the lash so well but it literally will not come off. I’ve used many popular brands and micellar water has always removed it. Two rounds of makeup remover as well as literal coconut oil will not remove this stuff and my lashes are left very hard.

productName: On Curly Studio All Day Rise Mascara
review: We're so sorry to hear that this product didn't work out for you. Please reach out to us at

productName: On Curly Studio All Day Rise Mascara
review: with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted.

Man, these little guys work hard! I was hesitant to pay more than $2 per patch, but I knew that the patches with micropoints were better than patches without, so I thought I'd give them a try. Boy, am I glad I did! Whenever I feel a cycstic pimple starting to bloom, I slap one of these guys on there, and it kills it within a day. I've had two pimples go from red, irritated, and painful, to deflated and painless literally overnight. Plus, when you apply the patches, you can feel the micropoints penetrating those first couple layers of skin -- I know that probably won't excite everyone, but I love it!

productName: On Advanced Snail Mucin Power Gel Cleanser
review: It doesn’t fit to my skin unfortunately

productName: On Advanced Snail Mucin Power Gel Cleanser
review: I’ve been using this cleanser for about a year now and it is by far my favorite I’ve used. When I started I immediately noticed an improvement in the softness of my skin and I no longer worry about roughness or bumpiness (though these were admittedly not my biggest concerns). I don’t mind the fragrance since it’s a cleanser and not a moisturizer. It is often the second step of my double cleanse after the DHC Deep Cleansing Oil but it can definitely stand on its own.

productName: On Advanced Snail Mucin Power Gel Cleanser
review: Its been 2 weeks since i am using these products. Didn’t notice any change. Finger crossed.

productName: On Advanced Snail Mucin Power Gel Cleanser
review: This cleanser really works well to cleanse my skin without leaving it feeling stripped of moisture.

productName: On Advanced Snail Mucin Power Gel Cleanser
review: Have been using it for a while now and have to say it’s awesome cleanser! Love the feel and the texture and how it feels after wash! Love it

productName: On Low pH Good Night Soft Peeling Gel
review: I use this right after cleansing. And as I was using it it didn’t feel like anything at all. But my skinnnn felt baby softtttttt after one use. It’s very very gentle so I use it every night or every other night after cleaning. But even that often may not be necessary

productName: On Low pH Good Night Soft Peeling Gel
review: Very easy on the skin and feels super soft afterwards. Only been using it for few weeks so far. Love it!

productName: On Low pH Good Night Soft Peeling Gel
review: I personally like how my face feels after using it, but I just don’t feel like it’s necessary for me

productName: On Low pH Good Night Soft Peeling Gel
review: I just tried and purchase and feels good. I put this on my underarm too.

productName: On Low pH Good Night Soft Peeling Gel
review: When you rub in the masque it feels like your skin is being very gently exfoliated and my skin does feel softer! Just be aware that there’s a bit of pilling if you don’t like that texture.

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Daily Cream
review: This moisturizer is the best, is helping with everything. I only thing, I think this moisturizer is only for the winter.

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Daily Cream
review: Personally I found this to be too light for my skin and I needed to apply a second my hydrating moisturizer but if you are looking for a very lightweight water like consistency in a moisturizer this is it. It’s very nice overall and I did notice a brightness to my skin but I just needed more

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Daily Cream
review: Very light weight gel type consistency. I’m using this as moisturizer one and going over it with a thicker creamier moisturizer.

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Daily Cream
review: I use this in my nightly routine. I’ve noticed a significant reduction in skin texture with the loss of bumps.

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Daily Cream
review: Mi piel se ve y se siente mejor.
This really didn't do great things for my hair. It left it a bit stripped, and not soft.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skin and hair care is all about trial and error and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your hair type & preferences.
Leaves hair soft and clean without stripping hair natural oils. Not a big fan of the scent even though is very light.

productName: On Rice Pure Gel and Cream
review: I wanted to love this product. I bought it, excited and ready to try it out. However, it broke out my skin. I have sensitive skin and I am careful with the products I put on my face. I did research in this product, and thought it would work out, but this was not it. I also did not like how it made my face feel sticky. The product did not feel as if it was absorbing into my skin.

productName: On Rice Pure Gel and Cream
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I’m sorry that this cream did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Rice Pure Gel and Cream
review: I spent hours researching and looking for a good simple moisturizer for my oily skin. And it always came down to too simple in ingredients to very nourishing and ally of active ingredients. I was so overwhelmed, and almost always had 3 or 4 moisturizers in my shopping basket. When I came across this one, I was so shocked to see it gave the user the choice of how light or how heavy you needed it. Immediately I wanted it, and ever since using it I have been able to feed my skin what it needs any given day. Love love love!

I got this mist as a reward and I will definitely be buying once I run out! I use this every night after work and I find it works super well to give my skin a pick-me-up and boosts my moisturizer’s performance!
I love the mist. It is oil based but does not feel oily on my skin at all. A lot of my hyperpigmentation has faded since using it.
used this for my scalp nd roots and it helped alot with flakiness!! hair grew really well

I have Combo skin; however, getting closer to my 40's my skin has become unpredictable at times. This recently has become my SAVIOR when my skin out of nowhere decides the retinol product I've been using for years is too harsh for my skin, when I woke up to my face literally peeling! My skin was so quickly soaking this up & it doesn't leave a greasy feel at all; I started by spraying it on the palm of my hand & gently patting on my face, but I've now realized it's not too much to spray right on. I'm going to ALWAYS keep a bottle on hand for those unpredictable skin days!
the texture of the toner was a little too thin for me and didnt see much of a difference when using it, however i used it on my scalp and it helped hydrate it well!

I have been using this product basically everyday for 3 weeks now and since week one I noticed a big change on my skin. Its feels smooth hydrated and its really been helpful to control and prevent acne breakouts! I only skip it when using AHA once or twice a week and it has not dryed or irritated my skin.
Refreshing, works well for my combination sensitive skin
got this as a sample and used the whole bottle! i need to get another full sized one

I love this toner. I believe I received it the 2020 Advent calender and have been waiting to buy the big bottle since then. So glad the day finally arrived. This toner leaves my face feeling clean, it seems like it evens out my combination skin. My face just signs with relief after using. I follow it up with an essence. Love it.

I got the mini size in the advent calendar. I was traveling so I brought this and I started using this in place of my regular chemical exfoliant for a week. This is the best my skin has looked in years.

productName: On SoonJung Cica Relief Toner Pad
review: This dried out my skin and gave me dehydration lines. If you have dehydrated skin proceed with caution

productName: On SoonJung Cica Relief Toner Pad
review: with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On SoonJung Cica Relief Toner Pad
review: I have super sensitive skin - rosacea, acne, dryness, etc. Not only do these pads not irritate my skin but I feel like they really do soothe it. I use them every morning with my rosacea cream and at night with my harsh anti-aging products. I always keep one container on back-up to make sure I never run out!

productName: On SoonJung Cica Relief Toner Pad
review: i love these pads. it really soothes the skin
I bought this cuz my normal moisturizer wasn't enough for this winter. The packaging is so cute! The moisturizer smells great, super creamy, and keeps my skin hydrated during this cold season.

My SO and I live in the desert, and this is the cream I reach for when the winds start to blow and humidity drops below 40%. Yesterday it was so dry and windy, my SO even let me put some on his face and in his beard and let me tell you, he aged backwards 5 years and his beard became so soft. He woke up this morning and told me how much he enjoyed how soft his skin and beard feels, something he NEVER does.

This really seems best for the driest weather when your barrier really needs that extra something. I wouldn’t recommend it for very oily skin. My skin is pretty sensitive and still struggles with hormonal breakouts but when I use this I haven’t noticed anything but relief.

I have a normal skin and its not so bad even though I dont maintain it well, This is so greesy that I have to use only at night on the day time I look like I have applied castor oil on my face LOL.
