After using few nights It opened my pores and caused breakouts. I am a returning customer for SG and I always had a good feeling about the products that I ordered. But this choice of mine turned down my impression on SG

I use this serum in combination with other products I got from Soko Glam but it’s been really effective for me and I’m grateful for the results. I’ve been hoping to come into 2023 with a new skin care routine since the older line of products I use no longer are available so this is perfect.
Sinks right into the skin and the texture is perfect! Gotta love the ingredients also too ✨

I recently went a little overboard with retinal; while I always do wear SPF, I think possibly not drinking enough water could've contributed too, but this was the ONLY serum I had that actually helped my Sensitive Peeling Skin! This along with a Oil Toner we're my saviors! I've never going to not have this at home!

I can’t say much about this serum. I haven’t noticed a difference, good or bad. It may be that I just like my other skincare products better. I had hoped this would be similar to the Isntree Green Tea toner but I find them different on my oily, sensitive, acne prone skin.
I use this once or twice a week but it irritates my skin every time. I have been using it for almost 3 months now, hard to tell the improvement on the skin.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
You apply it just like toner and leave it on. It’s so nice for a busy mom like me. I don’t have time for me a lot but this works so well all the dry winter skin is gone

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
review: I'm a nurse and bring this with me to work! If I need to give my skin a bit of hydration during my 12 hour shift, THIS IS IT. So easy and compact and not sticky. soft and smooth!

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
review: I have dry, sensitive skin with redness issues. This is such a good product! I mostly use this for when my skin needs a hydration boost. It also has a very pleasant cooling effect upon application, which is a plus! I didn't realize how small it is for the price that they're charging; was hoping for a lot more product for this price point. But this is definitely a must for on-the-go moisturizer!

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
review: I absolutely love this moisturizing stick!!! It's so handy to have during the day while I'm out and about working! I especially love to use it during the winter months! It works so well and always leaved my skin feeling very moist and hydrated!

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
review: I keep this at work and in between patients I can just place this on my face where I need it to keep feeling clean and hydrated

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
review: Perhaps I was expecting too much out of this moisturizing stick. I bought it because I was going through a phase of dry, flaking skin due to introduction of acne products and wanted a convenient way to reapply moisturizer. I pulled back on all actives and laid on a thick, basic moisturizer as an initial layer, using the stick to reapply throughout the day.

productName: On Apricot Collagen Youth Firming Cream
review: I love this apricot collagen firming cream.

productName: On Clean it Zero Cleansing Balm Brightening
review: Bought this as part of my two step cleansing routine. It smells great, is perfect for removing makeup at the end of the day. Doesn’t upset my sensitive skin or clog my pores. Rinses away just great with no residue and a little definitely goes along way. I have tried other clean it zero cleansing balms and this is by far my favorite. Will definitely be purchasing it again.

productName: On Clean it Zero Cleansing Balm Brightening
review: I like all of Banila’s balms. This one definitely has a different consistency but I don’t mind it. Also love the orange smell. It works as well as the other balms from this manufacturer.

productName: On Clean it Zero Cleansing Balm Brightening
review: I’ve tried almost all of their different cleansing balms and this is just as great! Does not irritate my skin like other brands with brightening ingredients. Will keep using!

productName: On Clean it Zero Cleansing Balm Brightening
review: I bought this on a whim and sort of as a final test because every other oil cleanser I’ve ever tried never worked out. (Beauty of Joseon’s ginseng one, Enature’s hemp one, Klog’s plant one, Versed, Hanskin… the list goes on). I also didn’t realize this had limonene until after I ordered and was ready to be disappointed because my skin is ridiculously sensitive, yet it somehow didn’t irritate my skin in the slightest? Really surprising considering the strong citrus scent! I love all things citrus but, again, have sensitive skin so fragrance isn’t exactly something I want in my skincare.

productName: On White Truffle Body Glow Spray Serum
review: This spray dries quickly and I love the feeling of my skin after using. However it is very short lived. I haven't noticed any anti-inflammatory properties or visual improvements to my skin yet.

productName: On White Truffle Body Glow Spray Serum
review: I like that it is easy to apply, smells good and makes my skin shine but all of this is very short termed. Because it is a spray, it gets ALL over the floors and I even slipped on it once because it is so oily. The scent smells very good but the effect doesn't last long.

productName: On White Truffle Body Glow Spray Serum
review: I was originally nervous to try this product, I have pretty normal skin on my body, but I wanted something to give a bit of glow and also if I wanted, something for my perfumes to stick to scent-wise.

productName: On MadeCera Pink Aloe Builder Pads
review: I am still playing around with where exactly I use this in my routine (after cleansing, or toner? If I use a mask, before or after?) but I really like the addition of a pad-based product in my routine. I think since I started skincare as a young teenager with Noxzema pads, I really dig the feeling of sweeping this over my skin. It’s fragrance is a very light, clean scent. It hydrates well too, and I love the flip top lid rather than a screw top.

productName: On MadeCera Pink Aloe Builder Pads
review: These pages are so good at calming and balancing my skin. I will reorder these and that's alot bc I am a skincare junkie and want to buy every new product or there. If I'm buying something I already bought, I know it's good!

productName: On MadeCera Pink Aloe Builder Pads
review: These are great. They are hydrating yet with ingredients that treat acne, discoloration and texture. So gentle yet effective.

productName: On MadeCera Pink Aloe Builder Pads
review: These are awesome! They work as a light cleanser if you don't need to rid yourself of any layers of makeup or sunscreen, and/or a toner pad if you use the lightly textured side. They are so full of moisture though that even with the salicylic acid they can be used as an essence pad or left on for a few minutes as a mask. They are good for travel too as there isn't really extra liquid to spill out in a bag or anything and the jar is a flip-top lid (it screws off too but this way you don't lose it or drop it on a dirty floor).
I love it. It's my must have in my skin care routine. I apply twice a week to avoid skin irritation. It has acidic smell which doesn't bother me at all. have some varicose veins and vein spiders.
This truly is an at home facial, it’s smoothing without being irritating for my sensitive skin. For days after I have noticeably softer skin! It brightens as well! Love it

I picked this as a reward on a whim, so did not have any expectations. I am also somewhat of a product skeptic, This is the only product I have ever tried that has had significant, immediate, visible results from the very first use. After using, my skin was so soft, smooth, and hydrated, and I had some blemishes that were significantly reduced/less visible. My skin looked and felt like I'd just come from the spa. As a bonus, it's super quick and easy to use. There is a bit of tingling while it's on, but no redness or irritation at all. I am sold and will definitely buy again!

Only used a couple of times so far. It’s a beautiful chemical exfoliating product that I use once a week in between facial treatments. It’s affordable as it’s going to last a while due to the frequency of usage. Leaves my skin feeling smooth.
My face feels so soft after using this. It is quite strong and tingles on my sensitive skin. I only use it 1-2 times per week but it makes my skin feel great every time I use it

productName: On Clean it Zero Brightening Peeling Gel
review: I have used peels before but this is by far the best! It washes off nicely without residue and I have a nice glow afterwards.

productName: On Clean it Zero Brightening Peeling Gel
review: This is great for exfoliating! I use it 1-2 times a week and it delivers on the results! My face feels very smooth and bright every time!

productName: On Clean it Zero Brightening Peeling Gel
review: It has just a little more 'grit' than other peeling gels, so I feel it exfoliates much better. It has a nice citrus scent thats not overpowering and leaves my skin so smooth + bright!

productName: On Clean it Zero Brightening Peeling Gel
review: This is a great exfoliant. Lately I have been using it while in the shower for easy clean up.

productName: On Skin Essentials Cica Care Balm
review: I love that this is hydrating and moisturizing without being too greasy. Even though I use at night, it's fine for me to use during the day as well. Helps soothe my skin after exfoliating or using retinol.

productName: On Skin Essentials Cica Care Balm
review: I love using this after exfoliating or when I have breakouts-- it calms everything down. It has a slight rose scent that I don't mind (and I typically dislike rose). It provides good hydration and moisture, but it isn't too thick; although I normally use it at night, I have used it during the day and it wasn't too heavy.

productName: On Skin Essentials Cica Care Balm
review: soo easy on the skin. noticed remarkable changes in 2 days

productName: On Skin Essentials Cica Care Balm
review: Je la recommande sans hésiter ! Superbe crème pour les peaux sensibles, elle hydrate et nourrit la peau en profondeur sans graisser la peau. Elle calme les irritations cutanées.

productName: On Carrot Deep Clear Remover Oil Pad
review: The pads feels so good on the skin. It really does give me a squeeky good clean!

productName: On Carrot Deep Clear Remover Oil Pad
review: I’ve purchased this item not too long and it removes ALL OF MY MAKEUP! Not harsh on my oily skin.

productName: On Carrot Deep Clear Remover Oil Pad
review: As the title says, it is great removing oil but something in the formula made my eyes itch and burn for about an hour after application. I tried it again once with the same issue before I just gave it away but I don’t know if they dealt with the same issue.

productName: On Argan Oil Silk Plus Hair Mask
review: My hair look better even though I applied only twice. I can't mix in one routine cleaning oil , pack and treatment. It was too much and my hair looked oily. Today I skipped oiling hair and is much better. Even styling hair seems to be easier.

productName: On Argan Oil Silk Plus Hair Mask
review: I used it only twice so far and I'm seeing improvement in my hair

productName: On Argan Oil Silk Plus Hair Mask
review: Better than expected! I'm a black woman with relaxed hair. This product made my hair thicker.

productName: On Argan Oil Silk Plus Hair Mask
review: Very high quality product, especially for the price. Perfect for everyday use as a conditioner or as a mask.

productName: On Argan Oil Silk Plus Hair Mask
review: I have thick, curly Indian hair and this mask works on my hair! Def made it smoother and softer. Still a few flyaways afterwards but I solved that with a leave-in product. Overall, would re-purchase.
After using this mask, my skin felt smooth! It's a very gentle mask and feels cool upon application. Def love it.
I love it!

Cute packaging. Surprisingly big container. I was just watching a drama where a mermaid does relaxing mud face care in a beautiful lagoon and this transported me there! It's a very lightly fragranced mask that is a little difficult to spread on your face with the included applicator because it slips right off the plastic but super easy to just use your fingers. It glides right on and sits lightly on your skin. I was worried it was going to be heavy and suffocating but it was light and nice. It washed off pretty easily with gentle circles in warm water. My skin feels hydrated and happy after using it for ~7 minutes.

This mask is soothing and it does exfoliate nicely. I didn't see too much of a difference in my skin, however. I typically use the Neogen exfoliators, which cause my skin to glow amazingly. This was a nice mask still, it just didn't have that 'wow' factor.

This feels super rich on my skin. Best of all, it spreads on so easily and washes off pretty quickly while leaving my skin feeling smooth and moisturized - perfect for my sensitive and acne-prone skin. It has some texture in it for exfoliation, but it's gentle enough that it doesn't irritate my skin. Also, I love that I only need to leave it on for 5-10 min and it does the job.

productName: On Safe me. Relief Moisture Cleansing Foam
review: Just a small dab on my cleansing pad and away all the daily dirt & grime goes. It smells wonderful too. Love this product

productName: On Safe me. Relief Moisture Cleansing Foam
review: Not sure exactly what ingredient caused the cystic acne on my cheeks (I never get cystic acne) or caused the little red bumps everywhere, I just know I am throwing this face wash out. Really doesn't help that it smells like a throat lozenge either...

productName: On Safe me. Relief Moisture Cleansing Foam
review: with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On Safe me. Relief Moisture Cleansing Foam
review: I have struggled to find a great cleanser for my skin type, my skin changes throughout the year but is always sensitive and prone to breakouts. After using this product, I have noticed major changes in my skin. My skin is less sensitive which is great during the cold weather and my breakouts have calmed down. I have also received compliments on my skin!!

productName: On Hanskin Seven Layer Ceramide Lip Balm
review: As far as lip balms go, this one is pretty average — not great but not terrible, either. Not a fan of the fragrance, though. It smells artificially floral.

productName: On Hanskin Seven Layer Ceramide Lip Balm
review: 1. Not enough product for the price

productName: On Hanskin Seven Layer Ceramide Lip Balm
review: 2. For me personally it exacerbated a lip dermatitis reaction I had instead of helping.

productName: On Hanskin Seven Layer Ceramide Lip Balm
review: I kept using it to see if it was a fluke but the product ran out before I could be sure that it was worth anything. Two stars because I like the texture of it.

productName: On Multi Vitamin Daily Nutrient Body Wash
review: This is my first time dabbing into skin care for my "whole body" and not just my face and I am loving this new experience. Body wash is non stripping and leaves my body soft. Make sure to follow with the matching lotion.

productName: On Multi Vitamin Daily Nutrient Body Wash
review: I love this for daily use, it makes my skin feel actually clean.

productName: On Multi Vitamin Daily Nutrient Body Wash
review: Love all products I have purchased.

productName: On Multi Vitamin Daily Nutrient Body Wash
review: This body wash is perfect as an everyday body wash. My skin feels clean without feeling dry after I love it!

productName: On Multi Vitamin Daily Nutrient Body Wash
review: My husband has been loving this body wash and for someone that loves his cheap bar soap, that says a lot. Very gentle and doesn’t leave skin feeling stripped.

productName: On Gentle Face Cleaning Remover Pad
review: For pads as opposed to wipes these are a good size for cleansing and they are really soft. I don't need to rinse even with oily skin after either if I follow up with my Goodal Houttuynia Cordata Calming Toner Pads and use the embossed side of the pad to remove any dead cells or cleanser left behind. Overall a good option for a waterless cleanser for sensitive or sensitized skin, though would still prefer a wipe with an embossed side for exfoliating and water-based as opposed to oil-based. Also rinsing is optional - it doesn't evaporate fast after using it but the ingredients are moisturizing if you do nothing else.

productName: On Gentle Face Cleaning Remover Pad
review: Makes skin soft and no irritations.

productName: On Gentle Face Cleaning Remover Pad
review: I haven't tried using these to remove make up so I can't speak on that. I noticed the key ingredients for these are similar to the toning pads. So for about a week now I've been using these pads as a post cleansing toner since I've run out of my regular toner and they've worked great. I don't know if I'm actually supposed to rinse after using but I haven't LOL I use a retinol based serum for my hormonal acne and it hasn't had a bad reactions with it. I also have to say that these have been really great in hydrating my face; my skin is parched in the winter.

productName: On Gentle Face Cleaning Remover Pad
review: Es un producto que me gusta mucho, facil de usar y efectivo, lo recomiendo

productName: On Gentle Face Cleaning Remover Pad
review: I received this as a birthday gift. Thank you, Soko Glam! I know the description and directions state that these are “cleansing” pads, but I would go one (or two) steps further with my cleansing routine. I don’t feel that these should in any way, shape, or form, replace the cleansing step as they do not cleanse that well; this coming from someone whom doesn’t wear foundation and on occasion, mascara and eyeliner. I’ve had them for over a month and I’ve tried using them twice instead of double-cleansing and my skin was not happy. My skin needs actual water to start the hydration process, which these do not supply. I believe that these pads would be okay to “refresh” the skin midday or after a workout until you can get home to actually wash your face, but the jar is huge and isn’t travel-friendly.
It's silky smooth and leaves my skin feeling hydrated.
Feels great. My skin is not responding great to it though. My skin doesn’t really respond well to much though. Think it’s just not the product for me.
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

Absolutely love love these products out of all the expensive products I have tried, this product line has caught my attention for the way it goes on your skin clean, not greasy yeah very hydrating and for this I will remain a loyal user keep up the great products. And don’t discontinue any pls.

If you have raised pores or pimples on the rise these work like the pimple patches. It works really well and I love using them but the application is a struggle. It is hard to peel from the plastic and if it touches itself you'll never be able to pull it apart for it to be flat again... The shape to is a bit awkward for my nose shape. Overall though I do like, I just wish it was easier to put on without risking ruining it.

there was barely any goop on the mask after 6hrs, don’t know if it’s that’s good bc i don’t have clogged pores or bad if it didn’t work correctly, lol. either way i rather have these on hand then not.
Nice packaging for the product, in a glass bottle. So far my skin seems to be getting even after a few weeks use.

productName: On Force Shield Superlight Sunscreen SPF 30
review: I like the green tint, and the clean ingredients. It was slightly too mattifying for my dry skin. I prefer something that feels a little more moisturizing. It's frustrating to use my skincare to try to get a good glow, and then to put on sunscreen and all the glow is gone. But for someone with oilier skin, this is probably an excellent choice.

productName: On Force Shield Superlight Sunscreen SPF 30
review: I am pleasantly surprised with how much I like this sunscreen. It is great for winter months were there isn't that much sun during this season. My face is less oily throughout the day and I love the green in it. The sunscreen has not caused any breakouts and I would definitely buy again. I just wished it had a stronger SPF for better protection but for that reason I am only using it for the winter months for now and will reconsider using it this summer.

productName: On Force Shield Superlight Sunscreen SPF 30
review: This sunscreen has a super light and non greasy finish which I love! It's great for warmer and more humid temperatures and I think it would be good for acne-prone skin since it's so light. The green tint does fade and works in nicely to your skin to help reduce redness, but it'll take a little bit of time for it to absorb. The only reason I docked a star was because I love the idea of a pump for dispensing but sometimes the pump is a bit finicky.

productName: On Force Shield Superlight Sunscreen SPF 30
review: This one goes on very nice and does not leave any residues behind. I really like the light feel of the SPF knowing it still provides a high level of sun protection.
Favorite brands compared to others
These are the only patches I use!

productName: On ACV Vinegar Hair Cap (5 Sheets)
review: I used 4 caps in past two weeks. My hair is so soft, definitely keeps my ph level healthy, and gets rid of scalp built up. I use it after shampooing and conditioning. Only problem have to add hair tie of my own, doesn’t stay in place.

productName: On ACV Vinegar Hair Cap (5 Sheets)
review: This has honestly helped my hair so much my hair now feels so soft and healthy

I got this to try the line and fell in love with it. I noticed a difference in my within 2 weeks of using it. I also found it to be really hydrating for my skin. I am now looking into buying more products from them.

Was VERY difficult to open, and you need more than you think to get it on evenly as it dries up very quickly even on oily skin (seems to be evaporating faster than sinking in). The emulsion would have been a better choice as it would be more spreadable and you can still apply moisturizers on top of that as well too.

productName: On Barely There Tinted Lip Oil
review: I like this for the gloss affect, but I did not find it had any color which is disappointing. For reference, I have lighter color lips that are a neutral pink. If you are looking for a nice gloss I think this works just fine, but just be mindful that it may not give you the color you are looking for. You can definitely pair it with a lipstick to add some extra glam to your look.

productName: On Some by Mi AHA-BHA-PHA 30 Days Miracle Truecica Clear Pad
review: I was a little nervous about how harsh these might be; however, they aren't harsh at all. In fact, my skin feels soft and and moist afterwards. These have also been great for my small breakouts. The next morning my blemishes are noticeably reduced.

productName: On Some by Mi AHA-BHA-PHA 30 Days Miracle Truecica Clear Pad
review: I am in love with a specific combination of ingredients for my combo/oily skin that has to go through a lot (like migraine injections every few weeks for one example): Cica + Houttuynia Cordata + Artemisia/Mugwort. Alone these ingredients are good but combined are a powerhouse for preventing or treating breakouts, maskne issues like irritation, and reducing redness and inflammation - all while making my skin feel nourished and not like it is covered in grease. Adding so much tea tree is such a bonus for me too as I'm immunocompromised and keep it in the house to add to practically everything anyway. Also the astringent properties of the Willow Bark is great for my pores on my nose and forehead, yet It isn't drying for my skin, and doesn't make me peel. If it came with the fliptop lid the MadeCera PinkAloe pads come in, or if that lid fits this jar? **chef's kiss**
This was my first acid, and I have to admit, I was pretty nervous to use it at first. Really had no idea what to expect.

I was looking forward to this product for my back acne. I have dry skin on my back so I thought this would help to hydrate while getting rid of acne. However I have seen no difference in my acne at all, and my skin feels the same. I would be lying to say I was not disappointed.
and we will be happy to get you all sorted!
The scent is light but I expected it to smell more like honey. We finished the bottle. It's a regular body wash. The packaging is cute tho

This moisturizer is thick without being heavy. Many moisturizers are too thin for me, leaving my face feeling tight by midday. Not this stuff. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated and plump. Plus I love that it comes in a tube! Way more hygienic than a jar.
The only product I have tried recently that is helping repair my damaged skin barrier

I destroyed my skin barrier in December with retinol and tried multiple products without much luck. Enter this product! My skin barrier is finally starting to recover. It has not broken me out, and it is thick without being greasy. I prefer to use it at night, but it is okay for day use as well.
This cream relieved dryness and irritation. It is really thick and perfect for my evening routine. I'm not too keen on the scent but very keen on the results!

This cream is exactly what it says it is and delivers on that moistness. It is PACKED with ceramides, and both type of ceramides that our skin barrier needs - hydrophilic as well as hydrophobic ones. So it gets absorbed into the deeper layers of the skin as well. The cream has a slightly thick and rich texture but it goes on the skin easily and does not feel greasy.
This is hydrating and lightweight enough for humid climates! One pump is enough. At night, I use two pumps and not use moisturizer and it seems to work for me. I would repurchase :)

If you want the ceramide serum equivalent of Pokemon’s Gotta Catch ‘Em All, look no further than the Hanskin Seven Layer Ceramide Serum. This emulsion texture has seven ceramides (ergo the name), plus a ceramide precursor, panthenol, cholesterol, beta glucan, urea and panthenol, basically making it a one-stop shop for skin barrier support. The texture can feel a bit tacky at first, but it dries down easily. And the price! Ceramides are expensive to formulate with, but the price per mL is great on this. I’ve got a lot of ceramide serums I love and while this one might not be the most elegant, I’ll probably rebuy it.

FINALLY! I’ve been looking for something that can sub in for Dr. Jart’s Ceramidin Liquid—and I finally found it!! Thanks for curating this because it’s hard enough to find ceramide serums. And this is equally as velvety smooth and fast absorbing as the Dr. Jart’s serum. We’re in the hot, humid June season but I can still use it. I love it in the morning right after my hydrating toner when I don’t want to use a moisturizer right away. Please keep this stocked on SOKO Glam!

productName: On Apricot Collagen Youth Firming Ampoule
review: I think my age spots are beginning to fade after adding this to my routine. It is gentle and smells nice. My face feels more elastic and certainly more moist and dewy.

productName: On Apricot Collagen Youth Firming Ampoule
review: I had heard such great things about this ampoule and it did not disappoint. I saw immediate results, my skin seemed to smooth and soften. But there is a perfect amount of firmness as well. I will definitely be purchasing again.

After reading the reviews I decided to try since the reviews were positive and they were correct. I'm in my late 60's still dealing with cystic acne , and dryness with redness from using Retinal products. The pads are so soothing and refreshing. The pads have eased the redness. I highly recommend the pads.
This did helped me skin soothe and calm down more! Love it to use it as my toner step at night.

I am currently 7 months pregnant and have had horrific acne and lesions on my face like a mask for the entirety of my pregnancy. I’ve tried everything and all of it has just exacerbated the situation. I came to soko glam got a skin analysis and bought the recommended products. This product has saved me literally. I’ve only had the product for 2 weeks and I already look completely different. No acne in sight. Scars fading and some gone already. Lesions almost gone and no more dryness cracking and bleeding and severe redness anymore. If I could hug soko glam I would in a heart beat. This product has allowed me to heal my rash almost completely. I will never go without it!
I feel like these pads have completely changed my skin's hydration and redness in the best way. I have redness in my cheeks and on my forehead and my skin looks and feels so much healthier.

I love this cream so much more than I expected to. It has a soft, pillowy feel to it and feels so cooling and calming on the skin. It also smells amazing! My skin drank this up and it helped soothe my peeling skin from using tretinoin.

I’ve been like Goldilocks searching for a face cream, and I’ve found it. This Hanskin cream is super moisturizing without being sticky/greasy, absorbs well but doesn’t dry out completely, has just enough of a natural scent that it doesn’t smell too perfumey or too bland. After use, my skin feels comfortable and soothed until my next wash. It’s perfect! I’m almost done with my first tub and have two brand new ones on stand by.
Super gentle, super hydrating, I love that it feels weightless but really gets the job done.
I asked SG for recommendation to reduce rosacea and they recommended this. It works greatly on my skin, it's very light and moisturize my skin perfectly.

I have combination skin that has been especially dehydrated recently and this is a miracle. It is the perfect balance of hydrating and moisturizing, and its calming properties is a bonus with the hot summer weather and my sometimes sensitive skin.
This is definitely a great sunscreen for everyday wear. I hardly feel anything on my face except smooth skin.
Love this stuff, but the bottle is TINY. Would wait for another sale to repurchase (but I do like it enough to repurchase.)

I've only used the Rescue Balm for two days (twice a day) on a couple of persistent red spots that have been lingering post-breakout. I can already notice a difference. The balm feels nourishing, a little heavy for daytime wear so I put more on at night.

If you’re looking for a calming essence, this is the one for you. I use this when my skin is acting up and I need to bring it back to normal. I also use this with the calming ampoule (same product line). Very gentle but still hydrating.

So I've wrecked my skin trying to do too much too fast and ended up with a very unhappy skin barrier. Aside from taking easier now I incorporated this essence to my skin care and it helped soooo much! My skin stopped being so angry at me. Now that it's colder I started doing the 7 skin technique, thing, with this essence and boy, my skin glows and feels oh so good! Really happy I was recommended this by the sokoglam team.
Such a wonderful product that leaves my skin so moisturized. It doesn’t dry right. Absolutely a must for every K-skin care routine.
My boyfriend ended up stealing this from me lol because he said it’s perfect for after shaving since it has helped with irritation and redness for him immensely. Will definitely keep purchasing!

productName: On Chasin’ Rabbits Drunken Hand Pomade
review: I like using this morning and night when I am also applying my cuticle oil. It does have a temporary greasy feel but I always apply onto back of my hands and rum in most of it before getting on my palms. Any extra greasy feeling I rub my palms into my elbows and it’s all good. I did struggle with the packaging when opening, foil came off but left a layer of plastic I didn’t notice and thought it was just extremely hard to push from tube. Until I checked it again and got the rest of the plastic removed!

productName: On Chasin’ Rabbits Drunken Hand Pomade
review: I love how it smells (sweet mangoes with a hint of herbs so it's not TOO sweet) and how thick it is. It's definitely not for people who want a thin consistency but it melts beautifully in your hands and doesn't leave a sticky feeling at all. Everyone always compliments the scent and asks for a bit!

productName: On Chasin’ Rabbits Drunken Hand Pomade
review: Wow, I purchased this during the black Friday sale as a treat to myself, and wow! I selected the drunken mango scent, and it smells like a spa. So relaxing, but also slightly sweet with the mango. Also, it's thick! Which I prefer in a hand cream. 10/10

productName: On Chasin’ Rabbits Drunken Hand Pomade
review: Amazing scent and the texture is not grease at all after absorbed. Recommended if you like vanilla and peppermint scent.

productName: On On-the-Glow Blush and Illuminator - Bare
review: Nice flush of color, blends easily for a natural looking flush, the glow is also nice and more of a shine to highlight high points also blends well, I’m lazy and like the ease of dotting on skin then blending with fingers, stayed on through mask wearing!, not sure how much product there is, but each side twists up when cap is unscrewed., I like the product and think it’d be great on trips

I bought this because I wanted a primer that would help my make up go on smoother and keep it on longer. Unfortunately, it did the opposite. My mascara started to come off 2 hours after I put it on. That never happened before I used this product. Other than that, it has a cool and funny packaging so that was nice. And putting it on was no issue. I just wish it did what it claimed to do.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Chasin' Rabbits Limited Edition Set
review: I've been using this set for a couple of days now and so far I am LOVING it! Usually, I have a pretty oily T-Zone, but since it's been getting colder, my skin has been so dry it was literally flaking off. I've been using this set morning and night and it doesn't leave my skin feeling tight like my last cleanser. I like that this leaves my skin feeling and looking hydrated all day. I think I am going to find something a little more intensive for night moisturizer. I'm giving it 4-stars because I will have to keep using it to see how it really affects my skin after longer use, but if it continues the way it is, it's an easy 5-star set! Also the little bag and stickers are such a cute touch and I love the headband, it fits very well without being too tight.

productName: On Chasin' Rabbits Limited Edition Set
review: I love these products so I decided to buy myself this gift set. I am a little disappointed. I should have just saved the extra money and bought the 3 full sized products separately. The bag and headband is not worth the extra $10. The headband is small and keeps popping off my head (I just have an average sized head!) The bag is what the products were packed in and it has writing about the products all over it. That makes it a little awkward, imo.

productName: On Chasin' Rabbits Limited Edition Set
review: If you want to make your own set, I suggest you just buy all 3 separate products and the adorable and functional $5 headband from Etude House.

productName: On Hypoallergenic Cica Pick Up Mask
review: Let me preface this by saving I have sensitive skin. I was hoping that this having cica in it would work out good for me, but that was not the case. My most favorite holy grail cleanser (that appears to have been discontinued) has cica in it and makes my sensitive skin so happy. I was hoping to achieve the same results with this mask, but it was not meant to be. I used one of these masks today and it left my skin with tiny bumps and acne breakouts. The mask also didn't smell very good.

productName: On Hypoallergenic Cica Pick Up Mask
review: with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On Hypoallergenic Cica Pick Up Mask
review: I received these “pick up masks” to try and I have to say they feel wonderful on my face. I have added them to my routine and use them every other day. They are soothing to my skin and the wipes are full of the moisture ingredients just as described.

productName: On Hypoallergenic Cica Pick Up Mask
review: My sensitive ,aged skin loves it

This set is definitely worth the price because almost all of the products are full size. I’m keeping some of the products and giving some to a friend. I’m especially a fan of the Hanskin essence that comes with this set.

This set caused me to repurchase multiple products in this assortment. Neogen Day-Light Protection Airy Sunscreen, Isntree Green Tea Fresh Serum, and I'm From Mugwort Mask. These products stood out to me, and I also liked this essence but didn't get the chance to repurchase. This set is best during the summer time, especially if you live in the southern hemisphere.
Try the mugwart mask after it's been in the fridge for a while and use it after exfoliating, it feels absolutely wonderful and has a cooling affect. It is very calming and refreshing!
This essence is absolutely delightful. My face feels so light and SOFT. I didn't anticipate it being so light since it is a little thicker of an essence, but it is truly a delight,

I love this CC water for year round use! I have oily skin, so this light version works for me. It makes my skin look beautiful without looking like it has heavy make-up on. It looks more natural than foundation. The slightly darker tint (compared to the CC cream) works for me (I use caramel). This is the only base I use now, with primer and sunscreen underneath during the day. I will continue to buy this forever!
I don't wear makeup and I wanted something just to make my skin even this is perfect it's very light feels like I don't have anything on my skin and takes away all of the uneven skin tones
I wanted something to replace my IT Cosmetics CC Cream. This was not it … The coverage is so light. It may (or may not - I really couldn’t tell) even out skin tone but that is about it.

For a while I've wanted a patch that covers a larger area on my chin for when I get lots of small breakouts so it's nice to finally have this although depending on the angle I stick it on my face, it doesn't always stay on through the night.

productName: On Force Shield Supercharged Reset Mist
review: I like this face mist. It’s cooling, refreshing, and smells good, too. I’m not sure if it’s really doing anything to improve my skin, but I’m enjoying it all the same.

productName: On Force Shield Supercharged Reset Mist
review: I'm a few days into using this mist and generally I like the way it feels but the smell is slightly...clinical? It's not the refreshing, botanical scent I was hoping for/expecting. I'll continue to use it for the (hopeful) skin benefits, but it's not the go-to I was wanting.

productName: On Professional Repairing Hair Perfume Serum
review: I was so excited about this product but it fell flat for me in almost every way. I was shocked by how little you receive for the expensive price tag. Secondly, the "perfume" aspect of this is really the opposite for me... the fragrance isn't the best, but fortunately (or unfortunately, if this is what you were hoping for) it didn't last long. But I think it was supposed to? Also, shine sprays must walk a fine line to add shine and control without appearing as though you haven't washed your hair in a week. For me, this product achieved the latter. A lot of money for a product I know that I will never use again.

productName: On Double Date Lip and Cheek Duo - Honeymoon/Swipe
review: I was a bit skeptical at first as I am usually not a fan of liquid like blush but OMG this one is so so so good. I love how smooth it lifts and the pigmentation is awesome!!! The blending of it is also great!! I love it so much :)

productName: On Double Date Lip and Cheek Duo - Honeymoon/Swipe
review: Beautiful color, great compact design, but less creamy than I'd like for applying with fingers and the color layer is too dry for my lips. The glossy layer works great for lips and as a highlight. Would repurchase for sure. But slight bummer to need an applicator to apply (as I hoped I could pop it in my pocket for going out without a purse)

productName: On Double Date Lip and Cheek Duo - Honeymoon/Swipe
review: Perfect for on the go. Put a little on and if I need more later it fits in my pocket I enjoy that the best!

productName: On Double Date Lip and Cheek Duo - Honeymoon/Swipe
review: This balm has a very nice texture that glides on the cheeks well. A little tends to a go a long way and does last all day. I am not sure about the color and feel like it's a bit too orange for my tone so I don't like it on my lips. Would consider trying in a pinker/redder tone, but overall a nice product.

productName: On Chasin’ Rabbits All About Glow Multi-Balm
review: Leaves a very glowy look and shine on your face. Goes on nice and smoothly. However, I feel as though it would be better for those with dry skin as it is very moisturizing and lasts very long.

productName: On Chasin' Rabbits Aloe U Vera Much Soothing Gel
review: I love this soothing gel. It keeps my skin moisturized. The gel is sticky when first applied. Overall, happy with the purchase!

productName: On Chasin' Rabbits Aloe U Vera Much Soothing Gel
review: I bought this to use as a conductive gel for my microcurrent device and it works exceptionally well! I like this so much more than the gels that come with the device. It’s a beautiful simple formula with great ingredients. Four stars because it dries down sliiiightly sticky and remains a bit sticky for a while. But overall, lovely and lightweight product for added hydration!

productName: On Balancium Comfort Ceramide Cream Mist
review: Has a very nice mist that makes skin feel cool. Leaves a subtle dew look to face that's nice. Geels good too

productName: On Balancium Comfort Ceramide Cream Mist
review: I love everything about this mist! First of all, it sprays out so fine that no product is wasted. It is super hydrating and soothing, especially if you have a compromised barrier. This has become a quick favorite in the couple of weeks that I've been using it!

productName: On Hi Amino All Cleansing Oil
review: I've been using this oil cleanser for a week now and my skin looks refreshed and glows. I love this item and will purchase it again!

So, in response to the review that said it turned their skin brown, that happened to me when I attempted to use an old one that had been almost gone for a few weeks and just wanted to see if there was anything left in there. So it was probably a singular product defect. I use this stuff religiously on my hormonal and cystic acne in the am instead of makeup (sometimes i follow w colour pop powder) and it never breaks me out, looks natural, and goes on smooth! I’ll never wear makeup agin after discovering this product.

I was so excited to try this. I haven't worn foundation or concealer since the start of the pandemic... which has done wonders for my skin. BUT! I also have really sensitive skin, so I have quite a bit of redness. I saw this and was hoping it was a much more affordable version of Dr Jarts green tiger balm. Guys this stuff is tinted, and supposedly adjusts to your skin tone. LOL. I'm the color of mayonnaise and like it that way so this stuff literally turned into a brown patch on me. Sooooo disappointing. :( Gonna give it away to a tan friend.
too thick, doesn't feel as good as some other balms that turn oily then rinse off easily. this one is almost too thick, doesn't melt down in my hand as well.

productName: On Force Shield Superfuel Serum Stick
review: Love the stick application - my face is absolutely glowing and I got several compliments. I originally bought for travel but will keep using it.

productName: On Force Shield Superfuel Serum Stick
review: I liked the product at first, it isn't the most moisturizing or long lasting product as it is a serum stick but overtime, it gave me rashes all over my face and my neck. I usually don't have sensitive skin but this product just irritated my skin so badly that my skin was incredibly dry, red and it stung pretty badly for a couple of days afterwards.
This cream has been perfect for cold and dry winter weather! It has a slight thicker consistency but it does not feel heavy or clogs my skin. I love it

Great moisturizing cream that goes on smoothly. It's a bit heavy to use during the day, but I use it as a night cream and wake up with my skin soft and smooth. I love the scent and it feels truly luxurious!
My go to moisturizer! It leaves my skin feeling so hydrated & bright! It also helps fill in the little smile lines I have. Definitely recommend 🙌🏼

i wanted a rich moisturizer for the colder weather and while i do like the product, it might be too rich for my combination skin. it feels sticky for a few hours after applying. i expected it to smell sour because of the name but it has a faint sweet scent that is very nice.

Decided to try this moisturizer and found it to be perfect for my skin. I’m oily most days and found that only natural products can help the oil in check. This one is silky smooth and feels decadent without overwhelming my skin. Def worth a try!

I love this little lip balm, I keep it in my purse and use it throughout the day to give my lips some color. After about the second use the tint stays on your lips, and I always get compliments on the packaging. If you are looking for something super hydrating you can layer a more occlusive balm on top, I like to use aquaphor to give it some shine. Love it!

When I first put this on I loved the texture. It felt very moist and I loved the subtle pink color, that seemed to build the more I put on. However, whenever I wear it, I notice quite soon after that my lips feel very dry. Because of this, I avoid wearing it frequently

productName: On Black Rice Hyaluronic Anti Wrinkle Serum
review: It didn’t make a difference for my fine lines after two months. I do like the packaging and the light scent and it didn’t clog my pores or cause my reactive skin to break out.

productName: On Black Rice Hyaluronic Anti Wrinkle Serum
review: I use this around my eyes and forehead and 100% notice a difference in the elasticity of the skin. After using for ~6 weeks, those areas feel bouncier and very hydrated, huge plus that my under my eye makeup looks way better too! I was just using this in the AM but have switched to using it AM & PM since I loved the results. I use right after my toner / essence / serum step!
This is perfect even on its own, leaves your skin feeling soft and not drying at all. It is not oily either as it washers off really well. It is my favorite of all the oil cleansers.
Loving this serum. After applying my skin is glowing. I've been applying at night after cleansing and toning. Makes my skin feel soft and is not sticky. will continue using.

Feels great going on and soaks in immediately! I haven’t noticed any brightening (which is what I bought it for) but that may be a more long-term result. It’s really expensive but didn’t break me out. Definitely hydrating and I love the way the little beads dissolve. Just way too expensive for what it is. But I’m reordering to see if it has a more noticeable effect after another few months.

I have combination/sensitive skin that loves all the things this product is supposed to deliver however it just left me with tiny whiteheads every time I used it. I will say the texture is a bit thicker than water and it did leave my skin feeling hydrated
I love this product. I have been using it daily for a month now, and it leaves my skin smooth and soft. I ended up ordering another just in case I ran out.

Naturium is my new favorite brand in recent month; however, I had a bad breakout with this one. I have very sensitive, easily irritated skin that is highly reactive unfortunately. It might be the sunflower oil or possibly the lactic acid might be too strong yet difficult to pinpoint.

productName: On Soko Glam Collegiate Crewneck Sweatshirt
review: This sweater is definitely oversized, but in a good way. It’s also extremely comfortable and warm!

productName: On Soko Glam Collegiate Crewneck Sweatshirt
review: This is a really nice lounge sweater or to throw on in the summer evenings, very cozy but not overly thick. I got my usual unisex size(small) and it’s fits slightly oversized.

productName: On Soko Glam Collegiate Crewneck Sweatshirt
review: I was super excited to receive this sweatshirt, once I got it I washed it and put it on and I LOVE it! It’s so soft, comfortable, it doesn’t shrink when I dry it either. I’ll be honest, I couldn’t take it off. I’m a person who loves to be cozy and comfortable at home and I just really love the quality of the sweater as well.

productName: On Soko Glam Collegiate Crewneck Sweatshirt
review: Absolutely love the fit of this sweater. I bought it a size up to have it looser.

I took a risk on this product as there were no reviews and no information online. The ingredients looked promising and i had great results with another hair product purchased on soko glam (l’ador wonderbalm). I tried this product 3x and 3 different ways. 1) as a solo leave in product 2) prior to serum 3) with leave in conditioner to amp moisture and air drying. It did nothing- no smoothness, softness, shine, bounce, detangling properties- nada. So unless there is a magic method to using this that evades me, I would pass as it’s not cheap and there are so many great hair products sold elsewhere.
Bought these during cyber month and no regrets at all. I love how it leaves my skin glows. Definitely would buy more.
Super soothing, this will forever be a staple in my regimen!
Very refreshing
Super gentle

I love the feel of a face mist to refresh throughout the day but so many products out there are full of fragrance and drying alcohol. This is the only spray I use regularly to calm and freshen my skin. When my skin gets hot and red I will spray some of this onto a cotton pad and use it like a mask. Totally takes the redness away in a few minutes. This is my second time purchasing and will be purchasing again!
I had a hard time finding a good toner for my skin until I came across this one. It helps with redness and texture as well as moisturizing.

productName: On Soko Glam Logo Baseball Cap
review: This hat's cute, however, I wish the material was cotton instead of polyester. The cap feels really cheap and flimsy. It feels more like a cap you'd get at a dollar store and for $20, you're essentially paying for the Sokoglam branding. It's a shame because it's really cute, but I can't see it lasting long. It's perfect for bad hair days which is what I'm using it for.

productName: On Soko Glam Logo Baseball Cap
review: Not sure why I waited so long to finally buy this, but I am SO glad i did. I love how the material doesn't make your head super hot and give you that forehead sweat, but it's still durable. Perfect for running errands, taking walks, the gym, you name it! This is now a staple for me.

productName: On Soko Glam Logo Baseball Cap
review: I got this as a reward. Color is navy blue as pictured and it is made of nylon. The back is an Velcro band. I would have preferred a metal or plastic type adjustable strap instead hence the deduction of a star. Nice reward but I wouldn’t spend $20 for it.

productName: On Soko Glam Logo Baseball Cap
review: The material is soft but feels thin since it’s not a cotton baseball hat. Also, I would have chosen a different font size for the lettering; it’s pretty small. The font on “SOKO” could have been played with too to give it some fun pizazz.

productName: On Soko Glam Logo Baseball Cap
review: Lightweight and breathable - totally love this cap to take with me when I go on hikes! It's really nice quality - maybe the one downside is I feel like it collects lint/hair fairly easily - but I do live with a cat :)
The ampoule feels very soothing on my skin. I love how my skin feels after using this product. Helps calm my skin.
Really soothing and moisturizing, not sure if it made a difference with acne though but I think it did

I love Hanskin! I have yet to find one of their products that doesn't deliver beautiful results. This ampoule is so calming and melts so beautifully into the skin. I tend to use it in my night rotation on days when my skin is a little irritated or dull. I can't wait to try the essence from this line!
I love this bag, it's nice and roomy as well as great quality. It'll be nice to have for those short trips when I don't need to pack much

This is an awesome product for my dry and extremely sensitive skin for daily exfoliation without any irritation or discomfort. Most chemical exfoliants make me break out in redness and rashes that don’t go away for weeks. It also cleans and hydrates.

This is an awesome product for my dry and extremely sensitive skin for daily exfoliation without any irritation or discomfort. Most chemical exfoliants make me break out in redness and rashes that don’t go away for weeks. It also cleans and hydrates.

I have extremely dry and sensitive skin but it still needs to be exfoliated daily especially in the winter because I get a lot of dead skin buildup in those dry months. Harsh chemical treatments can make it worse but Beauty Water gently cleans, hydrates and sloths away the dead layer of skin. It’s also great as a refresher any time of the day.BEAUTY
WATER

I love this cleansing water. It's a great addition to your routine. It's great for the morning refresh when you don't need to wash your face, but you just need a quick cleanse to wash the sleep away and wake up your skin. This cleansing water is very gentle and has a calming effect when you use it. So you immediately feel refreshed and ready to go.

productName: On Advanced Snail Mucin Power Sheet Mask (1 ea)
review: This is really nice when you want the essence to really soak into your skin. I use the snail mucin essence daily and love it.

productName: On Advanced Snail Mucin Power Sheet Mask (1 ea)
review: Great mask

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Essence Mist
review: I love this spray! I started with the toner (also a fave of mine) and decided to try this out. The sprayer is very high quality, and releases a controlled mist to fully cover your face. It leaves my skin feeling fresh and soft.

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Essence Mist
review: I really wanted to love this, but it just didn't work for me. The sprayer was a bit weird and leaky, and I didn't notice any positive effects.

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Essence Mist
review: This mist is instantly smoothing to my skin, but the spray bottle is just…off. The spray is a super fine mist (good, in my opinion) but doesn’t spray widely enough, so it lands in a specific spot on my face rather than coating the whole face. Not sure if that makes sense, but I end up just putting several sprays/pumps in my hand and then applying that evenly to my face. Still a great product but I don’t end up reaching for it daily.

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Essence Mist
review: This is the only product I buy 3 at a time. I keep one in my purse, one at work and one at home. It’s great to even refresh my makeup. The best for my more dry skin.

productName: On Licorice pH Balancing Essence Mist
review: Love the product, didn’t clog and felt nice on the skin. I felt it helped to brighten my skin and moisturize.

productName: On Real Vita C Powder Lemon
review: ive never used a powder before

productName: On Real Vita C Powder Lemon
review: When mixing this into my toner at night I have found that it makes the toner a little grainy at first unless you sit with it and mix for at least a full minute. While this isn’t a problem for me, sometimes I just don’t have time to mix it in all the way so I don’t use it on those nights. I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone who doesn’t have a lot of time to spend on a skincare routine, probably it would be easier to use a liquid vitamin c product. However if you have the time, I think it is definitely worth it.

productName: On Real Vita C Powder Lemon
review: i had to be careful while applying this power mixing with lotion or toner, i definitely noticed glow in my skin after using it. I have dry skin so, i applied extra moisturizer while using this.

productName: On Real Vita C Powder Lemon
review: I didn't see a huge difference on my skin with this. I thought this would work based on all the good reviews, but after I tried a liquid vitamin c serum, I found the liquid vitamin c more effective. Maybe because the powder doesn't really melt even after combining it with a toner, so your skin doesn't absorb it as much. I have sensitive combo skin, acne prone, and my scars heal pretty slow. Maybe the results are quicker for other skin types.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Mask
review: I bought this after using the snail bee serum for a little mask boost. Perfect!

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Mask
review: This mask leaves my sensitive, acne-prone skin hydrated, plump, and glowy! It did not irritate my skin at all and did not cause any breakouts. I definitely recommend these!

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Mask
review: I struggle with acne and sensitivity. It really hidrates the skin, but gave me a few pimples :(

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Mask
review: I have tried A LOT of sheet masks, and this one has been one of my favorites. I probably do this once a week and see very immediate results. Afterwards my skin feels super hydrated, plump and glowing.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Mask
review: Made my skin feel super soft and hydrated

productName: On Nourishing Care Lip Sleeping Pack
review: Tres bon masque pour les lèvres!

productName: On Nourishing Care Lip Sleeping Pack
review: Really nice lip balm/mask that’s thick and moisturizing. The smell was really nice (kind of like caramel).

productName: On Nourishing Care Lip Sleeping Pack
review: I received this as a Christmas gift and it's the first lip balm where I've seen a tremendous improvement with my lips! My lips are chronically chapped, especially in the winter, but this is the first product I've ever tried that truly keeps them smooth and hydrated. I pile this on at night and my lips remain smooth all day. I can't recommend this enough!

productName: On Nourishing Care Lip Sleeping Pack
review: Does exactly what it’s supposed to. My lips are always chapped but when I wake up in the am after wearing this mask all night my lips are no longer dry. Especially good during the fall and winter when you want to prevent the chappy lips from ever starting

productName: On Nourishing Care Lip Sleeping Pack
review: I have chronically dry lips that are always chapped. Vaseline didn’t do anything to help. This lip mask is great! I’ve been using it for three weeks now and have seen a noticeable difference.
I like the consistency of it, it's great for dry skin, it would be great in the winter days
Nice product, it’s easy to apply not greasy and smell very good 😊

I got a sample of the moistfull collagen eye cream and I have been using it for the last couple of months! It has been fantastic, lightweight and not greasy. I have very sensitive skin with excema and this eye cream works wonders.

The texture is so lightweight, it feels like I'm rubbing a cloud around my eyes. Out of the 6 products in my nighttime skincare routine, this is my favorite part to apply and the light scent is so refreshing. My skin feels quite hydrated afterwards. I have sensitive skin with eczema, and glad to say that I've been using this for 6 months without any negative reactions!

This eye cream has a light but very moisturizing feeling, with a subtle and fresh scent. I have sensitive skin and eye creams usually break me out, but this has not happened so far! I've only been using it for about a week so I cannot attest to results in wrinkles or tightening, but so far I am loving the creamy texture and moisturizing feeling. After my experience so far, I would buy this eye cream again!

This is a great emulsion - light but not too watery. However, the smell was so strong reminds me of Avon so badly. And doesn't have that clean of ingredients and can't stop thinking of how unnatural smell is every time I use it. Glad I tried because of collagen but not worth it due to the smell.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
This essence is very hydrating, but didn't do much for my skin. Love the cosrx snail mucin essence much better
It is a good balm that leaves your skin clean and moisturized. There is a nice smell but very subtle. Would definitely recommend.
such a good product! removes makeup wonderfully, doesn't strip skin, adds moisture. i have sensitive skin and it is so gentle. Has a light, delightful smell, very fresh!!
Am I taking advantage of this sale OBVI. Stock up, this cleansing balm is by far one of the best ones. Very faint smell and the texture is pleasing. You won’t regret just do it.

I bought this originally directly from E Nature and now I bought it again from Soko Glam. This stuff smells like heaven and it FEELS like heaven to put on. It's so smooth and soothing. I have acnes prone and sensitive skin and it didn't cause any breakouts or redness.

i liked it as my first cleansing balm but it became a bit unsanitary and messy for me after losing the scoop that it came with.. i do however keep it around for drunk nights when im sloppy with makeup removal and everything is all over the place so that i dont waste cleansing oil lol

productName: On Yuja Niacin Brightening Moisture Gel Cream
review: Be careful - a little goes a long way. Has a serum-y texture which is great for oily, acne-prone, or combo skin types. Not sure yet when it comes to effectiveness but wanted to point out how little you need considering it has the same texture as some serums and - generally speaking - aloe vera gel, so it is really lightweight. Which might also make it good for sensitive skin depending on the needs, as some people with sensitive skin want to incorporate Vitamin C into their routine, but also need to stick to lighter layers, or fewer layers of products. I feel with this you might be able to go with a cica or other watery calming serum under such a light gel with fewer problems.

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: These are the only ones I use. I love how there's two textures to fit your routine.

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: I’m a repeat customer of this product. I just loved how effective and efficient it is when it comes to cleansing my sensitive skin.

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: Super soft and thick!

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: Love the two types of cotton pads you get. One I use to wipe things off my face and the other to use with my toner, which makes me use less product too. I always have a backup box.

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: Not sure how they came up with these but they’re amazing! They hold the perfect amount of toner and essence so that just a few drops can be applied to your whole face. My product is distributed just as evenly (if not more) than regular cotton pads, but I’m using significantly more product. I’ll never use other cotton pads again

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Mask Pack (Box of 10)
review: This is the one product I will never be able to live without! I have super sensitive skin - rosacea, adult acne, dryness, etc. I use these whenever my face is freaking out and it instantly brings relief to all my issues. So soothing and healing!

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Mask Pack (Box of 10)
review: These didn't do anything but clog my pores. Maybe they're just not for my skin type, but there are better out there.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Mask Pack (Box of 10)
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry to hear that these masks did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On A-Clear Soothing Clear Spot Patch
review: Not too bad but I think the COSRX ones are better for healing acne

productName: On A-Clear Soothing Clear Spot Patch
review: Works well at stopping myself from picking at my skin.

productName: On A-Clear Soothing Clear Spot Patch
review: I am a frequent pimple patch user, and have tried multiple brands over the years. Due to this, I know what a 'bad' pimple patch looks like, and the Neogen ones do not fit into that category. Now, I didn't notice anything super special about these as I was using them, but that's ok because they do exactly what I want my pimple patches to do! They have a good stick, and I haven't had any issues with them falling off while I'm wearing them. They soak up my pimple gunk and keep me from picking at them. That's enough for a 5 star review from me!

productName: On A-Clear Soothing Clear Spot Patch
review: I am a type that'll try any pimple patches thanks to hormonal acne that gets pustule types of acne. This was a throwaway item that I ordered from last year. It worked fine. Nothing super special and did the job.

productName: On A-Clear Soothing Clear Spot Patch
review: I am always surprised how well pimple patches work. These have saved me so many times overnight, taking away a blemish like magic. Such a nice thing to have on hand.

productName: On Gentle Black Deep Cleansing Oil
review: Great on my sensitive skin, gets oil plugs out. Is a great way to take off makeup, or use as double cleanser! Great great great product

productName: On Gentle Black Deep Cleansing Oil
review: Works OK! Have to go in a second time to remove eye makeup, but it works good.

productName: On Gentle Black Deep Cleansing Oil
review: I've tried more oil cleansers than I care to list and have been disappointed by them all. This is the only one I've used that doesn't have a strong scent and also doesn't have me wake up with a pimple after using it. I use it in double cleansing and also I've used it by itself and have no problems after use. Also I've noticed I use a lot less than I would other oil cleansers, really one or two pumps of this is all you need.

productName: On Gentle Black Deep Cleansing Oil
review: I was so excited to try this! I was initially put off by the fragrance, then I noticed my face was red and sensitive for a few days but I wasn't sure which product it was from so I decided to take the actives out of my routine. I used it last night followed by my usual water based cleanser and had red bumps and splotches all over my face. I'm not sure which ingredient I am allergic to but I have read other reviews where people have had similar reactions. I do love the unscented supple preparation toner and that is super gentle and hydrating for my dry skin!
i’ve bought these 3 times now and have been using them every morning before toner. great for sensitive and acne prone skin !

I love these for refreshing my face in the morning or a little extra exfoliation when I need it. I find them very effective and non-irritating. They feel soothing for my skin. I couldn’t use them on their own as a toner but they’re good as a first step if you don’t want to wash again.
full of essence but just feels like I'm wiping my face... not for my taste

I have really sensitive skin and I have loved this cleanser. A little goes a long way and using this cleanser AM and PM I still have SO much left after three months of use. It has a soft scent that I find sweet and soothing.
A little how’s a long way! It foams up miraculously, it smells lovely, cleans my skin without drying me up. I’m in love!

I have used this every morning for over a year now. Love it! You don't need to use a lot of the product and the little you use is powerful....rich, cleansing and hydrating. Perfect cleanser that I will use for many more years to come
My favorite cleanser, I’ve bought it 3 times. My skin looks terrible without it. A small amount goes a long way, so the entire bottle can last you 9 months easily.
I use this as my water based cleanser and it's the only cleanser I've ever used that visibly brightens my skin and lightens my dark spots.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Steam Cream
review: It's currently winter time where most moisturizers feel like they aren't doing enough. I got this one recently and it has been exactly what I was looking for. It's very thick and creamy, but it doesn't feel like it sits on the skin too long after applying like other thick moisturizers. I have extremely sensitive skin, and when I wake up in the morning after using this, it calms a lot of my breakouts and redness, and my skin doesn't have its winter dry patches anymore. Would definitely recommend for others who have dryer skin in the winter, and are looking for a thicker cream to help out. Only thing that wasn't my favorite is the size, it's quite small, but a little does go a very long way.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Steam Cream
review: This was a great moisturizer while it lasted, I can't use it. This cream makes me breakout every time. I tried using it consecutively day and night. Just in the morning, just a night. Even in rotation and it STILL made me break out. This was all over the coarse of a year. I don't blame the product entirely though. Everything I have tried with snail mucin has made me break out. It just doesn't agree with my skin. I have acne prone combination skin and this was not it for me.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Steam Cream
review: This cream is so thick that it leaves streaks on your face. I only used it at night because of that. Great for super dry skin! I didn't see any improvement from the snail bee stuff, but that might just be my skin.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Steam Cream
review: Benton has a lot of great products but Im not a fan of this one. I would rate this one a 3/5 due to the fact that it is quite think and hard for the product to permeate my skin. I think the ingredients are really nice, but I didn't notice any difference after using the entire tube.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Steam Cream
review: I ordered this product after being attracted by strong reviews and interesting ingredients. Unfortunately after a few weeks of use this product has made my skin oily, saggy and I've broken out worse than I have in years.

This mask smells like bubblegum in the nicest possible way. Soothing bubblegum. I don't generally use physical exfoliants on my face anymore, but I can't give this mask up. It's so softening and makes my skin feel absolutely incredible.
Very sensitive and dry skin, it helped remove dead skin. Did the job

I love it, I use this twice a week or when I’m going out and need to put on makeup. I always put it on as a mask after cleansing and let it sit for 10 min while I do other things. Then I damp my hands and gently rub my face to exfoliate before washing it off. It smells yummy, it doesn’t irritate my skin, and it leaves my skin glowing after I’ve let it sit
Worked great for my combination skin.
It's just PERFECT!
Nice during a bath after using your actives. Let this seal your treatments in and calm. Skin looks dewier after, perfect everyday mask
Feels amazing after application

I really enjoyed it, and plan to order the 10-pack next time. I also ordered another variety from this brand because I enjoyed this one so much. It's very hydrating and calming for my very dry, rosacea, sensitive skin, and there was a ton of extra essence in the pack, so I've been able to use the extra as an essence step on my face 3 or 4 times now, and still have another use in the pack. It's a worthwhile product!

i was gifted two of these from a friend (not sure if they were ordered on this website) and they left my skin feeling refreshed and hydrated after days spent in the hot sun. i had minor sunburns and they were gone the day after using this mask.
This works amazing after an exfoliation treatment, sunburn, or barrier damage. Aloe and green tea are the one of hardest working duos out there.

I recently changed up my skincare routine and had to change my morning cleanser which was a tea tree oil based one. I need tea tree in my routine to keep my acne at bay so I picked this up on a whim and it has worked wonders. I use with a cotton pad this after cleansing and before applying my serums. It removes the dirt and oil that sticks around after cleansing and just really helps keeps my face clear. Also it doesn't have a strong tea tree scent which is very nice.
I love this cleansing water for its multiple uses. It soothes and diminishes my facial

Redness without ever leaving my skin feeling tight or dry. It also has helped my blepharitis due to dry eye as a brilliant eyelid cleaner when I use in morning. I use this now as my stand alone cleanser and takes off makeup just fine. You do have to use a couple of cotton pads but worth it as not super pricey. Please don’t ever stop making this!!!

Gentle, effective, never stripping, and keeps break outs in check. Doesn’t have any pungent tea tree smell for any nose sensitive. Great as a quick cleanse wipe and/or toner. My skin remains clear with regular daily use.
This is a nice cleansing water but nothing special. It's good as part of a larger skin regimen.

I had been using another AHA-BHA product for a while and though it was fine. However I could not seem to rid my nose and chin of what I learned was sebaceous filaments. Miracle Serum Light cleared my skin almost instantly and has continued to keep my skin clear. No more little white bumps. Can't recommend this enough!
Definitely improves skins appearance over time. It works and it’s gentle on my skin. What else could I ask for?
Saw results after a week! Definitely recommend

I usually use a few different kinds of chemical exfoliants one at a time, this isn't my favorite out of the ones I have but sometimes you don't want to carry around a bunch of bottles and this combo serum comes in handy then.
Feel so fresh and relaxing on my skin

I have combination skin with hormonal acne along my chin & dry skin on my forehead & around my nose. This stuff is the best. It is moisturizing enough without being too emollient for my acne-prone skin. If you have very dry skin this is probably not for you. Not sticky at all & absorbs nicely into my skin.
This facial cream delivers a lot of collagen directly into your skin. lifting it and making it more radiant.
I love everything about it, the texture, like a cream gel, the cool, fresh feeling on your skin, the lightness of it and the soft smell.
I have been using this for a few months and really like it. It didn’t break me out or leave my skin feeling sticky. I would buy it again for sure.
i used this product daily and found my skin to feel so soft to the touch and didn't leave my skin feeling oily at all

productName: On Cranberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: I love this n the green tea one!

productName: On Cranberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: Smells SO good. I loved the green tea version, but wanted to try some of their other ‘flavors’, and this one is great. Only cleanser brand I’ll use.

productName: On Cranberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: Absolutely love the packaging with the cranberries at the bottom. The cranberries are separated from the liquid and not mixed together. Great foam cleanser! Leave your skin clean and fresh.

productName: On Cranberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: Easy pump and a small dollop is required for a full face cleanse. Love the smell! The texture of your skin is left squeaky clean .and clear . Love it & have ordered more

productName: On Cranberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: This is my new favorite. I’ve always been skeptical of foam but this comes out as a foam but rubs in almost like a cream. My face feels so good afterwards and it’s been helping clear my skin a lot!

These cotton pads never leave lint on my face. I love using these with my toner or micellar water to clean places like my neck and chest when I’m washing my makeup and sunscreen off (without hopping in the shower). Very effective! They can be unfolded as well to spread on the face with an essence as a mask!
I prefer these to any cotton balls I had been using. These cotton pads are simple and what I needed.
These are the softest cotton pads I've ever used in my whole life, they feel so gentle on my skin and I don't feel like I'm wasting product.
No fuzziness, love them!
These are great! No fuzz. Texture is good. I like them.
Love this mask & that it only has one ingredient.

This was just okay. The moisture was nice and lightweight, probably works better for folks that have oily skin. While it did provide moisture, it didn't leave me dewy the way other masks do. Would probably incorporate as part of routine before work or a special event where I want extra moisture but don't want to look too greasy.

I bought this after reading reviews. It took nearly 3 weeks before I received this , so when I used it, my face starts to feel warm, I removed it and I feel itchy but tolerable. The next time used it, I placed it on the fridge for over night before using it, and it feels good. Only 4 for me because I don't like the excess liquid and it drips on my face. I lather the excess, but I still find it annoying.
I love how hydrating this mask is. It helps with redness. Very refreshing afterwards!
I love and appreciate that this mask is full of Centella Asiatica - it's so calming and hydrating. Love using at night!
It's a nice cream but it's heavy feeling and it has broke me out with acne and the smell stays with you for a long time my face feels oily after I use it but a small amount does go along way

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I first tried this moisturizer when I was a teenager experiencing dry skin for the first time. It was the middle of winter and I never felt my skin so dry before. I picked up a jar and my skin was instantly better afterwards. Decided to pick it up again as my skin gets drier and drier, and I fell in love all over again. Great product!
Fun mask that helps pull dirt and oil out of my skin.
Left my skin feel clean, but tight and dry. I like the texture and it is fun to apply, not sure if it actually benefits my skin. I didn't notice a change in my acne from the mask.
