Thank you for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and we're sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences :)

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Eye Gel Patch
review: Very nice, didn't affect my sensitive skin and hydrated my under eyes.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Eye Gel Patch
review: Easily to apply and sticks to skin well. I was it was better packaged inside because the patches got jostled around and are harder to separate, but not a big problem.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Eye Gel Patch
review: These are excellent. They give you so many in a single package and they last forever. I bought this several months ago and there's still about half of them left.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Eye Gel Patch
review: My eye bags have been pretty bad and these patches are PHENOMENAL!!! My eye puffyness and darkness has reduced so much and my eye has been very hydrated as well!!

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Eye Gel Patch
review: I really enjoy these eye patches!

productName: On Royal Honey Propolis Enrich Essence
review: This serum feels so good on the skin and always leaves me looking dewy!

productName: On Royal Honey Propolis Enrich Essence
review: This essence came highly recommended, but I don’t know that it entirely lived up to the hype, given the price. I did legitimately enjoy using it. I do think a fair bit of my enjoyment was just due to how bougie the bottle is. If you’re specifically hoping for an essence, maybe look into a different option, as both the packaging (dropper bottle) and texture (not watery) is not conducive to using it as an essence. But in terms of a good moisturizing, soothing serum, this is a fantastic choice because it has the bee trifecta of royal jelly, honey and propolis. I would definitely consider repurchasing next winter.

productName: On Royal Honey Propolis Enrich Essence
review: It’s moisturizing and it makes your skin feel soft. I recently bought a lot of skin care so I’m just trying to figure out what step to make it.

productName: On Royal Honey Propolis Enrich Essence
review: Amazing Essence does wonders as prep before applying a serum and moisturizer. If you're looking for glowy glass skin then this is for you.

productName: On Royal Honey Propolis Enrich Essence
review: Very moisturizing essence, would highly recommend it’s worth the price. Good for normal to dry skin. Also love the packaging.

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: Loved using these after days of wearing makeup felt so nice and made my skin so glowly !

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: I love these masks. Not only are they soothing to my deep, hormonal acne but in between my cycle when my skin feels dry and parched, they’re also super moisturizing. One of my new favorite masks!

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: One of my go-to face masks! They are very hydrating and moisturising; my skin feels so plump and fresh after using it! I keep buying them over and over.

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: A fitting name for it, these masks feel velvety smooth and therapeutic to my skin, it literally just feels good, and leaves my skin feeling soft, supple, and refreshed.

productName: On White Truffle Serum In Oil Drop
review: I have not been disappointed with anything Neogen. This is light and not greasy. I add a few drops of vitamin C to it and apply after my Neogen essence. Its moisturizing enough to where I don't need a moisturizer if I'm also wearing sunscreen. Just purchased my 3rd bottle.

productName: On White Truffle Serum In Oil Drop
review: I received this in my ipsy and I never used it for weeks. I finally used it Amazing. My skin drank it i can say my wrinkles have softened and are not so defined. I have to order more of this.

productName: On White Truffle Serum In Oil Drop
review: 52 and have sensitive skin. This feels great on my face, eyes and lip area. Just started it but know quickly its a winner!

productName: On White Truffle Serum In Oil Drop
review: I use this as part of my nighttime routine. It’s one of my favorite products as it makes my skin very dewy and soft. It also absorbs quickly unlike a typical facial oil that just sits on the surface of your skin. It helps give me glazed donut skin!

productName: On White Truffle Serum In Oil Drop
review: I purchased this product, as all other oils (like the carrot seed oil) on the website were out of stock at the time, and thought I would give it a try because it sounded interesting. I regret it. It’s not really like an oil at all..which I know it says it’s a “serum in oil”? But it’s not as hydrating as I was hoping and it doesn’t feel like it’s nourishing my skin - which was the reason for this purchase.

I have used this product about 2 times a week in the evenings, it doesn't hurt my skin and leaves it feeling very smooth, it can be a bit drying but that is expected in this climate here in alberta, Canada. I pair it with the snail 96 mucin which clears up the dryness for me.

Both my daughter and I have been using this product for over a month now and we have noticed a significant improvement in our overall skin texture. I have oily skin, and this has definitely helped my face not be oily. And my daughter had really bad blackheads on her nose and now they are barely noticeable. I highly recommend this product.

I’ve been using this twice a day for about 3 or 4 days now and Im noticing a difference already. I’m using this on my whole face but the are that needs it most is the apple of the cheek where the pores are largest. It’s clearing and brightening the appearance of the skin.

I bought this because I heard that it gets rid of milia (which can only get removed by a professional). I had one or two milia spots for the longest time and after using this product, I just randomly noticed that they were gone! This was really great since it is hard to find products that are specifically meant for milia. I definitely recommend!
I have been using this product for years I wouldn't be without it‼️💖

productName: On H.D.P Photoready Tightening Charcoal Mask (5 pack)
review: Maybe I fell victim to the gimmick, but this mask really seemed to reduce the appearance of my pores. Not drying, and left a nice glow.

productName: On H.D.P Photoready Tightening Charcoal Mask (5 pack)
review: I like to use these after a long day out, especially if I wore heavier make up. I feel cleaner (but not dry), tighter, and more refreshed!

productName: On H.D.P Photoready Tightening Charcoal Mask (5 pack)
review: This is the 3rd type of MEDIHEAL mask I've tried and I'm NOT disappointed! I'm going to do the intensive treatment as recommended on the back of this mask. I like how much essence this product has and love that all you need to do when you remove the mask is to tap the remaining essence into your skin.

productName: On H.D.P Photoready Tightening Charcoal Mask (5 pack)
review: Easy to apply and does the job. No stickiness after use.

This whole line is fantastic. This mask is quite soft, and really great for calming down irritated skin. It's great for dehydration, too -- well, all sheet masks are, but this one really feels like it sinks in, which for my dehydrated skin is *chef's kiss
I can feel it working. My skin is completely renewed and so soft. I bought more masks but haven't used them all yet. I will definitely reorder.
works lovely for dry skin

I followed the directions for this product exactly and it made my skin so dry. My skin was feeling over worked and sensitive from some breakouts I had so i decided to use this. While I liked the cooling and calming effect it had on my skin. It sucked all the moisture from it.

I have issues with KP (aka: strawberry legs). After using this I have little to no ingrown hairs and my skin is much smoother. I find to also be very hydrating and it is easier to use than the ordinary's lactic acid.

I got this b/c I was looking for an aha product to help with my cell turnover. It stung my face first use but only b/c I was using too many actives from other products in combo with this one. I instead use it only 2 or 3 times a week and when I’m not using many other actives, which got rid of the sting. It did exactly what I needed when used this way and consistently. Definitely will buy again!

I got this as a sample with my recent order. I decided to try it out and it's been great. I immediately noticed a difference with my skin. Because my skin tends to be on the dryer side I did use it with a heavy moisturizer. By doing this for my skin, I noticed an immediate difference. I only used it twice a week and I intend to order it once I'm done with my serums.

I have sensitive skin so this was my first AHA product whatsoever. After using regularly for a month I did not notice a difference on my skin. It is gentle so no side effects but it did not work for my skin. The gel like consistency glides smoothly on my skin which is nice and gentle. Wouldn't order again.
This stung my face a bit but it works great for my boyfriend.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Essence
review: I have tried everything for those annoying under eye lines. Let me tell you, please get this. I was even considering Botox but this stuff has made my lines almost disappear after a month. My skin is so soft and firming. And my eyes, omg the skin around my eyes has dropped years. I will be buying this forever. So far, everything I've bought off this site has exceeded expectations!

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Essence
review: After your regular skin routine ( cleanse and tone ) -- this will be the best feeling you would have when using the concentrated essence . All you need is a pump of it and it just applies smoothly over the areas of concern -- leaving it so soft and supple. I see visible difference within 5 days of use . Amazing enough , I have actually ordered more !!

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Essence
review: This essence is light and really helps with acne scars and uneven skin tone

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Essence
review: This is fire, I love using this makes my skin feel so hydrated. I have dry sensitive skin so I'd recommend you use this with a moisturizer.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Essence
review: After watching Kelly Driscoll hype this the benefits in reduction of acne scarring and hyperpigmentation that this essence provides I had to see for myself. And sure enough it did not disappoint. Hyperpigmentation lightened and little slight not too major acne scars faded a considerable amount. This essence absorbed quickly and nicely and left my skin feeling hydrated and soothed.
This mask made my face calmer. The redness I usually see disappeared for a period of time.
Super hydrating and firming. Love this mask
Yes yes yes! It's so great, honestly. I use this and I feel young, PLUMP, and fresher that ever!
it’s so soothing in the skin i love the toner version nd got after using this lovely hydrating acne fighting

productName: On Squeeze Green Watery Sheet Mask
review: Perfect mask for those summer days when my face needs a refresher!

productName: On Squeeze Green Watery Sheet Mask
review: Love this as a morning mask. Leaves my skin refreshed and it is very light.

productName: On Squeeze Green Watery Sheet Mask
review: Love the ingredients in this mask! It's hydrating and left a nice glow on the skin.

productName: On Squeeze Green Watery Sheet Mask
review: I love how lightweight and refreshing this mask is. It is great to use in the morning in cold winter days when my room is dry and it does an excellent job to wake up my skin. It’s a personal preference but I this would not use this as part of my night facial routine, it doesn’t feel rich enough for that.

productName: On Squeeze Green Watery Sheet Mask
review: This was fun to use and felt really nice on my skin

productName: On Tea Tree Scalp Clinic Hair Pack
review: Didn't realize when I purchased that this has menthol in it. It has a lot of menthol! If you like the “refreshing feeling”, this may be more suited to you. Maybe I'm tender-headed but the menthol is very strong for me. I have only used it twice so I cannot speak to how effective it is, but so far no adverse effects (except for the potent menthol).

productName: On Tea Tree Scalp Clinic Hair Pack
review: This product wash out clean and a little bit goes a long way, so it will probably last a long time.

productName: On Tea Tree Scalp Clinic Hair Pack
review: My hair & scalp type: 4C curl pattern; dry and sometimes flaky.

productName: On Aloe Soothing Mask Pack (10 Pack)
review: These masks and high quality and leave your skin super hydrated and supple. A must have so glad I tried them. Very calming for sensitive skin. This is my second box. Live them!

productName: On Aloe Soothing Mask Pack (10 Pack)
review: Great for my sensitive skin! So hydrating and soothing. My favorite sheet mask

productName: On Aloe Soothing Mask Pack (10 Pack)
review: Smelled nice and was soothing on face.

productName: On Aloe Soothing Mask Pack (10 Pack)
review: when I feel like my skin is going to break out I use this sheet mask to minimize the casualties.

productName: On Aloe Soothing Mask Pack (10 Pack)
review: It's nice and cooling on the face, as most sheet masks are. It feels refreshing, but I didn't notice much of a difference in my skin after.

I don't consider my skin to be sensitive, so I don't know what in here disagreed with my skin, but I got contact dermatitis the morning after using this. It's my first time ever having such a severe reaction to anything, so I'm stepping away from my regular skin care to take care of this nightmare right now.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I’m sorry to hear that you experienced a reaction to this product. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
I had a couple of blemishes on my forehead and this mask really helped to soothed down my skin. It left my skin smooth.

I really enjoyed this mask, it was soft and comfortable and very hydrating for my dry skin. My only concern was the fragrance bothered my allergies. It has a faint fragrance, but I tend to stay away from fragrance due to allergies. If fragrance doesn’t bother you and you have dry skin, I would highly recommend this mask.
These masks are amazing for reviving my skin when I’m traveling and in the winter. There is always a ton of the essence in the pouch too so I feel like I can save a little for later.

The silk material for the mask is great and was my first time trying something like this. The essence was wonderful too. I've tried several masks from this brand and they've all been great, not surprising that I loved this one too. Would repurchase!
I very much loved these masks. They left my skin feeling amazing especially the next morning, as I love using masks before bed. I will repurchasing.
Really liked this mask, makes me want to buy more mugwort products!

This was part of the 10 step skin care routine. I only wish it came with more as a multipack. My skin felt so lush, light, revitalised. If I could give it more than 5 stars, I would. Needs to be available as a multipack.
got a couple of their masks and they're great, calmed my skin down
i always make sure to get these as they are so so soothing and calming on my skin !!!
helped calm my skin down but not a dramatic difference !!
Im satisfied with the texture.
Received this as a gift and really like that it’s full size! Goes on nice and doesn’t leave a residue like some other spf formulas. I definitely feel protected with 50spf!

Sensitive eyes are my number one concern with sunscreen and this one causes absolutely no irritation and rubs in clear. The matte finish holds up even over the summer in midwest humidity. It has a slight smell that disappears on application. Just repurchased.

The smell of this stuff is SO GROSS. It smells exactly like sour milk and I cannot figure out why. It also feels really sticky on my face and never totally absorbs. I gave it two stars instead of 1 because at least it's not drying?

productName: On Organic Cotton Treatment Toning Pad
review: I was skeptical when I opened the jar because I thought the individual wipes looked strange and the aroma a bit funky. I’m really glad I bought these though because after using the cotton pads my skin felt clean and toned. Only suggestion I have is to use two cotton pads per cleanse instead of the one. Other than that I highly recommend this product.

productName: On Organic Cotton Treatment Toning Pad
review: I have tried several samples and really want to order this product but it has been out of stock for so long. I receive 15 % off coupons to use that expires in 30 days. I have wanted to order all summer but still out of stock. UGH!!

productName: On Organic Cotton Treatment Toning Pad
review: I reaaaallllyyy love this toner. Please make this one available soon 🙌

productName: On Organic Cotton Treatment Toning Pad
review: I am excitedly anticipating the restock of this product. I received these cotton pads as a sample with my purchase and it does exactly what it claims. It's amazing how much can still be left on the skin after double cleansing. This product helped me understand the value of using toner, especially toner that is gentle enough for my skin. Please restock soon!

productName: On Organic Cotton Treatment Toning Pad
review: I do not like these. Got as a sample. I just used one after my shower, my face felt sticky, so I waited a minute, then put my normal lightweight moisturizer on top. My face was so tacky! I tried to just bear it but after an hour, in addition to having a sticky face, it was now shiny too. I couldn’t tolerate it. I had to rewash my face. I gave it two stars though because I did like the dual sided pad.
